story:
What is Bolt

We often need a way to move for short everyday trips. But how? 

Walking is too slow and time-consuming. Most of the time taking the car is cumbersome and useless because you need to find space for parking. The bicycle must always be locked and made safe otherwise can be stolen. Even if you use public transport, you still need a last-mile solution small enough to be carried with you everywhere.

Today, we are happy to present Bolt, a super portable electric vehicle.

It's not just an electric skateboard. Bolt is something new. It is the smallest electric vehicle in the world.

 

 

 

A small great revolution in the world of transportation

Bolt is the first really portable vehicle that can be carried anywhere. At home, in the classroom or in the office.

It is an amazing mean of transport: small, lightweight, easy to use, with the low power consumption and smart.

Bolt gives its best in short trips from home. Go to the train station, to class, to the gym, to university, to the library...

 

Press & Reviews

You can download the Media Press Kit with hi-res pictures and Press Release.

Covered by: Gizmag, Slash Gear, Inhabitat, Atmel Blog, Ubergizmo, List&Hunt, Geeky Gadgets, TrustedReviews, Gamen Gadgets, InterestingEngineering, GadgetShow of Channel5, Upscout, Gadgetify, HiConsumption, TecMundo (Brazil), GadgetBlog (Russia), Infuture (Russia) MetroTV (Indonesia), Ennori (Japan), CDR (CZ), Aruco (France), Wired, Corriere della Sera, HDBlog, Eco di Bergamo, BergamoNews, Elektroda, ElectricSb, TrendHunter, ...

Bolt is the smart skateboard you’ve always wanted
- Atmel Blog
The Bolt is the smallest and lightest electric skateboard in the world for a green commute
– Inhabitat
Bolt Electric Skateboard Is A Breakthrough 
– Ubergizmo
Bolt electric skateboard is smallest, lightest of its kind
– Slash Gear

Features

Save Time and Money

 

Bolt lets you save time on your daily commute and free more for your favorite activities. More time in the day to do what you love.

Use Bolt for the short movement in the city instead of your car and save money on fuel.

 

 

Fast

It has a top speed of 29km/h (18 mph) and it's just as fast as a bicycle!

 

It has a range of about 12km (7.5miles), more than what you need for the short daily commute in the city.

Portable

With a size of 60x25x10.5cm (23.5x10x4 inches), it is the smallest electric skateboard in the world and is compact enough to be carried anywhere.

 

 

 

 

Light

And with 4kg (9 lbs) of weight, it is light enough to be carried with no effort on your backpack or by hand when not in use.

Walking is nice but not when you have no time. From now on, no need to get sweat running because you are late. Just enjoy the ride.

And walk only when you feel like, not because you have to.

USB Port

Bolt has a built-in standard USB port that can be used to recharge your devices on the go. Bolt's battery is so powerful that can recharge your iPhone up to 20 times!

 

Technical Specs

Size: 60x25x10cm (23x10x4 inches)

Weight: 4kg (9 pounds)

Power: 2000W, Sensored Motor

Battery: 5000mAh LiPo

Materials: Multiple Ply Wood

Integration: Smartphone App (in Development)

Charging:  From empty to full in about 90 minutes

 

The Story

My name is Lorenzo Cella, I'm a robotic engineering student and a commuter. Every day I take the train to go to university. From home I have to walk to the station, take the train and once there I have to walk to class. I have to do the reverse path back home every noon. I've counted that I spend 1 hour and 30 minutes walking every day, 7km (4.5 miles). I noticed that covering this distance by foot every day, in addition to wasting my time, makes me get home tired and with little desire to do anything else.

I thought of several possible alternatives to move more quickly and with less effort. Some commuters use the bike. But the bike on the train increases the cost of the ticket and not all allow the shipping, also is bulky and easy to steal. After thinking about it I realized that the ideal means of transport would have to be small enough to take with me.

Something like this would be an electric skateboard, but the ones on the market are all modified longboard, long and heavy. It is not what I was looking for.

For this reason I created Bolt: the world's smallest and lightest electric vehicle in the world.

Compact enough to be carried in the classroom, on the train or in the office and light enough to be loaded on the backpack when not in use.

To build the Bolt I got help from my father, a photographer, electronics engineer and drones pilot. Over the years, we have made several tech projects together and gained experience in the field of brushless motors, lithium-ion battery, radio technology. For example, we made an electric bike, some drones and a lot of tech equipment for photography. Usually, I take care of the software and design and him of electronics and mechanics.

After a year of testing and prototyping, we built the final version from the ground up. All you see is a single board that contains all the electronics and the power to take you to 29km/h (18mph). All the technology is hidden from sight.

 

You Helped Us Build it

We wanted to make Bolt and you helped us, we produced and shipped to all the people who ordered. We are now working full-time on it and producing a lot of this penny-sized electric skateboard.

Thank you.

See Bolt in Action

 

About Bolt Motion

We have experience in building technological projects.

Bolt Motion is born to create better transportation and make people move with more freedom.

We want to develop products and solutions to fill the void in the world of moving things.

Innovation, technology for a Better World.

 

 

FAQ

Where are the battery and the motor?
The battery and electronics are embedded in the wooden body. The motor is located under the deck, mounted on the rear truck.
How is Bolt controlled?
Bolt is controlled by a small handheld remote controller. Push the joystick forward to gain speed and backward to brake.
Can I change the battery by myself?
No, at the moment the user cannot change the battery, we can do that. As a stretch goal, we want to introduce Interchangeable Battery to increase range even more.
Is Bolt suitable for kids?
Yes, it is, usually kids are very quick learning how to ride Bolt. Anyway, it is not dangerous per se, but they should ride it under parents control.
Is Bolt suitable for adults? Is it easy to ride?
Absolutely, adults are often very scared about skateboards. But just think that you're able to ride a bike that has only 2 wheels, Bolt has 4 and is really stable on the ground. It takes less than 5 minutes to learn how to ride Bolt. 
How long should I wait for a complete recharge?
A complete recharge takes about 90 minutes, but in 60 minutes you have an 80% charge.
Is Bolt water resistant?
We cannot assure Bolt is waterproof but it should resist under light rain. 
I want a Bolt, what I should do? 
You can order one on Boltmotion.com
 

Risks & Challenges

We are confident we can produce the Bolt. There are ongoing risks associated with product development that could prevent us from delivering the product as planned, but we have worked hard in the design phase to mitigate them. We will closely manage these risks until the final product is manufactured, tested and delivered to you. 

First, there is always a risk of delay caused by unforeseen design or development issues. We will be optimizing the design to improve product performance and manufacturability, and while those modifications are accounted for in the schedule they could still introduce delays. 

Additionally, the construction of Bolt relies on an assembly of parts coming from multiple supply chains. Unforeseen delays in any of these component supply-chains might cause a delay to the final assembly of the finished boards.  

Also, while we have budgeted for the final phase of the product development process, significant cost overruns could cause delays or impact our ability to deliver the final product as specified. We will manage costs closely, and multi-source as many components as possible to ensure that we do not run into a situation where expenses climb substantially over budget.

story:
Hello.

We are Texas Guadaloop, a team of engineers, computer scientists, and business students from Austin, who are building the first working Hyperloop transportation vehicle using air bearing technology.

What's the Hyperloop?

In 2013, Elon Musk released a white paper discussing a new mode of transportation called the Hyperloop that would transport people and cargo from major city to major city in 20-30 minutes. By levitating a pod on a bed of air and propelling it through a partially evacuated tube, speeds of up to 700mph can be reached. It's as fast as a plane, but still as convenient to ride as a train.

(Guadaloop City: Poster Option 1)

This is crazy. Could this really work?

There is no doubt a Hyperloop will be built. Hyperloop One conducted their first full-scale test in vacuum last week, and several other Hyperloop companies have raised millions to build transport systems in South Korea, Dubai, and Europe.

In 2015, SpaceX announced an international competition for student teams to design and build a working prototype pod to compete on a one-mile test track that SpaceX has built at their HQ in Hawthorne. The first few teams hit the track in January, and now Texas Guadaloop is one of 22 teams left competing on the track this August. Our team has worked tirelessly these past two years to create a cost-effective and energy-efficient solution to make the Hyperloop a reality.

 

Air Bearings.

Elon's original idea for the Hyperloop was to use air-bearings to levitate in a frictionless environment. Imagine an air hockey table, but where air comes out of the puck instead of the table. Since the SpaceX-Hyperloop competition was announced, there has been no team or company to test the viability of air bearings at high speeds.

(Meet Furiosa - our pod ) 

We are one of the first teams in the world who are building an air bearing pod and are preparing to test it at high velocities on the SpaceX-Hyperloop test track. The implications for transportation fueled off of air are groundbreaking and have the power to disrupt the transportation industry. 

Why not MagLev?

MagLev utilizes magnets to levitate the pod whereas air-bearings utilize pressurized air. MagLev is a proven technology and has no doubt been tested thoroughly,  but the advantages of utilizing air-bearings are enormous. Air-bearings do not need to hit a specific speed to levitate and they do not exhibit drag. This means we could use air bearings for shorter distances and destinations without costly expenditures of MagLev. There is a reason why MagLev trains haven't popped up in America. Imagine putting them in a more expensive vacuum tube.

Will the Hyperloop really become the world's next major mode of transportation?

The prototype we are building for the Hyperloop can support thousands of pounds at a fraction of cost and energy. Building a full-scale system has the potential to make goods and supplies flow more efficiently than current methods. Additional highways and cars won't solve traffic problems, but a Hyperloop can let you work in one city and live in another. Guadaloop wants to be the team to bring Hyperloop to Texas. 

(Proposed Guadaloop Texas Hyperloop Route) 

Long-term vision

The Texas triangle contains the largest number of super commuters in the U.S. Our dream is to build the Hyperloop in Texas, connecting major growth cities such as Austin, Dallas, and Houston.

 

Will you join us and make this happen? #LetsBuildThisShit

After presenting in front of SpaceX engineers at Design Weekend in January 2016, our team was not selected to build a pod for Competition Weekend I last January. But we had full faith in our design, and decided to build a pod anyways. Fast forward a year later, and SpaceX chose us to compete at Competition Weekend II this August. We're a team of graduate and undergraduate students with a never quit attitude, and we are going to scrap our way to the finish line no matter what. Will you help us get there?

story:
My name is Clarke Waldron. I have always considered myself an inventor since about 1963. I have worked as a dealership mechanic and electrical specialist for 25 years. I attended ITT Technical Institute and earned an Associate degree in Computer-Aided Drafting & Design. I also attended Control Data Institute and graduated with honors in their Computer Technology course.

This first campaign's purpose is to finance the initial act of obtaining a patent of my Linear Generator. It is the first step towards my ultimate goal of building a prototype electric car powered by a linear generator; which, with its documentation and the Limited Liability Company (LLC) itself, will be sold to a motor vehicle manufacturer.


Specifically, this first campaign's goal is to perform a patent search regarding my invention, the Linear Generator. I have been given an estimate of $500 by my patent attorney.  (This figure is $500 less than another patent attorney firm quoted me.)

If contributions exceed this goal, the funds will be set aside for the next step in this endeavor: filing the Provisional Patent so that my invention can be labeled as "Patent Pending".  This step is advised as I may be applying for foreign patents in addition to the U.S. patent.

If the campaign goal is not reached, the funds will be set aside to launch a larger campaign to raise the remaining amount to perform the patent search. It is imperative that the patent is underway before taking another step; because every time I have discussed my invention with potential investors, their first question is whether I have a patent. Apparently, it validates the invention as legitimate and seriously pursued to have a patent. Also, a patent is necessary in the business world as protection.

One might ask, “Hasn't the goal of having electric cars been reached?” One could have also asked in 1904, “Henry Ford has applied the technology of the assembly line to building motor cars; why should anyone else bother to do the same?”

Yes, there are electric cars for sale or lease; however, none of them combine full-size car performance (comparable to an Audi, BMW, Mercedes, or Lexus) for less than $71,000 - $105,000. I am referring to the highly-accoladed Tesla Model S sedan. Other battery electric cars are compact and sub-compact size with ranges of 75 to 82 miles on a full charge, costing up to $35,000; not at all suitable for a family vacation trip.

I believe that people would be delighted to have an electric car that is full-sized, has the performance of other luxury brands (including a range of over 265 miles), and costs what a middle-class citizen can afford. The Ensign Linear Generator is the key ingredient to this recipe.

It is a large project but I intend to see it through to the end, making available a less-costly alternative to those who desire an electric car with all its environmental friendliness.

After this campaign, there will be further campaigns and other efforts to take the next steps.  First is this campaign to have the patent search done.  Then the Provisional Patent will be filed.  Next will be the application for the utility patent and the lawyers' involvement to confer with the Patent Office as claims are likely to be challenged and defended.  Finally, there will be an issue fee, for the achieved Patent.  All total, the endeavor to obtain the patent will total $8,000.  (The competing attorney quoted me $12,000 - $20,000.) 

My email address is: ensign.linear.generator(at)gmail.com.

(I have removed the video below as I have been made aware that publishing publicly critical information about my invention before applying for the Provisional Patent is not allowed.  Sorry for the disappointment. - 04 March 2014)

story:
Short Summary

It's time to upgrade our infrastructure at Comfort & Joy and that means a storage container that is delivered to the playa and picked up every year and stored for us. The container will be larger than our current storage facility and will:

  • Help avoid burning out key volunteers and save dozens of hours of time every year
  • Reduce gas costs to and from Gerlach
  • Make it much easier during build and tear down weeks on the playa

Last year, the storage situation created lots of drama and burn out. Let's fix this problem once and for all!

What We Need & What You Get

We simply need money. We've done the research and have found a company who will sell us the container and deliver and pick it up for us:

We need about $6,000 total this year - some will come from our fundraisers.

This campaign is simply for people in our community who are blessed enough to have cash to donate - no gimmicks, no cheap chatchkis, no rewards - except for feeling the satisfaction that you can help out and do your part by clicking donate!

The Impact

We'll save over 20 hours of drive time and multiple trips to Gerlach, plus hundreds of dollars in gas and the stress on our volunteers. 

 

And that’s all there is to it.

Reduce gas costs to and from Gerlach
Make it much easier during build and tear down weeks on the playa

Last year, the storage situation created lots of drama and burn out. Let's fix this problem once and for all!


What We Need & What You Get
We simply need money. We've done the research and have found a company who will sell us the container and deliver and pick it up for us:
We need about $6,000 total this year - some will come from our fundraisers.
This campaign is simply for people in our community who are blessed enough to have cash to donate - no gimmicks, no cheap chatchkis, no rewards - except for feeling the satisfaction that you can help out and do your part by clicking donate!


The Impact
We'll save over 20 hours of drive time and multiple trips to Gerlach, plus hundreds of dollars in gas and the stress on our volunteers. 
 


And that’s all there is to it.

story:
*Updates Posted Below

IF YOU SKATEBOARD............And Drive

I have created a solution to storing your skateboards in the trunk of your car that is simple and will save space for everything else.
 
  • Rack will also double as a good way to display the graphics on your boards.
  • The rack will hold 2 Complete Skateboards. Also leaving you storage in the back to hold your skateboard tools, hardware, etc.
  • Will be able to fit any size trunk space that you may have.
  • Will come in various color options when complete.
  • There will be rubber grips on the bottom to keep from sliding all over the place. (even though it's not needed, but just in case)
  • Will be made from metal and from America!!!!

Why?

If you have the same issue as I do with my boards. Skateboards take up a lot of space in my trunk.
Other than just throwing them in your trunk without a care, the only way to put them in there is on their backs. Hogging up space. Otherwise they will end up rolling all over the place unsecure.
Leaves me with less room in the trunk to store everything else that needs to go in there.
 
This is A solution. Keep your boards secure and looking nice while freeing up space.
 

Would YOU Like One?!!!!!!

YES?!

If, so. Preorder yours now before it's to late and get it first by clicking on one of the Perks on the right side.
 
You can also do me a huge favor and help me out by donating as well as sharing this with as many people as you can. Spread the word.
 
Prices for each rack are yet to be determined. But should retail for about $40 once completed and ready for orders.
 
 ***ANY AND ALL DONATIONS ARE GREATLY APPRECIATED!!****

I need to raise ATLEAST $1000.00 to START production on any orders

All donations will go toward creating the first batch of racks for distribution.
            Materials and packaging

 

***You can also help me out by spreading the word to your fellow skateboarders. As well as by hitting the Facebook and Twitter LIKE buttons above***

 

Updates

- First protoype has been created. Minor adjustments to be made. Works Great.

- Design adjustments fixed

- New design created. Will now be a simple assembly so that you can collapse the rack when needed, rather than it being one large piece of metal. Made easier for packaging and shipping as well.

- New design should be finished next week.

- Package Design created. Is in need of graphics.

- Rename for product. Needed simplified name for logo and packaging graphics. New name BACK RACK.

*If anyone has a better name for it, let me know

-  New Design has been cut and bent. Just need to add the hardware needed for it, assemble it, and get it powdercoated for final look.

-  2nd Prototype created. Just needs to be powder coated next. Works great. Check out some photos that I've added.

 

 - Newly edited design that will most likely be the final. Fixed up some measurments and edited some things to make the rack easier for use.

 

 

 
 - Design for a 1 board BackRack created and will be a second option

story:
The 8th Annual Holiday Drive will once again benefit returning soldiers and the Milwaukee Homeless Veterans Initiative (MHVI). It is our goal to collect basic household items, from cookware to personal hygiene products to create 250 packaged home starter kits to support veterans and their families. With your commitment, we can help the men and women who have served our country. 

Since 2007, Mayor Tom Barrett has held an annual Holiday Drive for servicemen and women. City of Milwaukee employees, community partners, businesses and residents have risen to the challenge and collected thousands of toiletries, snacks, goodies and more to help bring a little holiday cheer to those who have sacrificed for our country.

The drive began as a way for Mayor Barrett and the City of Milwaukee to share their gratitude with Wisconsin troops who were far away from their homes during the holidays. More than 2,000 goodie-filled boxes were shipped to Wisconsin troops serving our country overseas in places like Iraq, Afghanistan and Kosovo.

In 2013, the Holiday Drive took on a new beneficiary: our veterans. With more and more troops returning home from overseas service every month, Mayor Barrett and County Executive Chris Abele formed a partnership to bring awareness to and address the struggles of veterans who face homelessness or difficulties with stable housing. In partnering with County Executive Abele, the Holiday Drive went county-wide, and with the help of the community, 500 complete home starter kits were created for the Milwaukee Homeless Veterans Initiative, enough to support hundreds of veterans and their families in the greater Milwaukee area.

Many community businesses and organizations support this effort annually, including the Brewers Community Foundation, Lamar Advertising Company and Walgreens.

We are grateful for all support and donations, but we ask that citizens donate only the items listed below. Items must be unopened and individually packaged. If you have items you would like to donate that are NOT listed below, such as furniture or appliances, please contact the Milwaukee Homeless Veterans Initiative  to see if they accept those items. 

 

Toothpaste

4 Plates / 4 Cups / 4 Bowls

Dental Floss

6 Spoons / 6 Knives / 6 Forks

Razors (3 or more)

Spatula

Shaving Cream

Peeler

Deodorant

Cleaning Sponges/ Scrub Pads

Bar of Soap

Dish Soap

Shampoo

Dish Towel

Conditioner

Steak or Paring Knife

Hand Cream

Cutting Board

Comb

Cheese Grater

Mouthwash

Colander

Panty Liners

Pizza Cutter

Diapers

Hot Pads

Tampons

Salt

Maxi Pads

Pepper

Toilet Paper rolls

Foil

Baby Wipes

Plastic Wrap

2 Bath Towels / 2 Hand Towels

Baggies

2 Wash Cloths

Basic Tupperware

Shower Curtain Liner

Can Opener

Set of Shower Curtain Rings

Toiletry Bag

story:
Summary (Español)

We're students at Singularity University in NASA Research Park working on technology projects to impact the life of billions of people. 

We need to get a car (as a final step) so we can complete the validation of the product by installing the kit, some batteries, hobbyst electronics and tools.

It's an innovative idea that allows small front wheel drive cars to join the hybrid power revolution in any country around the world, without messing with the engine.

Making the bridge between developing countries cheap cars and affordable hybrids.

What We Need & What You Get

It's simple, we need a car and accesories to prove our concept! We've already bought two 10kw engines and controllers, far over our total budget, and they're rushing to come here!

Our idea is do the following:

Using the latest technologies in electrical engines, advanced electronics and a smart approach for seamless integration with your car’s standard features, to enjoy immediate benefits:

  • Improved fuel consumption and autonomy: More than 30% fuel savings in urban cycle.
  • Clean Air: More than 35% improvement in CO2 emissions.
  • Affordable: Pays itself before first year of usage in most scenarios.
  • Easy installation with no mechanical changes to your car’s engine. Completely reversible.
  • Four Wheel Drive: Dynamic mode for reduced fuel consumption + Lock mode for difficult terrain situations.
  • Cruise Control: Improve road performance with intelligent modes leveraging hybrid advantage to improve fuel performance.
  • Compatible with NCG conversions.
  • Minimum maintenance cycle.
  • Smartphone dashboard: Add an onboard computer to your car.
  • Online monitoring and upgrading.

The Impact

    By running real test in an affordable car, we can prove that our regenerative hybrid kit can fit any FWD car and pass the needed processes so we can go big scale (maybe an other Indiegogo campaign) and offer it for everyone worldwide. 
    • Light weight Regenerative battery.
    • A 30% average fuel efficiency improvement.
    • $1,499 MSRP 

      Other Ways You Can Help

      If you have a car you want to donate (or lend) for this project, we are really happy to talk. 

      Mechanics and handy-people are always welcome, you can join us in our process adapting the system to the car and having a lot of fun.

      Spreading the news is always helpful.


      En Español

      Somos estudiantes de la Singularity University en NASA Research Park y estamos trabajando en proyectos para mejorar la vida de mil millones de personas o más.

      Nuestra idea es poder crear un kit para la conversión sencilla de automóviles convencionales en híbridos, sin modificar el motor original, para la mayoría de los modelos económicos con tracción delantera ofrecidos en países en desarrollo.

      Para validar nuestro prototypo necesitamos comprar un auto e instalarle el kit, baterias, y controladores electrónicos.

      Tendiendo un puente entre autos económicos e híbridos accesibles

      Qué Necesitamos, Qué Ofrecemos

      Es simple! Necesitamos un auto y accesorios para probar el concepto! Ya compramos dos motores de 10kw y sus controladores (son unos 13 caballos más por rueda) estamos muy pero muy pasados de presupuesto y corriendo para lograrlo!


      El producto final debería usar las últimas tecnologías en motores eléctricos, electrónica avanzada y un enfoque inteligente para una integración transparente con las características actuales de tu auto, sumando estos beneficios inmediatos:

      • Consumo y autonomía mejorados: Más de 30% de ahorro de combustible en el ciclo urbano.

      • Aire limpio: Mejora del 35% o más en emisiones de CO2.

      • Accesible: Debería pagarse con el ahorro en la mayoría de los casos.

      • Instalación sencilla sin cambios mecánicos al motor de tu auto. Completamente reversible.

      • Tracción en las cuatro ruedas: Con un modo dinámico para ahorro de combustible, y un modo fijo para emergencias en terrenos difíciles.

      • Control de Crucero: Mejora el rendimiento en ruta, con un modo inteligente y utiliza los motores eléctricos en caso de desniveles.

      • Compatible con autos convertidos a Gas (CNG, CNV, GNC, GLP)

      • Mínimo ciclo de mantenimiento.

      • Tablero de comando para teléfonos inteligentes: Agrega capacidades de computadora de abordo a automóviles económicos.

      • Monitoreo y actualizaciones online.

      El Impacto

      Corriendo las pruebas en un auto económico, podemos probar que nuestro kit hibrido regenerativo puede ser instalado en cualquier auto de tracción delantera y atravesar los procesos necesarios para lograr gran escala (tal vez otra campaña en IndieGoGo...) y ofrecerlo para todos a nivel mundial.

      • Ligero y trabajando de manera regenerativa con las baterías.

      • Ahorro promedio del 30% en consumos.

      • Precio de venta en dólares sugerido $1,499

      Otras maneras de ayudar

      Si eres mecánico o sabes trabajar con herramientas, y vives cerca de San Francisco, estás invitado a acompañarnos y divertirte mucho!

      Difundir la noticia siempre es útil!

Mínimo ciclo de mantenimiento.

Tablero de comando para teléfonos inteligentes: Agrega capacidades de computadora de abordo a automóviles económicos.
Monitoreo y actualizaciones online.

Corriendo las pruebas en un auto económico, podemos probar que nuestro kit hibrido regenerativo puede ser instalado en cualquier auto de tracción delantera y atravesar los procesos necesarios para lograr gran escala (tal vez otra campaña en IndieGoGo...) y ofrecerlo para todos a nivel mundial.

Ligero y trabajando de manera regenerativa con las baterías.
Ahorro promedio del 30% en consumos.
Precio de venta en dólares sugerido $1,499

Si eres mecánico o sabes trabajar con herramientas, y vives cerca de San Francisco, estás invitado a acompañarnos y divertirte mucho!

story:
ORDER NOW ON

RIDECARBO.COM

 

 

What makes CARBO really worth the hype?

The frame is made of Carbon Fiber, making it both lightweight yet incredibly solid. That’s right; CARBO is the perfect eco-friendly transport alternative for professionals living in urban areas.

 

 

 

All components are quick release,  making it easier than ever to remove replace and upgrade

With its experience in design, manufacturing and after-sales service, the CARBO team

is aware of the industry flaws and is committed to IMPROVE, SOLVE AND INNOVATE.

Unlike other e-bikes CARBO's components are carefully engineered for an easy upgrade & installing replacement parts. An electric bike ideal for urban travel or outings. 

CARBO's electric components can be disassembled in minutes & require no technical knowledge.

 

BELT AND CHAIN OPTIONS AVAILABLE

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

CARBO is fully adjustable to your height, simply adjust your seat post and your stem and ride in perfect comfort. CARBO also comes with a rack, fenders, and a front and rear light. 

 
At CARBO convenience practicality and efficiency is a priority.
CARBO's rear light can be directly connected to your USB seat post.
Unlike other e-bikes, it's easily removable and replaceable. No more going through
cables and circuits for simple tasks. Never run out of charge with CARBO.

 

Traveling with a bike can be a hassle. We have come up with the perfect solution.

The CARBO bag fits perfectly into your urban life.

The CARBO bag is equipped with four wheels and pockets for your valuables, and what's better, it all fits in a small compact messenger backpack for easy carrying. 

 

 

We chose the best features to guarantee you a premium experience.

 

FEATURES

 

 

Carbon Frame

  • Japanese Toray carbon fiber
  • Super compact folding for easy storage
  • Ultra lightweight
 

 

Hub Motor

  • 250W Powerful Bafang brushless motor
  • 350W available (upgrade)
  • High torque and uphill efficiency
  • Custom speed & torque sensor

 


 

Smart LED screen

  • Battery, Speed & Distance monitoring
  • 0-4 level of pedal assist
  • Bluetooth connectivity
  • Smartphone SMS & GPS integration

 

Seat Post battery

  • Custom ergonomic design (Patent pending)
  • Premium Lithium-ion cells (LG/Samsung/Panasonic)
  • Built-in USB charging port

 

Disc Brakes

  • Tektro mechanical disc brakes
  • Strong braking power
  • Hydraulic brakes available (upgrade)

 

7-Speed Shimano cassette

For the CARBO S

  • Shimano Altus derailleur
  • Shimano M310 trigger shifter

 


 

Carbon belt drive 

For the CARBO X

  • Maintenance-free
  • Strong and smooth power transfer
  • Quiet ride

 

Schwalbe tires 

  • Comfort, long life,
  • Air suspension built-in
  • Excellent road grip
  • Puncture resistance 


 

 

Compact folding frame

  • Easy storage & handling
  • Custom carrying bag available


 

Want to sweeten your already awesome ride?

 

Check out our add-ons

  

 

  

  

  

     

  

     

 

Compact enough to store under your desk.

 

It's also fun to roll it

 

CARBO's battery is located in the seat post for ideal weight distribution; It also makes it easily removable for indoor storage or charging. 

 

1) Throttle not available in EU, unless user has a scooter license or insurance

2) Maximum speed is limited to 25 km/h in EU

 

PEDAL ASSIST OR THROTTLE? You can have it both ways. 

*Please note that our team is experienced in manufacturing and shipping e-bikes. And are therefore aware of the different laws regarding e-bike regulations. We will be certifying and shipping our CARBOs according to each country's own regulation. 

*We will send you a form throughout the campaign so you can specify whether you would like to have a throttle or not. 

CARBO was engineered to be used in both electric and nonelectric mode, resulting in a highly efficient and comfortable ride.

The idea is to enhance your commute experience and enable you to use an e-bike in situations you couldn't before. Let's face it no one likes arriving to work sweaty, but feel free to break a sweat on your way back home. 

Let CARBO become your ultimate urban companion. Unlike other ebikes you will enjoy your ride just as much, 

 

 

IT'S MORE THAN JUST A BIKE; IT'S A LIFESTYLE

 

 

"We are cycling enthusiasts and electric bike passionates that have one goal in mind:

Build the lightest, most efficient electric bike - carefully engineered for easy use and durability."

 

CARBO Manufacturing and Testing: 

 

A MESSAGE FROM THE TEAM:

 OUR PROMISE TO YOU WAS TO MAKE CARBO AFFORDABLE AND WE DID :)

We thank everyone for their support, and we can't wait to see CARBO internationally. 

Frequently Asked Questions

What is the CARBO's maximum speed? The CARBO e-bike has a maximum speed of 32 km/h (20 mph). The European model is however limited to 25 km/h (15 mph)
What's the difference between a speed sensor and a torque sensor? On an electric bike, speed sensors operate by telling the motor when to activate and when to stop. Speed sensors are commonly found on older generation ebikes because they are more affordable and simple in terms of technology. Torque sensor however measure the amount of force that is put on the crank, and allows for a more precise response from the motor when the rider pedals, which translates into a smoother acceleration and intuitive pedaling assistance. Torque sensors are generally much more expansive compared to speed sensors, but the quality of the ride is also much better.
Terms of service Please Click here to refer to our "Terms" and terms of service.
What kind of warranty is offered? A comprehensive 2-year international warranty is offered on CARBO bikes and batteries against manufacturing defects. The warranty however does not apply to normal wear and tear components such as tires, brake pads, chain etc... 
How do I get a refund? Please refers to Indiegogo's policy here.
Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT?
The backer is responsible for these costs. Please check your country's import duties/VAT/GST before ordering your CARBO, as the sales taxes vary internationally.

 

 


For any additional questions, contact us at contactus@ridecarbo.com 

For any press inquiry, please contact us at partners@ridecarbo.com

Battery, Speed & Distance monitoring
0-4 level of pedal assist
Bluetooth connectivity
Smartphone SMS & GPS integration







 
Seat Post battery

Custom ergonomic design (Patent pending)
Premium Lithium-ion cells (LG/Samsung/Panasonic)
Built-in USB charging port







 
Disc Brakes

Tektro mechanical disc brakes
Strong braking power
Hydraulic brakes available (upgrade)







 
7-Speed Shimano cassette
For the CARBO S

Shimano Altus derailleur
Shimano M310 trigger shifter

 






 
Carbon belt drive 
For the CARBO X

Maintenance-free
Strong and smooth power transfer
Quiet ride







 
Schwalbe tires 

Comfort, long life,
Air suspension built-in
Excellent road grip
Puncture resistance 



 


 
Compact folding frame

Easy storage & handling
Custom carrying bag available



 
Want to sweeten your already awesome ride? Check out our add-ons                       Compact enough to store under your desk.
 It's also fun to roll it CARBO's battery is located in the seat post for ideal weight distribution; It also makes it easily removable for indoor storage or charging.  1) Throttle not available in EU, unless user has a scooter license or insurance2) Maximum speed is limited to 25 km/h in EU PEDAL ASSIST OR THROTTLE? You can have it both ways. *Please note that our team is experienced in manufacturing and shipping e-bikes. And are therefore aware of the different laws regarding e-bike regulations. We will be certifying and shipping our CARBOs according to each country's own regulation. *We will send you a form throughout the campaign so you can specify whether you would like to have a throttle or not. CARBO was engineered to be used in both electric and nonelectric mode, resulting in a highly efficient and comfortable ride.The idea is to enhance your commute experience and enable you to use an e-bike in situations you couldn't before. Let's face it no one likes arriving to work sweaty, but feel free to break a sweat on your way back home. Let CARBO become your ultimate urban companion. Unlike other ebikes you will enjoy your ride just as much,   IT'S MORE THAN JUST A BIKE; IT'S A LIFESTYLE  "We are cycling enthusiasts and electric bike passionates that have one goal in mind:Build the lightest, most efficient electric bike - carefully engineered for easy use and durability." CARBO Manufacturing and Testing:  A MESSAGE FROM THE TEAM: OUR PROMISE TO YOU WAS TO MAKE CARBO AFFORDABLE AND WE DID :)We thank everyone for their support, and we can't wait to see CARBO internationally. Frequently Asked Questions What is the CARBO's maximum speed? The CARBO e-bike has a maximum speed of 32 km/h (20 mph). The European model is however limited to 25 km/h (15 mph) What's the difference between a speed sensor and a torque sensor? On an electric bike, speed sensors operate by telling the motor when to activate and when to stop. Speed sensors are commonly found on older generation ebikes because they are more affordable and simple in terms of technology. Torque sensor however measure the amount of force that is put on the crank, and allows for a more precise response from the motor when the rider pedals, which translates into a smoother acceleration and intuitive pedaling assistance. Torque sensors are generally much more expansive compared to speed sensors, but the quality of the ride is also much better. Terms of service Please Click here to refer to our "Terms" and terms of service. What kind of warranty is offered? A comprehensive 2-year international warranty is offered on CARBO bikes and batteries against manufacturing defects. The warranty however does not apply to normal wear and tear components such as tires, brake pads, chain etc...  How do I get a refund? Please refers to Indiegogo's policy here. Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT?The backer is responsible for these costs. Please check your country's import duties/VAT/GST before ordering your CARBO, as the sales taxes vary internationally.   
For any additional questions, contact us at contactus@ridecarbo.com 
For any press inquiry, please contact us at partners@ridecarbo.com

story:
You can come try Thor ebike for yourself!

We are now welcoming all visitors who wish to try Thor ebike (any many more) at our site in Woking, Surrey.  Simply email us on thor@emovement.co.uk and we will get you booked in!

Assembled Delivery in UK

We will offer assembled delivery* within UK at NO extra charge (Usually £179). All other shipping will be done in packed boxes. 

Lowest Price Offered

 Our perks offer the lowest Indiegogo exclusive prices for Thor starting from £1100; after end of our campaign, the prices will return to standard RPR £2400 & £2600. So get your perks now for a whopping 54% discount on Thor perks, which comes with FREE accessories (worth £321); saving you a total of £1621.

All queries answered

We will keep you in contact about your orders and promptly solve your questions or queries, simply email us on thor@emovement.co.uk, we will get back to you within 24 hours. Alternatively message us on facebook at facebook.com/emovementofficial for a live chat.

*All orders shipped; assembled delivery when available.
For more information visit click here (opens in new tab).


It took us nearly two years with the help of local cyclists to develop our Carbon Smart (carbon free) Thor, an all weather & multi-terrain e-bike with Bafang Drive System powered by Samsung 10.4Ah battery (built in - non removable), giving you mileage of 50miles/80km on electric (eco mode) and up to 80miles/128km assisted (half pedalling, half motor).



Thor is no ordinary ebike with basic mechanism, the high tech specifications makes Thor unique and fun to ride, whether on road or off road. As Thor comes equipped with Rapid Suspension Technology's (RST) hydraulic suspension along with high performance Logan Hydraulic Brakes and Maxxis Forekaster tyres; all of it letting you ride on dry, wet or loose ground while giving you complete control.



Thor is only built to look sleek like a simple bike but there is nothing simple about Thor, it's fully packed with features, making it extremely pleasurable yet simple to ride. Fun thing, it only weighs 22kg/48lbs despite it being Carbon Smart (with battery!).

Thor has a 17 inch frame with 27.5inch wheels - tested by riders of heights 5’3” to 6’2”.



To abide by the Rules and Regulations in UK & Europe, we offer Thor Standard with 250W Bafang motor with speed limited to 15.5mph/25km/h.


A 350W Bafang Motor to enjoy without any limits & unleash the power!



*Please check your local country’s rules and guidances.



We have made Thor and Thor Ultra in 4 eye catching matte colours, for you to choose your style!



With Thor's Indiegogo exclusive sale, you get loads of accessories and ad-ons worth £321 at no extra cost. Thats a £1521 saving on your Thor ebike!


*Please note, some accessories sent might be different to the pictures, however of same type and quality.


Free stuff not enough? Don't worry at the end of your checkout, you will be able to choose your ad-ons, just choose what interests you and it will be delivered with your ebike free of charge.

Don’t forget to check out our Luxury Padded Leather Gloves! Made from super soft & high quality Nappa Leather (the same high quality leather used to make luxury car seats), with protective padding to provide optimum shielding against fall damage. Get yours for only £50!


 


See how Thor does compared to other ebikes



We have 250 Thor ebikes ready to be shipped from first week of May 2021. So the sooner you order the sooner you get!

Shipping to UK costs only £69, moreover for our Indiegogo exclusive backers, we will further offer assembled delivery within UK at NO extra charge (Usually extra £179). 

Shipping to Europe costs £150 (€172) & Rest of the world for £250 (both DDU).










E Movement is a family run e-transport business, also one of the very first e-bikes brand in the United Kingdom, founded in 2018 after deep rooted foundational research and detailed knowledge of fulfilment in the consumer market gap. 

We were founded with the ideology of providing people with innovative, easy, and quick transport methods, with optimum affordability and quality. However our primary focus was on sustainability, for which we introduced our Carbon Smart line of e-bikes; all which are Carbon Free, thus making them eco-friendly and in line with UK’s sustainability goals, while also helping residents to cut down their CO2 emissions and carbon footprint.

At E-Movement, we plan to provide exclusiveness, availability, quality, and affordability for all kinds of enthusiasts, because we want people to Move Smart, Move Electric.

Our Inspiration

Rapid developments in the field of electric technology have always been influential for daily transport. We have seen fancy cars and heavy bikes having all the assistance of latest tech-savvy features, but bicycles are the most overlooked type of transport in terms of electric technology, even though a large number of people are engaged with them in their daily lives. Taking this into consideration we wanted to provide people with modern capabilities in simplest forms, thus introducing Thor eBike, the perfect e-bike which took us two years to develop.

Our Team

We consist of a Surrey, England based team, who are trained and qualified to work with e-bikes, knowing all the uses, advantages, and quality grades of electric bikes. All working with the same vision to make e-bike technology more available and affordable for everyone due to their environmental and health benefits.

For more info check us out on www.emovement.co.uk

story:
Who's Talking About Auto Fireman

Review From an Expert in Car Maintenance

An auto mechanic for 49 years, Scotty Kilmer speaks highly of Anto Fireman. He claimed it's a brave new invention for the auto industry. 

Auto Fireman - Terminator of Car Fire

The risk of fire in a modern car, just driving along, is very low. It's like winning a lottery, only in a bad way. This is a low probability event with extremely high consequences. Safety is an important thing that must be taken to account at all times. There're three major circumstances that might cause a car fire.

  1. The fuel tank is breached because a rock or the drive shaft moves over and contact the fuel tank, which causes a fire.
  2.  The fuel line moves over because the engine has shifted over when the car gets involved in a frontal offset impact or an oblique impact. The engine can shift over 12 inches, which may separate the fuel line and cause a fire.
  3. A lot of impacts happened outside the frame rail where the batteries are usually located. As the impact occurs, the acid in the battery catches on fire and eventually catches the entire compartment on fire.

Three situations above are apparently severe. Because cars are dangerous themselves. The combination of dense fuel, incredible heat, electrical energy, immense airflow, and flammable materials makes a car what it is. You're now living through a potential risk faced by drivers worldwide, a risk that we want to help you to evade.

Auto Fireman is a reliable product that is meant to meet all your car extinguishing needs.The product can easily ﬁt inside the engine due to its low dimensions. Furthermore, the car extinguisher is able to properly anchor itself since it is highly magnetic and this coupled with the automatic thermal detection system makes the auto ﬁreman an ideal engine product that will safeguard both yourself and your car in the event of a ﬁre.

Small and Magnetic, Easy for Installation

Auto Fireman is a small equipment with a total weight of 134 grams. It has a diameter of only 7 centimeters and height of 3 centimeters. This design is speciﬁcally meant to ensure that the device is actually able to ﬁt in the engine without any alteration of the car's hood to allow for extra space to accommodate it. Its magnetic nature makes sure that the device cannot fall off when the car is moving fast. It's also paired two magnetic coins and two stickers to hold it in the right place.  

3 Steps to Install Anto Fireman

Step1. Stick the Auto Fireman fire extinguisher on both sides of the motor engine room and ensure the device is even and stable.

Step2.  Wind the thermal line around the combustible areas(such as fuel line or electrical wire).

Step3. Plug the two ends of the thermal line into the connector of both Auto Fireman extinguishers.

Thermal Wire Working as a Conductor   

In order to minimize the damage, the fire needs to be detected as soon as it happens. So the basic function of a car fire extinguisher is one that should be able to respond whenever the temperature gets over-heated. In this theory, Auto Fireman uses thermal technology, an aviation technology adopted for a rocket launch, Let’s see how it works.

Thermal line(2 meters long), as a component of the detector, is designed to be placed around the combustible areas(such as fuel circuit or electrical wiring) and tied with ribbon.

When there is a fire in the motor engine, and the fire gets near the thermal line ( the thermal line will be activated as long as it’s near an open fire or reaches 600℃), it will set fire to the solid propellant inside the red boxes.

Absorb Heat & Suppress Combustion

Redox reaction can take place in this propellant, and generate effective fire-extinguishing haze particles that break through the sealed membrane and pervade the entire engine room. These effective fire-extinguishing haze particles rapidly absorb the heat of the flame, consume a lot of energy and suppress the exothermic reaction among activity genes so as to stop the chain combustion reaction. This fire-extinguishing method combines physical cooling and chemical inhibition.

Put Out Fire Within 30 Seconds

In our every fire extinguishing trial, the fire was put out in less than 30 seconds. The whole process includes the ignition in the engine room, thermal wire triggering the propellant and the fire suppression.   

Environmental Friendly Reaction Product

60% compositions of the extinguishant are gases (most of N2 and CO2, little CO, NO2, O2, and hydrocarbon) and 40% are rigid granules, including MeO, MeCO3, MeHCO3 and few metal carbides. All the stuff in the fire extinguisher reacts together to form compounds that are 100% safe and free of any toxins.

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATION

Patented Technology

Industrial Design Patent

Utility Model Patent

story:
Short Summary

  • One Film maker and a small group of friends.
  • We aim to cycle to Dieppe (France) from Llantwit Major (South Wales) to raise money for 'The VC Gallery' . The VC Gallery is a charity for Veterans and The Community through arts and creative engagement.
  • Your donation will help us raise awareness of PTS and provide vital equipment for the Charity, such as paints & canvases.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are aiming to raise £2500! 10% of the overall target will go to the team for Ferry cost's. 90% will go straight to The VC Gallery.
  • The journey will be documented and made into a short quirky film.
  • This is our first time cycling out of our home town. So we decided to cycle to france. fit or unfit were going to france.
  • If our goal is not reached then we will still go ahead with the charity event.

The Impact

  • Our charity helps people that dont have much support. The donations you give us will give our charity the boost that it needs to keep on helping people in day to day life.
  • We chose to do something so extreme to show our support for this worthwhile charity

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you cant donate, then please help us get the campaign out there! Good deed of the day is done!

Thank you.
story_txt:
Short Summary
One Film maker and a small group of friends.
We aim to cycle to Dieppe (France) from Llantwit Major (South Wales) to raise money for 'The VC Gallery' . The VC Gallery is a charity for Veterans and The Community through arts and creative engagement.
Your donation will help us raise awareness of PTS and provide vital equipment for the Charity, such as paints & canvases.
What We Need & What You Get
We are aiming to raise £2500! 10% of the overall target will go to the team for Ferry cost's. 90% will go straight to The VC Gallery.
The journey will be documented and made into a short quirky film.
This is our first time cycling out of our home town. So we decided to cycle to france. fit or unfit were going to france.
If our goal is not reached then we will still go ahead with the charity event.
The Impact
Our charity helps people that dont have much support. The donations you give us will give our charity the boost that it needs to keep on helping people in day to day life.
We chose to do something so extreme to show our support for this worthwhile charity
Other Ways You Can HelpIf you cant donate, then please help us get the campaign out there! Good deed of the day is done!Thank you.

story:
Just imagine ...

... you are traveling with your family to a place you never go before or an unknown place, when suddenly, for no apparent reason, your car breaks down, or sticking a tire, or runs out of fuel? 

And now, what do you do? You do not know any mechanic, tow, tire-fitter or even know if as a gas station near of you. 

or imagine you are traveling on a country who is not yours, and you need to call for a mechanic, tow, tire fitter or gas station. How you do that if you don't know anyone, or a simple number to call for automotive rescue?

It's a combination that will surely leave you in the road, right ? 

Not if you have the Car Helper.

This situation happens every day, with thousands of people around the world. The person must have signal on the phone but do not know who to call. After all, if you're in an unfamiliar place, you probably will not know who to call for help.

Even worse, if you don't have a automotive insurance?

We want to solve this problem with a simple solution. Offline map application with a off-line catalog of automotive rescuers information. 

No matter where you are, and not matter if you have or not a automotive insurance plan. 

Since you have phone signal, you can call to a automotive rescue by the Car Helper App.

[The images below are the current app that need to be completely rebuilt and implemented new features]



Not Smart Phone???...

Do not have a smartphone? 

No problem, we think we can solve this problem too. 

Imagine that your old Nokia phone, one her grandmother used to today, and does not fall apart at all. 

Yes, we think we can make the Car Helper "run" on it too. 

How? 

Text message! 

But you must be thinking. They do not have GPS and don't execute moderns maps apps, as they can use the Car Helper and find a automotive rescue?

Triangulation :D 

Mobile Operators (at least in Brazil) offer business plans where you can find the approximate location of a particular person from the text message she sent. 

We do not need to know your exact location with triangulation, only its location of "rough" form is enough. 

It goes something like this: 

  1. You send a Text Message for a number to be defined (eg 9990) 
  2. The operator does his magic and discovers his triangulation and send to Car Helper servers your approximate location. 
  3. The Car Helper servers process our location and locate 5 automotive rescuers near of you and sends these 5 phone numbers back to the operator. 
  4. The operator sends the message containing the numbers for your phone. 
  5. You call, ask for help and done: D 
  6. Car Helper helped you. You must now be happy, The people of automotive rescuer is now happy, i am happy, and everybody is happy :D

All of these steps above, hopefully they are done super fast.

And if you have no phone signal or internet? 

Well, we are sincere to you. We do not know how to solve this problem. If you do not have any phone signal or internet, there is nothing we can do. You will have to walk until you find phone signal.  :(

Maybe later we can launch the "Car Helper Pigeon Rescue" ;)

What We Need & What You Get

Your very help ... 

As you may have read above, all this requires technology . A lots of technology. 

All this costs resources. And we have no resources. Even worse, we live in Brazil, where everything costs lots of money. 

But we're creative (my girlfriend and I), we are excited and believe in our idea. We want our idea help people. 

We need computers, rent servers, some programmers to help to code the mobile systems, web and desktop and so on. We need to translate all the system from the most common languages in the world, etc. It's a lot of work.

How Much it will cost to people/users? 

Nothing, applications are be free for smartphones and tablets.  :D

How Much it will cost for the Helpers? 

Only $ 150.00 / year. 

Just do the math. $150 / 365 day = $0,410  a day. 

Very cheap right?

How Moch to sending messages for help? 

We do not know yet, but we believe that will have the same value as a regular text message.

The Impact

We strongly believe that the impact of our idea is very good. 

You don't need be stuck in a insurance plan for know if where you are have a automotive rescuer when you need one.

Our app do this for you for free.

Who has not stood in the road waiting for help, do not imagine how bad it is. You stand there, standing with his family or sometimes alone. It takes hours to pass anyone so you can ask for help. 

We want to reduce this time with the Car Helper.

Take a look 

We have already started the Car Helper, we have developed a basic website and also basic mobile and web applications. 

However they are far from ideal, precisely because we do not have resources to invest in the total development of the Car Helper. 

Feel free to visit the Car Helper. 

We have two domains: 

International: http://www.carhelper.co/ 

The Brazilian one: http://www.carhelper.com.br/ 

There you can also see and download our app for iOS and Android.

They are in Portuguese.

How your money will be spent:

The values are in Real (BRL). In Dollar is about: US$25.085,66 based on value of day 22/05/2014  (R$2.2121 per US$ 1,00)

In Equipment:



Other Ways You Can Help

You may just can’t contribute. It's ok, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help right?

  • Like our Facebook page: www.facebook.com/CarHelperBR
  • Follow us on Twitter: www.twitter.com/CarHelperBR
  • Tell your friends who work with automotive assistance about us and our project


Why you guys don't make a video?

Well, we tried. But honestly, we just don't have this "video" skills ;)

I just don't know how to make a super fun video that convice you. I just know write and write some byte codes :D

We think the idea is good! If you have any doubts, please ask us!

If you want to skype us, feel free: diegowiprich

Here my picture with my Girlfriend :D


P.S.: Sorry for any English errors.

Cup Model:
story_txt:
Just imagine ...... you are traveling with your family to a place you never go before or an unknown place, when suddenly, for no apparent reason, your car breaks down, or sticking a tire, or runs out of fuel? And now, what do you do? You do not know any mechanic, tow, tire-fitter or even know if as a gas station near of you. or imagine you are traveling on a country who is not yours, and you need to call for a mechanic, tow, tire fitter or gas station. How you do that if you don't know anyone, or a simple number to call for automotive rescue?It's a combination that will surely leave you in the road, right ? Not if you have the Car Helper.This situation happens every day, with thousands of people around the world. The person must have signal on the phone but do not know who to call. After all, if you're in an unfamiliar place, you probably will not know who to call for help.Even worse, if you don't have a automotive insurance?We want to solve this problem with a simple solution. Offline map application with a off-line catalog of automotive rescuers information. No matter where you are, and not matter if you have or not a automotive insurance plan. Since you have phone signal, you can call to a automotive rescue by the Car Helper App.[The images below are the current app that need to be completely rebuilt and implemented new features]Not Smart Phone???...Do not have a smartphone? No problem, we think we can solve this problem too. Imagine that your old Nokia phone, one her grandmother used to today, and does not fall apart at all. Yes, we think we can make the Car Helper "run" on it too. How? Text message! But you must be thinking. They do not have GPS and don't execute moderns maps apps, as they can use the Car Helper and find a automotive rescue?Triangulation :D Mobile Operators (at least in Brazil) offer business plans where you can find the approximate location of a particular person from the text message she sent. We do not need to know your exact location with triangulation, only its location of "rough" form is enough. It goes something like this: 

You send a Text Message for a number to be defined (eg 9990) 


The operator does his magic and discovers his triangulation and send to Car Helper servers your approximate location. 


The Car Helper servers process our location and locate 5 automotive rescuers near of you and sends these 5 phone numbers back to the operator. 


The operator sends the message containing the numbers for your phone. 


You call, ask for help and done: D 


Car Helper helped you. You must now be happy, The people of automotive rescuer is now happy, i am happy, and everybody is happy :D

All of these steps above, hopefully they are done super fast.And if you have no phone signal or internet? Well, we are sincere to you. We do not know how to solve this problem. If you do not have any phone signal or internet, there is nothing we can do. You will have to walk until you find phone signal.  :(Maybe later we can launch the "Car Helper Pigeon Rescue" ;)What We Need & What You Get
Your very help ... As you may have read above, all this requires technology . A lots of technology. All this costs resources. And we have no resources. Even worse, we live in Brazil, where everything costs lots of money. But we're creative (my girlfriend and I), we are excited and believe in our idea. We want our idea help people. We need computers, rent servers, some programmers to help to code the mobile systems, web and desktop and so on. We need to translate all the system from the most common languages in the world, etc. It's a lot of work.How Much it will cost to people/users? Nothing, applications are be free for smartphones and tablets.  :DHow Much it will cost for the Helpers? Only $ 150.00 / year. Just do the math. $150 / 365 day = $0,410  a day. Very cheap right?How Moch to sending messages for help? We do not know yet, but we believe that will have the same value as a regular text message.The ImpactWe strongly believe that the impact of our idea is very good. You don't need be stuck in a insurance plan for know if where you are have a automotive rescuer when you need one.Our app do this for you for free.Who has not stood in the road waiting for help, do not imagine how bad it is. You stand there, standing with his family or sometimes alone. It takes hours to pass anyone so you can ask for help. We want to reduce this time with the Car Helper.Take a look We have already started the Car Helper, we have developed a basic website and also basic mobile and web applications. However they are far from ideal, precisely because we do not have resources to invest in the total development of the Car Helper. Feel free to visit the Car Helper. We have two domains: International: http://www.carhelper.co/ The Brazilian one: http://www.carhelper.com.br/ There you can also see and download our app for iOS and Android.They are in Portuguese.How your money will be spent:The values are in Real (BRL). In Dollar is about: US$25.085,66 based on value of day 22/05/2014  (R$2.2121 per US$ 1,00)In Equipment:Other Ways You Can HelpYou may just can’t contribute. It's ok, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help right?
Like our Facebook page: www.facebook.com/CarHelperBR

Follow us on Twitter: www.twitter.com/CarHelperBR

Tell your friends who work with automotive assistance about us and our project
Why you guys don't make a video?Well, we tried. But honestly, we just don't have this "video" skills ;)I just don't know how to make a super fun video that convice you. I just know write and write some byte codes :DWe think the idea is good! If you have any doubts, please ask us!If you want to skype us, feel free: diegowiprichHere my picture with my Girlfriend :DP.S.: Sorry for any English errors.T-shirts Models:Cup Model:

story:
How much weight can the average man carry a certain distance? 30... 40 kgs? Industrial vehicles ussually load starting in 1000 kgs. Why that gap? Why truly helpful devices are not covered by industry?

It is a matter of business and revenue model. Human sized tools are not expensive enough to generate huge profits. Manufacturing industry looks for the big money, not for helping people. In reverse, ecodeck is not intended to speculate but is people assisting oriented.

¿Cuánto peso puede transportar un hombre a cierta distancia? ¿30... 40 kgs? Los vehículos industriales generalmente empiezan con cargas de 1000 kgs. ¿Por qué esta brecha?¿Por qué las soluciones verdaderamente útiles no le interesan a la industria?

Es el mundo de los negocios y el modelo económico. Las herramientas a la medida humana no son lo suficientemente caras como para generar grandes beneficios. Ecodeck propone otro camino.


Ecodeck means the first time ever that skateboard steering system jumps into industrial field. By steping on the side you want to drive the unit efficiently turns that way letting you to use your hands in more useful tasks.

May appear frivolous but a simple approach to the list of benefits will change that evaluation.

Con Ecodeck, el sistema de dirección del skateboard salta por primera vez a la arena de la industria. Así, desplazando tu peso de un lado a otro conseguimos que el vehículo gire de forma eficiente, liberando nuestras manos para actividades más útiles.

Puede parecer frívolo pero un acercamiento a las prestaciones confirmará la conveniencia de la solución.




50% achievements
  • Integration of reverse driving feature
  • Implementation of 4WD version
  • Production of first 5 units
  • Final development of solar unit

100% achievements

  • Licenses and approvals
  • Production of 5 additional units

50% del objetivo
  • Implementación de "marcha atrás"
  • Desarrollo de la versión 4X4
  • Producción de las 5 primeras unidades
  • Desarrollo final del sistema carga solar

100% del objetivos

  • Homologaciones Ministerio Industria
  • Producción de 5 unidades adicionales

Milestones
  • Spring 2013. Ecodeck 1. Prototype
  • Summer 2013. Ecodeck 2. Prototype
  • Spring 2014. Final development
  • Fall 2014. Ecodeck 3 preproduction
  • January 2015. Official presentation
  • Spring 2015. Regular production

 

   Hitos principales
  • Primavera 2013. Prototipo Ecodeck 1
  • Verano 2013. Prototipo Ecodeck 2
  • Primavera 2014. Diseño final
  • Otoño 2014. Preproducción   Ecodeck 3
  • Enero 2015. Presentación oficial
  • Primavera 2015. Producción estable

 
Asset allocation funds
  • 55% Rewarding
  • 25% Production 10 units
  • 10% Licenses & Approvals
  • 10% R + D

 

   Destino de los fondos
  • 55% Recompensas
  • 25% Producción 10 unidades
  • 10% Homologación
  • 10% I + D

 

Our vision

Companies usually stablish their prices based in a maximum that a given market can afford. Our point of view is slightly different. Ecodeck's price has been defined in the minimum that out project and coworkers involved needs to keep on the road. By this way we ensure that a social device offering such perfomances reaches a wider market base.

 

Enfoque

Normalmente las empresas fijan sus precios en base al máximo que un mercado puede pagar. Nuestra forma de ver la cosa varía levemente. El precio de Ecodeck se ha fijado en el mínimo que nos permita la subsistencia de nuestro proyecto y sus trabajadores. De esta forma, lograremos que un dispositivo tan útil socialmente, pueda llegar a una base mucho mayor de usuarios.


We prefer call it gratitude. We like to think that you consider Ecodeck as fascinating as we do and that you realize the fabulous possibilities that an industrial vehicle which do not require fuel even can be powered by solar energy may involve...

Preferimos llamarlo gratitud. Nos gusta pensar que consideras Ecodeck tan fascinante como nosotros y que piensas en las estupendas posibilidades que ofrece un vehículo industrial que no necesita gasolibna y que, incluso, se puede cargar con energía solar.


Luis Calderón Barroso

Bachelor’s degree in Marketing and Sales Management. ESIC. Affiliated to Universidad Miguel Hernández.

Postgraduate MPhil in the History of Art and Architecture studies. History of art Gonville and Caius College
Cambridge University.

Currently working in Event design and deck shaping as free-lancer. Collaborates with several NPOs arround the world.

Formerly involved in: Launch of Vodafone’s 3G technology as Show Director and launch of DVD technology in SW Europe as Project Manager. Our visionary...

___

Licenciado en Gestión Comercial y Marketing por ESIC.

Master en historia del Arte por la Universidad de Cambridge.

Actualmente trabaja como freelance en el diseño de tablas longboard y la organización de eventos socio-culturales.

Previamente involucrado en el lanzamiento de la tecnología 3G de Vodafone o la expansión de la tecnología DVD en Europa Sur Oeste. El visionario...

Jordi Diez Fernández

Licentiated in Arts with honors in sculpture by the UCM University.

All his work pretends to create a definitive bridge between present art and the art of all times.

In achieving all these, Jordi has developed an original sculptoric technique based in the utilization of electrosoldering elements made out of steel.

His background allowed the most fine mastery in manufacturing chassis and all metal pieces.

___

Licenciado con matrícula de honor en Bellas Artes por la Universidad Complutense de Madrid.

Su trabajo persigue la creación de un vínculo entre las tendencias más contemporáneas de la expresión plástica y el arte de todos los tiempos.

Para conseguirlo, Jordi ha desarrollado una original técnica escultórica basada en el uso de elementos de acero electrosoldados.

Su trayectoria le ha permitido adquirir la más profunda maestría en la confeción de chasis o piezas metálicas.

Marcos Arnaldo Gómez

Bachelor in Law
UCM University Madrid.

Bachelor in International Business
UEM University Madrid.

Ceo And Founder in Shakama Grupo Empresarial has been developing electrical vehicle market in Spain since 2000. Truly a eminence in this field.

Pushing hard this project from the very beginning will be managing our commercial department. He has been running the marketing department for the supplier in electrical vehicles of the spanish airport organization. Interesting...

___

Licenciado en Derecho por la Universidad Complutense de Madrid.

Licenciado en Comecio Internacional por la Universidad Europea de Madrid.

Cofundador del Grupo Shakama está involucrado en vehículos eléctricos desde 2000. Una auténtica eminencia en el campo

Colaborando en Ecodeck desde sus comienzos también ha sido responsable de marketing de la empresa proveedora de vehiculos electricos de aeropuertos españoles. Interesante...

story:
With the help of our AWESOME backers, the uCella Indiegogo campaign was completed successfully. We are now focusing on product testing, hardware manufacturing and partnership building with carriers. 

As we move forward, we will keep our backers updated on our latest progress via Indiegogo updates, email newsletters and social media channels. If you want to purchase an uCella, please subscribe via our website www.uCella.com, email us at hello@ucella.com or follow us on Facebook or Twitter to stay in touch.

We plan to rollout uCella in selected cities starting March 2016. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

How does uCella prevent grab & run type of theft activities?

The outer shield is made of strong, durable composite materials with inserts. It is definitely not something porch pirates can easily cut or tear open, grab and run. The metal chassis and framing are also very rigid. In addition, uCella has a smart locking system and cameras to keep your packages safe. Our missions is to create a smart, good looking, easy to use and very protective product. All of its features will work together seamlessly to give you peace of mind.

How would the delivery driver know to use uCella?

 When we designed the product, we talked to many delivery drivers to make sure it is easy for them to operate. Actually, delivery drivers hate to leave packages by your doors step because they are liable for missing packages. During our field test, we placed a small sticker above our device to give drivers instructions on how to operation. They had no problem following them and after couple deliveries, they just go right to it. We will provide the sticker with every uCella device. After couple deliveries, they just go right to uCella and use it for the delivery. Here is the sticker we used during our field test-

 

 

 

How does uCella App help me track and manage my online orders?

When you make online purchases, online retailers send you order confirmation receipts and shipping notification emails with tracking numbers. uCella automatically processes these emails to find the tracking numbers and sync them to your uCella devices as unlocking pass codes. You will be informed about the package status from order to delivery. In addition, all of the orders are kept in one view so you can easily search for previously purchased products and also have easy access to retailers’ customer support information from the app.

What kind of email accounts can I link with my uCella account?

For the initial release, we will support Gmail, Outlook (Hotmail) and Yahoo accounts. In the future, we will add other email providers support based on our user feedbacks.

How can I return online purchased products?

When you want to return online purchased products, you may need to first call or email the online retailer to notify them about the return and request for a return shipment label. Once you have the label, you can use your uCella app to request for a pickup by the designated shipment carrier (USPS and UPS). On the scheduled pickup day, uCella app will remind you to place the pre-labeled return package in the uCella device.

* Depends on the shipment type and carrier policy, some may charge a fee for the pickup.

* The initial release offers pre-labeled package pickup request feature only. We will partner with major online retailers to streamline the return process and also consider to add advanced shipping functionalities in the future.

Who can unlock my uCella?

Only those who have the passcodes. There are two types of passcodes-master passcode and shipment passcode. All uCella users have to setup their own master passcodes to unlock the devices linked to their uCella accounts. Shipment passcodes are tracking numbers provided by online retailers via online order emails or manually entered by uCella users. A used shipment passcode automatically expires to prevent repeat usage.

Can I use uCella as a mailbox?

uCella does have a mail slot on the front panel but technically uCella is not a typical USPS mailbox. We want uCella to be a shared resource for all carriers.

Can multiple users use the same uCella?

Absolutely! Users need to setup their individual uCella App accounts and simply add the device to their accounts. They will be able to manage their own shopping order lists via the mobile App but share the same uCella to handle physical packages. A user can also link multiple uCella devices in the same account. This feature is perfect for vacation home owners.

Is it difficult to install uCella?

Installing uCella is easy. The electronic part of the device runs on battery so no wiring is needed.It will come with a wall mount template to help you install uCella at the right place.

How long will the battery last?

uCella has an embedded battery as well as a removable/rechargeable battery. A fully charged removable battery will last for around 4 weeks. When the power is below 20%, uCella will send you push notifications to remind you that the battery needs to be recharged. While you are charging the removable battery, uCella can stay alive for 2-3 days thanks to the embedded battery.

What is the Warranty?

We provide a one (1) year limited warranty.

How much is shipping and handling?

FREE in the Domestic United States

Where can uCella be shipped?

We will ship only to the US for this crowdfunding campaign. In the future, we will rollout uCella to other countries worldwide.

When will you be shipping uCella?

We expect to ship uCella by March 2016.

Don't miss out on our uCella Cartoon Style :-)

Where can uCella be shipped?
We will ship only to the US for this crowdfunding campaign. In the future, we will rollout uCella to other countries worldwide.
When will you be shipping uCella?
We expect to ship uCella by March 2016.
Don't miss out on our uCella Cartoon Style :-)

story:
Short Summary

Hi, I am an indie game developer.
I have already made a 2D online game where you can design your own vehicles:

There are 12 options of materials to be used in vehicle creation: Frames, Wheels, Engines, Shock absorbers, Chains, Angle locks, Angle shocks, Pneumatic shocks, Actuators, Wings, Turbines, Point settings

You can try the game here: www.dreamcarracing.com

I am now developing the 3D version of the game.
(Platforms: PC, Mac, Linux)


What is the money for?

I'm the only developer and I devote all my time to the game.
So I need money to live on during the development process.
The 3D Version will be great, I promise!

Development plan

  • 1st month: prototype (Completed)


  • 7th month: beta testing
  • 9th month: early access
  • 12th month: release


Goals

Primary Goal: $9000

To Finish the game as soon as possible.


Goal 2: $15000

Better Graphics, 
Multiplayer

Goal 3: $25000:

Better Environment
More levels,
More Parts


Goal 4: $50000:

Cannons and Battle mode

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Talk about this game, write about it. Guide people to this site!
  • Vote for the game in the Steam Greenlight
  • Buy the Full Version of Dream Car Racing Evo at DreamCarRacing.com - it will also help me to finish the 3D Version.
