story:
Futuristic Design

The GO features an elegant and functional design that won't compromise your style and sensibilities

Ultra Portable

The GO easily folds into a seamless self contained case that can effortlessly be rolled or placed anywhere

High Performance and Endless Fun

The GO can conquer most hills and offer speeds up to 20mph

Redefining Transportation

The GO is your solution to reclaiming your time and customizing your commute on the fly

Connects to smartphone and Internet

The GO offers a fully connected loT experience through its own data plan and mobile app

Swappable Super Battery

The unique removable Super Battery opens up a world of power possibilities in addition to instantly powering the GO

No Balancing Needed

The 3 wheel design offers stability and removes any learning curve typical of other 2 wheel devices

Safe Led Lights

Rest easy knowing that you will be highly visible in darkness with hi-brite LED headlights and brake lights

 

Customizable Commuting Experience

Ditch the Car

 

Full App Customization

Customize and program lights, horn, speed, and distance restrictions. Locate manage and track single users or a family. Immotor GO gives you peace of mind - always knowing where your device and the rider are.

Is it just another electric Personal Vehicle? 
Why is it different?
It is a whole new personal transport experience, different from any personal vehicle or e-bike to date. In fact, we want you to think of it as a Personal Vehicle, not a ‘scooter.’ Current personal vehicle is expensive, clunky, hard to transport, hard to learn, many have quality issues and few are well-designed. 

        •    Immotor GO’s transformative design allows it be used in three different states – Ride, Auto Pilot or Stand-By. It can be collapsed into its sleek self-contained case which can be pulled like a small suitcase. We mean it when we say fully portable – you can ride it and carry it with you on the train, bus, car or even the plane, then bring it inside with you wherever you end up. You don’t have to   worry about where to park it or whether it will be stolen. 
        •    The proprietary Immotor Super Battery in it is a revolutionary power source which has its own programmable operating system, guaranteeing performance and safety. The battery features its own ecosystem of compatible accessories – flashlight, lamp, AC/DC charger, USB charger, etc…
        •    It is safe, stable, and easy to learn for kids and grown-ups alike, regardless of ability.
        •    It has an innovative operating system created by Immotor, built with the future in mind. This is not just a typical display, but interactive and constantly updateable with any future software upgrades. Bluetooth connectivity, media functionality with speaker, GPS tracking, parental controls, cruise control, back-end data gathering and analysis are just a few of the many features available.

How much does the Immotor GO weigh?
Currently, the Immotor GO weighs in at a lean 27 lbs (12 kg) with 2 batteries installed.

How fast does Immotor GO go?
The Immotor GO’s speed is fully variable and comes in three pre-programmed speed modes – from a walking pace up to 20 MPH. 

How is the Immotor GO activated?
Each GO will come with a key fob paired to it. In addition, the Immotor App will allow your phone to be used as a digital key to unlock the GO and also allow you to grant access to friends that wish to use it via their smartphone app.

How far can the Immotor GO travel on a charge?
It has a range of up to 20 miles (32 km) on a single charge depending on battery configuration and use.

What powers the Immotor GO?
Immotor GO is powered by one or two 48-volt lithium-ion batteries and a 350 Watt brushless front hub.

How do you recharge the Immotor GO?
It uses a charger that plugs into any standard 120-220 volt wall outlet and fully recharges in 3 to 4 hours. The batteries can also be removed and charged independently of the GO in a separate Dual Dock Charging Station.

How long will the batteries last?
The Super Battery will last over 1000 cycles. The Immotor GO mobile app will notify the user that the battery needs to be replaced.

Do I need a special license to operate an Immotor GO?
The Immotor GO is an “Electric Personal Assistive Mobility Device” (EPAMD) and each country, state and city has its own laws and restrictions. We strongly advise the use of safety equipment like helmets. Please review your local motor vehicle rules and laws.

Is the Immotor GO easy to ride?
The Immotor GO stands on three wheels and is easily balanced even while at a stop. There is no learning curve and you will be enjoying the ride within seconds of stepping on. 

Can children ride an Immotor GO?
Yes! It is suitable for all ages from 6 to 106! The handlebars/controls telescope up and down to accommodate the user’s height.

What is the Auto Pilot feature?
In this mode, you will be able to use the throttle to move the GO forward beside you or set cruise control and have the GO move unassisted. We are working on a future version of the GO where the cruise control feature would be tethered to your smartphone and would essentially just be able to follow you autonomously and serve as a convenient way to carry cargo for you. In the current product, this is not yet available.

Does the Immotor GO come in different colors?
Currently the Immotor GO will only be offered in black for the first production run. New colors and combinations will be introduced in future iterations.

Does the Immotor GO have a line of accessories?
The Immotor GO has an entire ecosystem of accessories available including LED lighting, smartphone dock, speaker, case/cover, horns/bells, cup holder, cargo net, etc…

How does my smart phone work with my Immotor GO?
Bluetooth compatible devices will pair easily with the Immotor GO allowing for seamless connectivity and use of features. The Immotor GO’s smartphone dock will allow for easy access to view navigation apps and a USB connection to charge your devices. The GO will also be fully controllable via its proprietary GO mobile app – track your PV, lock/unlock, parental controls, etc…

What is the data plan for?
We have a built in sim card inside of the product and will be activated upon delivery automatically. The data plan is used to transmit the location information of the Immotor GO using the GPS sensor to the Immotor App. With this location information, you can use your smartphone anywhere in the world to do the following:
 
        •    Track your Immotor GO location information;
        •     Lock it or unlock it;
        •    Grant access to another smartphone user to use their phone as the wireless key to turn on the Immotor GO and ride;
        •    Revoke other smartphone’s access to the Immotor GO;
        •    Set up virtual fence for the Immotor GO so the product doesn’t function once it leaves a   pre-set perimeter.

Does the Immotor GO include a data plan?
Yes – the first year of data coverage is included in the price. In the US, coverage will be provided by T-Mobile. Beyond the first year, the cost of renewing the data plan will be approximately $10/year and will be completely optional.

Will the Immotor GO work without the data plan?
Of course, your Immotor GO will still function normally without the data plan, but it will just lack the remote tracking and control capabilities.

Will Immotor be tracking my device?
No. Location services and parental controls will be selective and controlled solely by the user. Immotor will only collect generic data related to performance and safety that will not be associated with specific user profiles.

What is the weight capacity of the Immotor GO?
Our current model has the weight capacity of 300 lbs.
 
What’s a Super Battery?
A new “smart battery” with a built-in operating system that creates a handshake between the device and the battery, and ultimately with the consumer. It is a removable, independent power source with its own operating system and safety features which has the potential to become the modular power supply of a variety of larger electric devices. It can do many things beyond your imagination – through its own ecosystem of accessories, it can become a light, USB charger or AC/DC charger.

How is the Super Battery different than other batteries available?
It is compact and light for the amount of power provided because it is lithium based.
It is a modular system – you can take it out and use it different ways.
It is very safe with protocols built in when not in use and when in use.
It is intelligent – connected, programmable, interactive.

What is a battery management system?
It's a system to allow and manage several batteries working together. They can work in series – adding more power; or in parallel – adding more time.
 
How much will it cost? 
Retail pricing will be around $1199. Currently available on Indiegogo for $749 with accessories sold separately.
 
If the project is funded, when will it be shipped?
End of March to mid April 2017 will be the first shipment.
 
What are the odds it will be delivered? On time?
Excellent!
 
Will it ship world wide? 
To most countries. Some countries will take more time because of certifications.
 
Can I distribute the product outside the USA?
Please email info@immotor.com for further information. 
 
If I back the project early, what do I get?
A discounted price for supporting the effort and the product. Stay tuned and check back in for updated perks!
  
What is the warranty on the Immotor GO? 
Immotor GO comes with a one-year warranty from date of purchase

Do I have to assemble my Immotor GO when I receive it?
No - there is no assembly required! After you unpack the product and fully charge the batteries, you insert the batteries, turn the power on and enjoy!

What does Immotor stand for?
Immotor literally stands for “I am Motor” – individuals becoming their own personal transportation.  No waste of material, effort or energy. Immotor is committed to reducing our transportation footprint, minimizing our environmental impact and saving energy. Immotor is committed to the development, production and sales of the world's leading portable personal transport including a smart and green battery pack and a power assist system.
Immotor 's vision is to provide a range of unprecedented personal transport devices for users around the world, that are beautiful, intelligent, green, portable, and highly efficient.
 
 
Who is behind it?
Daniel Huang, the Founder and CEO of Mophie - #1 portable battery case company built around the Apple eco-system. With 10 years of experience developing quality and beautifully designed product, delivering over 10 million units into the market and capturing 90% market share.        
Daniel has gained a reputation as a successful entrepreneur w/in the electronics industry in China.
story_txt:
Futuristic DesignThe GO features an elegant and functional design that won't compromise your style and sensibilitiesUltra PortableThe GO easily folds into a seamless self contained case that can effortlessly be rolled or placed anywhereHigh Performance and Endless FunThe GO can conquer most hills and offer speeds up to 20mphRedefining TransportationThe GO is your solution to reclaiming your time and customizing your commute on the flyConnects to smartphone and InternetThe GO offers a fully connected loT experience through its own data plan and mobile appSwappable Super BatteryThe unique removable Super Battery opens up a world of power possibilities in addition to instantly powering the GONo Balancing NeededThe 3 wheel design offers stability and removes any learning curve typical of other 2 wheel devicesSafe Led LightsRest easy knowing that you will be highly visible in darkness with hi-brite LED headlights and brake lights Customizable Commuting Experience

Ditch the Car


 
Full App Customization
Customize and program lights, horn, speed, and distance restrictions. Locate manage and track single users or a family. Immotor GO gives you peace of mind - always knowing where your device and the rider are.



Is it just another electric Personal Vehicle? Why is it different?It is a whole new personal transport experience, different from any personal vehicle or e-bike to date. In fact, we want you to think of it as a Personal Vehicle, not a ‘scooter.’ Current personal vehicle is expensive, clunky, hard to transport, hard to learn, many have quality issues and few are well-designed. 
        •    Immotor GO’s transformative design allows it be used in three different states – Ride, Auto Pilot or Stand-By. It can be collapsed into its sleek self-contained case which can be pulled like a small suitcase. We mean it when we say fully portable – you can ride it and carry it with you on the train, bus, car or even the plane, then bring it inside with you wherever you end up. You don’t have to   worry about where to park it or whether it will be stolen.         •    The proprietary Immotor Super Battery in it is a revolutionary power source which has its own programmable operating system, guaranteeing performance and safety. The battery features its own ecosystem of compatible accessories – flashlight, lamp, AC/DC charger, USB charger, etc…        •    It is safe, stable, and easy to learn for kids and grown-ups alike, regardless of ability.        •    It has an innovative operating system created by Immotor, built with the future in mind. This is not just a typical display, but interactive and constantly updateable with any future software upgrades. Bluetooth connectivity, media functionality with speaker, GPS tracking, parental controls, cruise control, back-end data gathering and analysis are just a few of the many features available.
How much does the Immotor GO weigh?Currently, the Immotor GO weighs in at a lean 27 lbs (12 kg) with 2 batteries installed.
How fast does Immotor GO go?The Immotor GO’s speed is fully variable and comes in three pre-programmed speed modes – from a walking pace up to 20 MPH. 
How is the Immotor GO activated?Each GO will come with a key fob paired to it. In addition, the Immotor App will allow your phone to be used as a digital key to unlock the GO and also allow you to grant access to friends that wish to use it via their smartphone app.
How far can the Immotor GO travel on a charge?It has a range of up to 20 miles (32 km) on a single charge depending on battery configuration and use.
What powers the Immotor GO?Immotor GO is powered by one or two 48-volt lithium-ion batteries and a 350 Watt brushless front hub.
How do you recharge the Immotor GO?It uses a charger that plugs into any standard 120-220 volt wall outlet and fully recharges in 3 to 4 hours. The batteries can also be removed and charged independently of the GO in a separate Dual Dock Charging Station.
How long will the batteries last?The Super Battery will last over 1000 cycles. The Immotor GO mobile app will notify the user that the battery needs to be replaced.

story:
WHY:  

We believe that in riding a bike, we contribute toward healing our planet from the damage caused by fossil fuels, in order to leave a better world for the next generation...  

HOW:  

Preventive safety means stopping accidents. Until today, biking has been less safe because of how difficult it is to know when cars are behind you on the road. By returning that one critical second to riders, we can change forever the way we bike, the way we move, and the way everyone moves - all around the world. If we can easily, clearly, and quickly see what is behind us on the road, we can prevent accidents. We’ll be safer, we’ll ride more often, and more people will join us, creating a ripple effect that can have a positive impact on our world.

 

WHAT: 

We at Sehen have created a state of the art rear-view bike mirror that doesn’t vibrate, bringing you the steadiest, clearest view available. You'll be safer and have greater peace of mind while riding. We know you've never felt this safe before on the road and that you'll agree that Sehen offers the best way available to see the traffic around you. After checking out our project, we're sure you'll agree.

 

 

 Ask yourself this question:

When we ask riders this question, nine out of ten say they feel less safe mainly because of cars or something related to cars. We don't want riders to feel that cars are terrible monsters chasing them, eager to hurt them. If riders are able to see the cars around them, they can act accordingly, in harmony with traffic, rather than fighting against it.

 

In the words of Sehen founder and inventor, Erik Borys:

Many times a mistake creates a miracle. While I was playing with my children I found a piece of a toy that I managed to modify, and suddenly I had a bike mirror that was as steady as a car’s rear view mirror. It was incredible, and believe me when I say that if you're a rider you have never felt this feeling. The image was very precise, and I began to feel really safe riding my bike on the street - on any street - with or without bike lanes.

 When people saw my mirror - and sometimes used it - they asked me to make one for them.  

And when my children grew up, I needed to make some mirrors for them, and because so many people had asked me, I began making them for everybody - and Sehen is this "happy accident" made real.  

We applied for a patent, industrial design registration, and trademark in October 2015. After more than 25 working prototypes, materials, production systems, and plastic molds, we are ready to produce. 

 

Riding has never felt like this feeling before. It's a combination of many things: the fresh air on your face, looking good, being aware enough to avoid traffic jams, doing good for yourself and for our world. All while saving money. It's feeling safe while seeing the world and the roads around you with confidence. 

A Sehen Story: "A few weeks ago I gave my brother a Sehen. He told me he'd already used a helmet mirror before and that he couldn't focus the image. He thought it was because of the distance between his eyes and the mirror. I took him on a short ride, and he was simply amazed at the clear image he was getting in the Sehen. I told him he couldn't focus on the other one because it was vibrating, and only after using the Sehen did he begin to believe me. While riding he began to tell me, “Look, that's a Ford Focus and it's going to turn right, and that new gray Mazda 6 is changing lanes to pass us. I can see the plates!” He was amazed. It was awesome. My own brother couldn't believe me until he used it."  

Try it for yourself, and you'll understand why we say it can change the way millions commute every single day all over the world.

 

 

 

 

The most important part about Sehen is that it doesn't vibrate at all, showing you a very clear image that makes you feel incredibly safe and sure of what you are doing when riding your bicycle in the street.  

The following comparison images were taken with exactly the same camera and methods.  

It's difficult to feel safe due to the vibration of other mirrors.

Our Sehen mirror creates zero vibration, so the steady image you get will make you feel much safer.

 

Sehen can't ride the bike for you, but it will make you feel much safer while riding.

 

 

The sleek design will make you look and feel good. One of our biggest challenges was to make a rearview mirror that lets you see perfectly while making you feel proud to wear it. Sehen's design is not only for aesthetics. It's what prevents Sehen from vibrating, too.

Sehen is made of high resistant polycarbonate to withstand even harsh treatment. The articulating parts are made with high-grade steel that will not break or bend.

Compact and very easy to keep in any pocket. It won't break or bend because of its materials and design.

Sehen mirror is made of 1.5mm high-resistance acrylic that resists ten times more than a glass mirror, which is very important when it's so close to your eyes. It has 90% reflectivity - practically the same as a commercial glass mirror, which has 94% reflectivity. It's so close you won't notice the difference, and it's half the weight. Sehen is safer and lighter.

You can't get a steady image even with an expensive camera and monitor, you have to deal with electronics, batteries, weight, and cables, it isn't vibrationless, affordable, reliable, compact, lightweight, or portable. Sehen strikes the perfect balance and is available today. You won't have to keep waiting for a great riding experience.

We are very proud of our fast, easy, firm, and safe patent-pending attachment system made of aluminum with a polypropylene layer for the protection of your eyewear frame. You can use it every day, all day long, without fearing that your Sehen could fall.

Your Sehen can be very easily attached to almost any kind of glasses, most bike glasses, bike helmets with or without visor, and caps, check the video.

 

 With a very light 2-gram aluminum device (included) Sehen can easily be attached to visorless helmets, motorcycle helmets, etc.

 

 

Personal Security. While walking in the street or in the park, increased awareness may help you to prevent attacks.  

Construction workers have to be aware of what happens behind them while keeping attention on what they are doing.  

Security guards can very discreetly see behind themselves without turning their heads, giving them a 360-degree view.

Skateboarders, skaters, and others can use Sehen to be safer.

Right side Sehen

You can choose right or left Sehen, the right one is normally for left driving side countries. You can use both sides at the same time to feel safer.

In the First production run, Sehen will be available in 4 colors: blue, green, black, and fuchsia. 

 

 Arkady Borys, CEE/ Co-founder; Erik Borys Designer/Founder; Yaroslaw Borys Co-founder.

make action GIFs like this at MakeaGif

 

 

Some of the more than 25 prototypes, all of which taught us something valuable.

 

 

 

 

Can I pledge for more than one reward? Right now  IGG doesn’t allow pledges for more than one reward, but you can upgrade your pledge for one that covers what you want.  

Can the attachment damage my eyewear frame? Very important question! NO, it won’t damage your frame since we have put a plastic protection layer between the attachment and the frame. And for the same reason, the screw is made of acrylic with rounded edges, which is the same as the aluminum structure - carefully rounded edges. 

Why doesn't Sehen vibrate? There are two main reasons, the first is the shape: basically triangular in both axes - the most stable shape. And the second is the polycarbonate material that absorbs vibration.  

Can the Sehen’s arm bend or break? Well, actually any material can break, but polycarbonate is very resistant. We have been using our Sehens for months and none have broken or even bent, and we keep it in our pocket among keys, etc. - really harsh treatment. If there is ever any bending, you can unbend it by submerging it in boiling water. It’s thermoformable for a few seconds after.

story:
Well, some say a Halfbike is a fun way to move around town. Or what you'll hop on for a joy ride at the park. Others see it as a wonderful workout tool to train balance, reflexes, endurance and persistence. Yet for most, a Halfbike is a fun choice to explore the world from a new perspective, urging them to go outside and be active.

As to us, well, here’s a bit of our view… 

 

One thing’s for certain though. If you keep an open-mind, if you nurture your inner child’s curiosity and never miss a chance to explore new horizons, if you’re active and in need of a good full body workout, or simply love the outdoors and look for the remarkable in a ride across your city, you’re most probably a great Halfbiker undercover :)

We've been tinkering with the essence of riding a Halfbike for quite a while now. Ever since the very first prototypes, we knew that we were onto something. They were almost impossible to ride, yet there was this special feeling which kept us going. A feeling we pursued, a feeling we nurtured and improved. However, only after other people started sharing their experience on a large scale, we found the missing ingredient. Based on this feedback, we went back to the drawing board one more time.

We’re excited to say that the Halfbike is now complete and that the user experience has  finally been perfected. So, now, it is as good as it was in our wildest dreams :) 

Intuitive Control : We tweaked Halfbike’s geometry and proportions, making it more ergonomic and user friendly. The result is better maneuverability and greatly improved sense of control. 

Gears:  We added more gears and increased the gear range. This makes the Halfbike better suited to anything a city could throw at it. You can now ride comfortably on an even more diverse terrain. A new state-of-the-art hub by Sturmey Archer makes all this possible. 

Brakes:  The Halfbike can now stop on a dime and this is a fact! The new integrated drum brakes are pretty much maintenance free and the performance will stay consistent with time, and in all weather conditions. 

Compact size:  The Halfbike got lighter and more compact, and it is now easier to take it anywhere with you.

Foldable: We added a quick release system for even easier folding. Take it onboard public transit, put it in the trunk of the smallest car or fit it into places too tight for a normal bike. 

Learning to ride a Halfbike takes time, practice and determination. Remember the first time you tried a bicycle or the first time you got on skis? Do you remember what it felt like the moment it all clicked? Yes, that's right! The Halfbike comes with a steep but rewarding learning curve. It has the potential to put you in a child’s shoes again and bring out those happy memories. Most people need only 10-15 minutes to get the basics. Once your muscle memory and balance kick in, it suddenly becomes intuitive. From then on, it starts getting fun and the progress is surprisingly fast. 

Martin & Mihail are architects and true partners in crime who share a vision for a better world and truly believe less is more. They stay guided by their passion for the outdoors and core belief that we, humans, are born to move. So, when everything becomes too complicated, we need to push hard on that reset button and get our personal time offline.

Through the years and along with the Halfbike, our team grew steadily. We believe that hacking the well established order, with small but confident steps, can make our future brighter. We believe in local manufacturing - it is our way of keeping our business fair and sustainable. That’s why each Halfbike is handmade in our workshop in Europe. But there is more. We chose to work only with direct customers. This helps us grow together and the feedback from our clients keeps us up-to-date and on track. Kickstarter taught us an important lesson, one we always get back to. “Listen!”. We are devoted to keeping this direct communication and it truly means a lot to us. The good vibes flow both ways. The result is the best Halfbike possible, straight from our workshop to your home, without involving any middlemen and the complexity they bring. That simple. 

Our mission is to inspire people to spend more time offline, back to nature, back to basics. We know the Halfbike can take you there. Are you ready for a new adventure?

The Halfbike project started, more or less, as an idea for a distinct and really fun way to traverse the city. Only after the first user feedback started to come back did we realize it was a lot more than that. Tons of client, athlete & medical success stories opened our eyes - people kept on finding many new and diverse applications of the Halfbike.  

We never expected such massive growth of the Halfbike community and all the love they send our way. All the great moments, stories and experiences they shared made us see that there was still more to the Halfbike than we thought. Our sprawling worldwide community quickly became the project’s backbone - amazing people who made the Halfbike dream real. Thank you!

P.S. Click on the quotes bubble below to find more inspiring stories!
story_txt:

Click on the quotes bubble below to find more inspiring stories! 




 



 

 
Returns
Indiegogo is a crowdfunding platform and not an online shop. We're all here to support ideas and join forces to bring those ideas to life. Every backer makes a pledge and in return receives a reward. Based on this, we order materials, components and get the wheel rolling to produce your Halfbike. This is why returns are not accepted. Thank you for both your understanding and support!

story:
Hi Indiegogo! We are EGLA Communications, an innovative start-up technology company that is creating cloud storage that everyone can afford. Did you know  everyone is moving their data to the cloud?  Yes, now you no longer need a hard drive to store your files because cloud storage is transforming the way data is saved.  If you're asking yourself what exactly cloud storage is, it's basically a remote hard drive online that is available to you from any computer through the internet. To facilitate this transition to the cloud, we want to be your company of choice.

What's the problem? Do you ever get worried about your computer or laptop crashing and losing all your precious data? Are you tired of always having to manually backup your computer to your external drive? And by the way, when was the last time you backed up your drive? 

Using a hard drive is the “old fashioned” way of storing data and will eventually become obsolete. Everyone knows it’s just a matter of time till hard drives fail or run out of storage space. And when they fail you'll lose everything on it! That's why backing up your data to the cloud is the preferred method for storing data.  It's easy and convenient. However, up until now, it has also been expensive and out of reach for most individuals and companies.

So what's the solution? The HulaDrive! The HulaDrive is cloud storage for the rest of us.  It enables all your precious files, folders, documents, pictures, or videos to be held in one secure location online that is conveniently accessible and available to you on any device.  Most importantly, the HulaDrive is very affordable when compared to other cloud providers. We think this is the perfect campaign for launching on Indiegogo, because we know everyone can use cloud storage at an affordable price.

So how does the HulaDrive work? Like its name portrays, your data connects and is stored to the Hula drive (the cloud) and is available to you on your desktop, laptop, tablet and/or mobile device...then it automatically syncs with all your devices and the cloud instantly in a circular motion like that of a hula-hoop. So whenever one of your files is edited and saved to your HulaDrive folder it will be backed up automatically on all your devices.

So what are some features and benefits of the HulaDrive?  The HulaDrive will offer auto synchronization, auto backup, multiple user sharing and collaboration, security and accessibility at no additional cost.  We're also in the process of developing a HulaDrive application that will be downloadable on your smart phones and tablets that will allow you to save, store, access, and better manage your data from anywhere at any time from any of your portable devices. 

Our value proposition is pretty simple, we are better than our competition for a number of reasons but the number one reason is because we strive to be the lowest cost cloud storage provider.  We're currently a small operation so we don't have the large overhead expenses of other companies and since we implement open source software and use technology more efficiently we're able to pass our savings onto you. 

To give you an idea of how great our pricing is, we've come up with a special rate package for our project called the "Indiegogo 20/20".  This special package deal includes 20 GB of cloud storage for only $20 bucks! Now not to drop any names but our prices are 40% less than our leading competition. Our 20/20 account is perfect for storing videos, pictures, music, documents, big files, in fact it’s big enough to store 20 full length movies and 5,000 songs. Now that’s a lot of space!

 

Want more proof? The HulaDrive began with Dr. Edwin Hernandez who developed this innovative cloud storage system to be better, faster, and more affordable. Dr. Hernandez has years of experience in cloud computing by building clouds while working in the labs at the University of Florida and completing his Ph.D in computer engineering.  He has designed the HulaDrive to be superior by leveraging software rather than hardware. As a result, our operational costs are lower, and this enables us to pass those savings on to you, our supporters.  Furthermore, we are planning on partnering up with the National Science Foundation's University Cooperative Research Center, as well as Florida Atlantic University, and Florida International University.

That's great, but is it secure? The HulaDrive is secure because it uses 128 bit encryption, SSL, and it is password protected. In fact, the level of security is on par with most banks. Moreover, our data architecture allows the creation of redundant points of access worldwide, thus preventing loss of data while yielding delivering speeds that won’t disappoint. Our cloud uses the latest SAS drives, and is connected to the LambdaRail, the ultra-high performance national fiber optic network. Our server room is located at Florida Atlantic University's Technology Business Incubator in Boca Raton, FL. Our facility has two backup generators, so your data remains safe in case of a natural disaster.

What about software developers? Our platform was built to support the development community.  Using our Software Development Kit (SDK) tools, you can customize your storage applications to suit your needs and build applications to take advantage of our affordable storage solutions. It's simple, we provide the cloud and the tools so you can access your data anywhere, anytime. If you are a software developer you now have the platform to develop your dreams in the cloud!

Start your Hula Drive Account Today! Indiegogo, we need your help to make the HulaDrive a success. Through this Indiegogo campaign, your contributions will help us build the infrastructure we need for the HulaDrive. By pledging with us, you will not only be supporting our campaign, but you will also receive cloud storage! Yes, when you contribute, you get something in return!

 

Through this special Indiegogo offer, we are offering most of our cloud storage at a special introductory rate of 6 cents per GB for a whole year.  For example, our 50 GB offer is only $36 for a whole year, which works out to $3 per month! This rate is a steal considering that our closest competitor sells storage space at 10 cents per GB. Once our Indiegogo campaign is over, we will then revert to our regular cloud storage price of 8 cents per GB.  But that's still a lot of storage at a very low price!

Your Indiegogo contributions will receive the following perks according to this graduated schedule:

How will the funds be used? Upon completion of this Indiegogo project, we'll use the money obtained to purchase the servers we need to build the larger part of the HulaDrive and help pay our electricity bill. We will purchase or lease enough servers to satisfy the demand for cloud storage and eventually scale up as we grow.  Then we'll put on some elbow grease and get back to work.  See our campaign timeline below.

Campaign Timeline

Meet the HulaDrive Team! We are a group of young professionals dedicated to building and providing cloud storage for the rest of us. Our team consists of a number of graduates from the University of Florida, go Gators! Our startup office is located at the Technology Business Incubator in Boca Raton, FL. It's been a long time coming, and we've put in a lot of time and resources into development, but finally we're making our dream come true.

Dr. Edwin Hernandez, Ph.D. Completed his Doctorate in computer engineering from the University of Florida. Dr. Hernandez is an entrepreneur with over 20 years of computer engineering experience.  He has background working for Fortune 500 companies such as Microsoft and Motorola. He is the Chief Technology Officer.

Lucie Allaire, B.S.B.A. Completed her Bachelor's of Science in Business Administration from the University of Florida with a concentration in marketing and a minor in entrepreneurship. Lucie has years of entrepreneurship experience and is a great marketing strategist. She currently holds the position as our Marketing Director.

Henry Incer, MBA. Completed his Master's degree in Business Administration from Nova Southeastern University. Henry has a background working in project management and IT from companies such as Walmart and Disney. He is the Cloud Director.

Andrea Simon, BA. Completed her Bachelor's degree from the University of Florida with a concentration in creative design. Andrea is an entrepreneur and is currently the Creative Director for our company.

The HulaDrive team (Henry Incer, Andrea Simon, Edwin Hernandez, Lucie Allaire) with visiting Congressman Ted Deutch.

Thank you for supporting our Indiegogo campaign. We look forward to making cloud storage available for the rest of us!

story:
Kate's Surly Christmas

Kate/Wub needs a new fast bike! She saved up to buy a new bike this summer but alas she is a poor grad student again and the money ended up going for things like books and security deposits. I'm hoping we can come together and raise the money to buy her a new Surly road bike, along with a few other biking accessories she desperately needs for getting back and forth to class this winter.

 

The goal

Raise enough money that we will be able to build Kate a custom Surly for Christmas that will hold up for years to come. I would also like to get her a few essential bike things she has really needed. Kate really needs a good winter/rain biking jacket, winter bike gloves, a new helmet and some waterproof panniers for her books and laptop. The total cost of everything Kate needs is $1500. Right now I'm about $500 short of getting this bike under the tree for her. So, I'm turning to friends and family in the hope that we can come together and get Kate an awesome Christmas present.

 

Every little bit helps

I know you all have a special place in your heart for Wub aka the love of my life Kate Winterbottom and it would really mean a lot if I could get everyones help to make this happen for her. So what ever you can give would be very appreciated. Also if you know anyone that I should of emailed about the Kates Surly Christmas campaign but didn't please let them know! 

Cool Prizes

In case just really liking Wub/Kate wasn't enough I'm offering cool prizes. Check out the Perks section of this campaign.

story:
Support Nashville's Oasis Bike Workshop!!!

This May and June, Max Pendergraph and Eric Ritter will cycle from Vancouver to San Francisco along the coast of British Columbia, Washington, Oregon, and California. Max then plans to head inland to the Sierra Cascades bicycle route and make his way back to Vancouver in a loop that will total 2,769 miles. They will be carrying all of their gear and camping most nights. Eighty percent of the money raised from this campaign will go to support an organization that Max and Eric are both passionate about: the Oasis Bike Workshop in Nashville, Tennessee. Seventeen percent of the funds will go towards trip logistics (gear, transportation, food, etc), and three percent will go to indiegogo. Check out this video that CNN made about the workshop:


Max has been volunteering at the Oasis Bike Workshop since August 2012 and plans to continue throughout his time in Nashville. The Bike Workshop, run by Dan Furbish, offers a six-week after school course to middle and high school students that teaches them to take apart, repair, and rebuild a donated bicycle that they keep at the end of the six weeks. They also get helmets, locks, a few basic tools, lights, and bike computers. Donations will be used to purchase these cycling essentials. There is also a weekly open shop where volunteers and previous participants can work on bikes together and add to Nashville's growing community of cycling enthusiasts. Stop in and check it out if you're in town. This incredible organization depends on the support of generous donors, like YOU! 

How Can I Help?

  1. First, please consider making a small, per-mile donation. A half cent cent per mile would be $14, one cent per mile - $28, etc. If 100 people donate one cent per mile, we will have reached our fundraising goal!
  2. Second, please help to spread the word about our campaign by sharing this page with your friends, family, and social media network. We are especially hopeful that you can send it along to any bicycle activists you may know!
  3. Third, if you are a cycling enthusiast (or an aspiring one) get in touch with Max about joining up for part or all of the adventure. Or, throw the idea out there to a friend who may be up for it!
  4. Last, if you live along the route or know someone who does, please reach out to us. We love seeing old friends and meeting new people, and we would definitely hit you/them up for a warm shower!

Please take a minute to explore the Oasis Bike Workshop website, check out the above video and the gallery where you'll meet Dan and a couple of the participants, and listen to some of the awesome press this project has generated. Any additional funds that we raise with this campaign will go to the Bike Workshop's parent organization: Nashville's Oasis Center - an incredible place that provides counseling, teen shelter, and a wide variety of engagement opportunities for Nashville's at risk youth.

Check out our route here! 

Finally, get in touch! Max - j.max.pendergraph@gmail.com; Eric - ericjritter@gmail.com.

Thanks and ride on!!!

There is also a weekly open shop where volunteers and previous participants can work on bikes together and add to Nashville's growing community of cycling enthusiasts. Stop in and check it out if you're in town. This incredible organization depends on the support of generous donors, like YOU! How Can I Help?
First, please consider making a small, per-mile donation. A half cent cent per mile would be $14, one cent per mile - $28, etc. If 100 people donate one cent per mile, we will have reached our fundraising goal!
Second, please help to spread the word about our campaign by sharing this page with your friends, family, and social media network. We are especially hopeful that you can send it along to any bicycle activists you may know!
Third, if you are a cycling enthusiast (or an aspiring one) get in touch with Max about joining up for part or all of the adventure. Or, throw the idea out there to a friend who may be up for it!
Last, if you live along the route or know someone who does, please reach out to us. We love seeing old friends and meeting new people, and we would definitely hit you/them up for a warm shower!
Please take a minute to explore the Oasis Bike Workshop website, check out the above video and the gallery where you'll meet Dan and a couple of the participants, and listen to some of the awesome press this project has generated. Any additional funds that we raise with this campaign will go to the Bike Workshop's parent organization: Nashville's Oasis Center - an incredible place that provides counseling, teen shelter, and a wide variety of engagement opportunities for Nashville's at risk youth.Check out our route here! Finally, get in touch! Max - j.max.pendergraph@gmail.com; Eric - ericjritter@gmail.com.Thanks and ride on!!!

story:
The Back Story-

This all started with an episode of Top Gear UK, I was just a kid and decided it would be a cool idea to buy an old coupe and make it original. Needless to say I had no idea what I was getting myself into. I found a 1972 Opel GT and thought that because I had never heard of it, it would be the perfect place to start.

 

I brought it home after making many-many payments to the current owner. Then I found out that I had to track down the original owner due to the fact that I didn’t have enough info to get an ownership for it. After that adventure I came to the realization that finding the parts for this behemoth was impossible.


Contributions to this project would literally bring back my faith in humanity; cars are my absolute passion. I decided to start this campaign because of my love for classic European sports cars. If this doesn’t work I’m afraid this wonder of German engineering might find its way into becoming a small steel cube.

 

Your donations will save this lovely vehicle and insure that it lives another 40 years. If we don’t save old classics all we will have are plastic cars built for economy covering our streets, and nothing to turn our heads at. Do you want to live in that world??

Here’s Where you Come in-

I’m playing it very safe, as this is my first IGG attempt ever, in a 5k target. This injection will be enough for me to fix the engine, complete the body work, and get a very subtle interior completed. My blood and sweat will be going into every minute of this process.

 

My main perk will consist of a project book; it will have full documentation of where all the money went in completing the process, pictures from start to finish and if you contribute your name in the thank you section in the front. Lastly, if you’re local to the GTA large contributors will get the opportunity to use the car for a day (no bank robberies) for commercial advertisements or weddings.

The Impact-

I know this isn’t the common Indie GOGO project, but it is something close to my heart, and the restoration of beautiful classic cars is a passion for a lot of car lovers. Your help will give this sexy old girl another chance to hit the streets again.

Other Ways to Help-

Share on Twitter or Facebook, 90 days to make a miracle happen :)

 

Thanks for reading!

story:
Simple Design, Clever Engineering.

Hidden Battery & Controller. The battery is the heart of the bike and the controller is the brain. The controller communicates with the battery, motor, and throttle to regulate speed and ensure the bike is running smoothly. The battery and controller are inside the frame to create a streamlined aesthetic and better protect them from the outdoor elements. 

Super Charge. 

The Ultimate Commuter is now available. Most electric bikes take 4-6 hours to fully charge. The Austin Racer 48 volt battery cuts that time in half and can be plugged into any standard wall outlet.

Go Fast. 

The Austin Racer's thumb throttle pedal assist lets you control how fast you go and how hard you ride. With 750 watts of nominal power and 1000 watts of peak power, you can tackle any hill with power on demand. The other e-bike riders won't know what hit him: the motor is virtually silent.

Superior Craftsmanship.

To achieve quality craftsmanship with each Austin Racer, we picked top-of-the-line electronics and materials -- Italian leather saddle, American Crafted Steel, LCD Screen, motor, battery, and controller -- you would be purchasing the best american made electric bike at this price point.

Made in America.

To achieve the quality of a traditional american board-track race bike, we've assemble local manufactures and individuals ourselves to create jobs and a team here in USA. 

Designed in California.

Mission and Vision. reimagine the future transportation, shaping our vision into a new model for electric vehicle design. Strategic Planning to ensure we continue excellence, relevance and impact for decades to come. 

 

Risks and challenges

Delivery of the Austin Racer is supported by a collaborative team who successfully produced dozens of electric bikes through standard means. We presently have the space and machines needed to make small batches of the Austin Racer right here in the USA and can easily scale if needed. The only real risk comes on relying on outside providers for the controls and batteries which is why we have spent nearly a year on sourcing the parts for this project.

story:
info: WWW.RAFFEBIKES.COM

The World's First Competition Spec

Mini Electric Motocross Bike

Designed and Built in the USA.

 


Designed to compete, RAFFE Bikes are built to take trophies. 50cc 2T competative.



Clean and quiet riding means you can do it almost anywhere. The beach, the park, even in the house! No more hauling the bikes to the track just for a little practice. The world is a track.



No smelly fuels that leak all over. You can carry RAFFE Bikes in the trunk and pull it out for riding wherever you need. 

 

Meet Fernando Ficachi, Flying Ferni. RAFFE was built for and around this amazing boy. His racing heritage coupled with close to 5 years of development was the cocktail to the modern marvel.​

"The idea of a high quality electric youth starter bike is exciting for the parent that isn't up for all the upkeep and repairs of a gas powered bike. Can't wait to own one."
"My boy just turned 6 and I want him to be part of a revolution in moto x"
"Excellent motor, light weight, super quality bike coming."
"As a single Dad of 9yo twins. I'm often strapped for money. I'd much rather pay for convenience and reliability in exchange for more ride time."
“I really like the idea of electric motocross. We had our local track shut down because of noise complaints and environmental concerns. ”

 

Special thanks to Acerbis, Willy, Darrin, Glenn.

 

HUGE thanks to all our contributors and supporters. Without you this would have not been possible. 

RAFFE Bikes is the fist true competitive electric mini motocross bike on the planet designed to compete against top branded 2 stroke 50cc race bikes. RAFFE has many trophies and is race proven. RAFFE Bikes are powered by state of the art technology.  

For more information please visit:  www.raffebikes.com

story:
Short Summary

Motorcycle riders are looking for contributions to help fund a community-based veterans initiative for reintegration. While the number of riders has reached the maximum for the run, you can still participate by donating.

 

What We Need

Right now CNYVets is a web-based directory of resources, located at www.cnyvets.org, giving veterans and their families a single source of information to support reintegration services in Central New York. CNYVets wants to build a veterans outreach center to strengthen the support network for our returning vets.

The center will provide one-on-one and peer group counseling, case worker referral, employment and continuing education assistance, and other resources necessary to address the unique challenges facing veterans of the Iraq and Afghan wars and their families.

All donations to the Rally for Veterans ride will go directly to CNYVets.

 

The Impact

Today’s veterans experience higher rates of serious injury, unemployment and family problems, all of which make civilian re-entry harder.

 

Reasons to Support this Cause

Many noble servicemen and women of the Iraq and Afghan wars have made the ultimate sacrifice for our country. Now with your help, we can support the successful reintegration of their brothers and sisters in arms by building a veterans outreach center in Central New York.

And for those who have fallen, you may wish to consider making a contribution in their memory. Donations are subject to cnyvets’ designation as a 501(c)(3) not-for-profit tax-exempt organization. For more information, please visit www.cnyvets.org or email info@cnyvets.org.

story:
UPDATE: Here is a picture of our prototype. Note the nail that is elegantly holding that sock to a wall. Pure science. Pure genius. The WallSock.


                                                           

The Great Wall of China. The Hanging Gardens of Babylon. The Great Pyramid of Giza. These are all things. And so is the WallSock. The WallSock is a revolutionary invention that marries the rigidness and stability of a nail with the soft, flowing, lintyness of a sock.

Through technology developed over literally tens of minutes, we have created a new kind of wall-based storage. The WallSock is the perfect fit for your needs. Nail it by the bed for quick access to your cellular telephone. Need fruit fast? No problem! It works great as a banana holder. Use it as a display case, key chain, or art piece. Put valuable coins in it. Love to garden? It's basically a flower pot. Worship the Dark Lord Cthulhu? Use it to perform rituals of Lovecraftian proportions without ever having to hunt for your sacrificial chotchkies. The WallSock is everything you want anywhere you need it. Assuming what you need is small enough and light enough to fit in a sock.

The WallSock will be available in a number of sizes and styles and will maybe hypothetically change your life in some potentially unlikely, immeasurable way. Please consider backing if you are interested in being respected by your SO, children, parents, coworkers, or former classmates.

Much Love,

The WallSock Team

Risks and Challenges

The WallSock looks risks and challenges in the eye and, with a fist raised in anger, says "I WAS BORN DEEP WITHIN THE FOLDS OF THE EARTH. I AM AN ANCIENT FORCE, AKIN TO THE TORNADO'S WIND OR THE MIGHTY EARTHQUAKE'S ROAR. I STRETCH BEYOND THE HUMAN MIND, BEYOND THE REACHES OF SPACE AND TIME. I AM WHOLE AND COMPLETE. I LACK NOTHING. WANT NOTHING. I AM PERFECTION EMBODIED. LOOK FOR ME IN LOVE, LIFE, JUSTICE, HAPPINESS, A BABY'S SMILE. I AM HE WHO BASKS IN RISK AND CHALLENGES AND NEVER SWAYS. IN CLOSING, OUR RISKS AND CHALLENGES ARE VERY LIMITED."


What the critics are saying -

 Read more here! - via GeekAlabama.com

story:
Exway X1 Pro:

Hot off the presses:

Released on March 1st, 2019, the all new X1 Pro is Exway's second generation electric skateboard.   Packed with new features while still maintaining it's ultra slim, lightweight design, the X1 Pro is the board for you.

Range, range, range!

You spoke and we listened.  We increased our battery capacity from 120 watt hours to 193.  Now enjoy over 50% more range on a the all new Exway X1 Pro.  Ride 16 miles on the fastest charging, most advanced, electric board ever.

85mm wheels:

Our new urethane formula provides better rider feedback and better wear.  With bigger stock wheels you will notice immediate performance enhancement and elevated top speed.

Turbo power:

We took the X1 Pro to the next level by adding Turbo mode.  Not for the faint of heart, turbo mode increases the power from 1000 to 1200 watts.  Hang on tight, because the X1 Pro is a Speed Demon with a top speed of 29 MPH.

3mm Cushioning grip tape:

Standard on every X1 Pro, our cushioning grip tape smooths the ride while still keeping our board IP-55 water resistant.

Fully upgraded hub motors:

– The Exway X1 Pro bearings have been upgraded allowing for a more water resistant, robust, and reliable ride.

– The X1 Pro has more power and torque than its predecessor.  The motor power has been increased from 1,000 to 1,200 watts.

– The fully enclosed hub motor are not only maintenance free, but more powerful and quieter than ever. 

– Anti-Drag motor design. You can freely kick your X1 Pro just like you can your old-school longboard.

*RIOT - Optional belt drive system:

Prefer a belt drive?  We've got you covered.  With the optional Riot system, simply swap the hub motors and replace them with belts.  The Riot system screams and will be available in April.  

New wheel formula:

              

The new 85mm wheels come stock on the X1 Pro. Featuring an all new tech savvy gel core,  these wheels gives you more control, faster roll, and will last longer.  Enjoy intuitive feedback without sacrificing traction.

The X1 Pro is now smarter than ever:

With Field Oriented Control (FOC) motor design, you can shred with confidence because you have the most reliable board in the world.  State of the art sensors are placed throughout the Pro, so your board is constantly thinking, reporting, and adjusting to your riding style.  You will always feel at home on the X1 Pro whether you are on your first electric skateboard, or you are a high speed shredder.

The smartest ESC in the business:

– Proprietary to Exway, the ESC is always computing to alert you of any problems that your board experiences.  

– If your X1 Pro detects unusual conditions, your remote will let you know by vibrating and displaying the error on the OLED screen.

– Overcharge, overvoltage, and overheat protections built in.

1.5mm added thickness brings 56% higher range:

It’s not just a statistic, it’s pure science.  Our decks are thin, real thin.  They allow us to keep the lowest profile boards available.  Not only have we increased our battery capacity, we have also adopted an all new EBS regenerative braking system allowing you to get 56% more range out of the X1 Pro.

R1 – Intelligent remote control:

-The refinished Pro remote now has a more ergonomic grip and better skin coating for that grip that won’t quit.

-With a Holzer type rolling throttle design, enjoy a more precise throttle control than before.

-Our traditional 4 speed mode is one of the things we knew people loved about the X1.  So, we didn’t change it.

The perfect amount of concave:

– We are control freaks. We have found the absolute optimal amount of concave in our decks.

– Carve better, carve harder, with your feet cradled into place on the deck of a truly precise board.

– We will never compromise, which is why we are still using Industry leading 45 degree Seismic Aeon Trucks.  They rock!

Here is the latest review of the X1 Pro:

http://www.electricskateboardhq.com/exway-x1-pro-review/

Exway X1:

      

The Original Exway Board:

If you want the lightest board on the market and don't need the added range, the Exway X1 has lead the path of innovation and technology in the electric skateboard market.  This board has all of the perks of the X1 Pro but without all of the bells and whistles.   On a budget but still want a ridiculously sweet electric skateboard?  Then the X1 is the board for you!

No longer just a last mile solution, the Exway X1 electric skateboard is the perfect balance of traditional long boarding and technology.  Weighing in at 14 pounds, this dual-hub motor electric skateboard is one of the lightest and most powerful boards on the market.  With speeds of up to 25 mph, the ability to attack hills with more than 30% grade, and up to 10 miles of range, the Exway X1 blows doors on the competition. Shred your neighborhood in style on the sleekest board out there, the Exway X1!

Intelligent core:

Our custom sensored Field Oriented Control (FOC) ESC is the best ESC in the industry. Starting in sensored mode and transitioning to sensorless mode allows for an incredibly smooth and progressive acceleration curve, while maintaining a ton of power on the top end.  When you want to slow down, our regenerative electric brake is super reliable and helps to add back some charge to the battery.

Direct drive brushless motor:

 

Our high performance, direct drive brushless motors are high efficiency, fully sealed hub motors that are water resistant, dust-proof, and virtually maintenance free.

With max power of 1,000 watts x2, up to 30% hill climbing ability, and no belt drag, you've never felt an electric skateboard like this!

How does the torque of the Exway X1 stand up to the competition? Check out this chart from Skate Metrics:

R1 - OLED / Vibrating remote:

The Exway R1 remote is the most comfortable and intuitive remote in the industry.  The contour and soft texture feels nice in your hand and the precision thumbwheel allows the rider to maximize control and provides the smoothest acceleration and deceleration.

See real time speedometer and battery levels on the OLED display, and receive vibrating feedback so you don't need to look at it.  There are 4 speed modes for riders of all ability levels.

Seismic Aeon 45º trucks:

Based in Boulder, Colorado this truck company has been developing top notch trucks since 1993.  These trucks are the best you will find on any electric skateboard bar-none.

Composite deck construction:

Composite cutaway deck made with Canadian Maple, Bamboo, Fiberglass, and Carbon Fiber with a tapered layup designed for better handling at high speeds.

The deck profile has a 10mm radial concave depth and 24cm extra wide width to provide maximum control and stance freedom.

The deck is covered with a military grade coating making the Exway X1 the most scratch proof electric board on the market.

The cliff notes:

X1 Pro

-Redesigned even move powerful dual hub motors
-Top speed 29 MPH (with turbo)
-Hill grade – 30%
-Range – 16 Miles
-Turbo mode
-Quick charging compatible
-85mm wheels with an extra set of rear 85's in the box (compatible with 80 & 83mm)
-Vibration absorbing grip tape
-Riot compatible

X1
-Top Speed 25 MPH
-Hill Grade – 30%
-Range – 10 Miles
-Quick Charging Compatible
-80mm stock with an extra set of 83 rear's in the box (compatible up to 85mm)
-Standard Grip Tape

Ready to order? Check out what's in the box: 

 

Meet the Team:

Exway is working hard at developing world wide relationships.   No matter where you are, if you have a question, comment or concern, we will do our best to help.  

Thanks for checking out our campaign, and we hope you enjoy your new Exway board!

You can freely kick your X1 Pro just like you can your old-school longboard.*RIOT - Optional belt drive system:Prefer a belt drive?  We've got you covered.  With the optional Riot system, simply swap the hub motors and replace them with belts.  The Riot system screams and will be available in April.  New wheel formula:              The new 85mm wheels come stock on the X1 Pro. Featuring an all new tech savvy gel core,  these wheels gives you more control, faster roll, and will last longer.  Enjoy intuitive feedback without sacrificing traction.The X1 Pro is now smarter than ever:With Field Oriented Control (FOC) motor design, you can shred with confidence because you have the most reliable board in the world.  State of the art sensors are placed throughout the Pro, so your board is constantly thinking, reporting, and adjusting to your riding style.  You will always feel at home on the X1 Pro whether you are on your first electric skateboard, or you are a high speed shredder.The smartest ESC in the business:– Proprietary to Exway, the ESC is always computing to alert you of any problems that your board experiences.  – If your X1 Pro detects unusual conditions, your remote will let you know by vibrating and displaying the error on the OLED screen.– Overcharge, overvoltage, and overheat protections built in.1.5mm added thickness brings 56% higher range:It’s not just a statistic, it’s pure science.  Our decks are thin, real thin.  They allow us to keep the lowest profile boards available.  Not only have we increased our battery capacity, we have also adopted an all new EBS regenerative braking system allowing you to get 56% more range out of the X1 Pro.R1 – Intelligent remote control:-The refinished Pro remote now has a more ergonomic grip and better skin coating for that grip that won’t quit.-With a Holzer type rolling throttle design, enjoy a more precise throttle control than before.-Our traditional 4 speed mode is one of the things we knew people loved about the X1.  So, we didn’t change it.The perfect amount of concave:– We are control freaks. We have found the absolute optimal amount of concave in our decks.– Carve better, carve harder, with your feet cradled into place on the deck of a truly precise board.– We will never compromise, which is why we are still using Industry leading 45 degree Seismic Aeon Trucks.  They rock!Here is the latest review of the X1 Pro:http://www.electricskateboardhq.com/exway-x1-pro-review/Exway X1:
      
The Original Exway Board:If you want the lightest board on the market and don't need the added range, the Exway X1 has lead the path of innovation and technology in the electric skateboard market.  This board has all of the perks of the X1 Pro but without all of the bells and whistles.   On a budget but still want a ridiculously sweet electric skateboard?  Then the X1 is the board for you!No longer just a last mile solution, the Exway X1 electric skateboard is the perfect balance of traditional long boarding and technology.  Weighing in at 14 pounds, this dual-hub motor electric skateboard is one of the lightest and most powerful boards on the market.  With speeds of up to 25 mph, the ability to attack hills with more than 30% grade, and up to 10 miles of range, the Exway X1 blows doors on the competition. Shred your neighborhood in style on the sleekest board out there, the Exway X1!Intelligent core:Our custom sensored Field Oriented Control (FOC) ESC is the best ESC in the industry. Starting in sensored mode and transitioning to sensorless mode allows for an incredibly smooth and progressive acceleration curve, while maintaining a ton of power on the top end.  When you want to slow down, our regenerative electric brake is super reliable and helps to add back some charge to the battery.Direct drive brushless motor:

 
Our high performance, direct drive brushless motors are high efficiency, fully sealed hub motors that are water resistant, dust-proof, and virtually maintenance free.With max power of 1,000 watts x2, up to 30% hill climbing ability, and no belt drag, you've never felt an electric skateboard like this!How does the torque of the Exway X1 stand up to the competition? Check out this chart from Skate Metrics:R1 - OLED / Vibrating remote:The Exway R1 remote is the most comfortable and intuitive remote in the industry.  The contour and soft texture feels nice in your hand and the precision thumbwheel allows the rider to maximize control and provides the smoothest acceleration and deceleration.See real time speedometer and battery levels on the OLED display, and receive vibrating feedback so you don't need to look at it.  There are 4 speed modes for riders of all ability levels.Seismic Aeon 45º trucks:Based in Boulder, Colorado this truck company has been developing top notch trucks since 1993.  These trucks are the best you will find on any electric skateboard bar-none.Composite deck construction:Composite cutaway deck made with Canadian Maple, Bamboo, Fiberglass, and Carbon Fiber with a tapered layup designed for better handling at high speeds.The deck profile has a 10mm radial concave depth and 24cm extra wide width to provide maximum control and stance freedom.The deck is covered with a military grade coating making the Exway X1 the most scratch proof electric board on the market.The cliff notes:X1 Pro-Redesigned even move powerful dual hub motors-Top speed 29 MPH (with turbo)-Hill grade – 30%-Range – 16 Miles-Turbo mode-Quick charging compatible-85mm wheels with an extra set of rear 85's in the box (compatible with 80 & 83mm)-Vibration absorbing grip tape-Riot compatibleX1-Top Speed 25 MPH-Hill Grade – 30%-Range – 10 Miles-Quick Charging Compatible-80mm stock with an extra set of 83 rear's in the box (compatible up to 85mm)-Standard Grip TapeReady to order? Check out what's in the box:  Meet the Team:Exway is working hard at developing world wide relationships.   No matter where you are, if you have a question, comment or concern, we will do our best to help.  Thanks for checking out our campaign, and we hope you enjoy your new Exway board!

story:
Hi green people!

We are a team of three young friends with an engineering and economics background. Our vision is that people can use their own energies for their everyday transport.

We want to realize our mission intended as the provision of a versatile and human powered vehicle. It has to be affordable and suitable for all people, all the purposes and any weather condition.

We plan to finalize and optimize our prototype in order to start its production.  It will come with a number of smart options to make it suitable and fun for the largest number of needs and people.

 

The Cabriovelo

Our concept consists in a convertible pedal vehicle, usable in the winter of the coldest countries as well as around the touristic sites in the hot summer, once switched to cabrio. It features easy access and regress capabilities, an electric assistance, a large trunk and comfortable riding position. It comes with a removable child seat in the rear side.  It is very practical and versatile but also good looking.

 

Technical detail:

Convertible, folding top roof

Length: 280cm                Width: 75cm
Height: 130cm                 Seat Height: 50cm
Weight: 45kg                   Wheels: 20" rear, 16"or 20" front
Wheelbase: 160cm        Turning circle: 3m
Electric Assistance: hub motor, from 250W -on customer demand    
Range: 100 km (or more with extra battery)                  
Co2 emissions: 5g/km(EU-electricity mix)

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need Your contribution to raise funds in order to make the Cabriovelo available and affordable. You can choose between a gentle donation or a discounted pre-order. 

Here are our plans:

1st threshold: 15.000€

We will optimize our prototype and start a small production included a definite list of options.

2nd threshold: 25.000€

We plan to develop a complete do-it-yourself kit with all the components and materials needed to make an easy assembly and small packaging for transport and shipment.

3rd threshold: 50.000€

We plan to develop in parallel a special version featuring a swiveling seat and further devices for even easier access and regress: also elder and disable riders will enjoy riding the Cabriovelo in their daily life. 

4th threshold: 100.000€

We plan to start investments aimed to a scale production, such as ones for a molding process, a larger workshop and new equipment.

5th threshold: 200.000€

We plan to enlarge the rear side in order to provide a cargo version suitable for commercial and delivery purposes.

 

The Impact

We are convinced that pedal-vehicles represent an healthy mean of transport as well as savings in terms of money and pollution. They permit you to commute fun, to keep fit and to be environmentally friendly; they are cheap to run and easy to maintain and would be even more affordable if they were mass-produced.

Your contribution to the Cabriovelo project can help to make more popular this kind of green mobility...and follow a different and sustainable lifestyle!

 

Risks & Challenges

The Cabriovelo is a multi-part product: it started out as an handmade vehicle and it needs industrialization to turn into a better and cheaper product. 

One of the main obstacle is that nowadays many commuters are  not used to alternative mobility or they are scared just by the idea of sitting on a vehicle like the Cabriovelo. Our daily life is often lead by habits such as taking motorized mean of transport to reach our closest destinations. Sometimes if we get the courage to change the routine, we can discover a better lifestyle. That's what we hope to spread out.

These issues can be hard to overcome but we think that with our engineering and economics background, in conjunction with hard work, strong commitment and dedication we will carry out this project, make it available and affordable. We are working on putting together a valuable team, with the help of local companies.

 

Get the word out

Our main goal, as well as our vision, is to spread alternative mobility, sustainable and healthy. If you believe in our cause, please help us to disseminate this idea. Promote it between your friends, colleagues, all the people you know. Share it on Indiegogo and social networks, make some noise and show how well it can work!

story:
Our ride so far...

Two friends John Vournas and Doug Woodard decided to become business partners and start “Platinum Transportation” in 2010 in Phoenix Arizona. Despite the poor economy and only $8,000 available for start-up, they figured out an original and innovative method of transportation that’s been consistently desired by the nightlife crowd. They and their friend, Brandon Donnelly, are ambitious entrepreneurs held back only by lack of capital.

The idea for TranSend was had one day while driving for their company. It would be a revolution in ground transportation brought about by technology. Using GPS capabilities via Smartphone, dispatchers for cab companies would no longer be needed. Using an app designed specifically for this purpose, both the driver and person seeking a ride could communicate efficiently, directly to one-another, creating an all around improvement in the world of transportation.


Learning that no one else has an app on the market with the functionality or purpose they vision their app incorporating, Brandon, John and Doug decided to brainstorm. Over the next two months the intricacies turned into a project plan. After presenting the plan to an investor and being turned down, we realized that merely a project plan wasn’t enough. Instead a complete model of a in the form of a business plan was necessary. For three months we did extensive market research learning everything possibly could about the app industry.

Seven months after the idea originated, the strongest model of TranSend is ready for production. A development company has been contracted to build the app. Production had started but is currently at a stand-still due to the lack of capital to continue. With your help, we can finish TranSend and turn its service on allowing people to know who they are booking for transportation and do it more efficiently.

Let's Change Transportation

Want to see a really cool way to book your transportation? Look below.


If you want the easiest, fastest and greatest way to book transportation to come to life, then please contribute. Beyond making your life easier, you will be helping the outstanding members of the transportation industry. Those who provide clean vehicles and superior service will be rewarded for their excellence, for the first time ever. Would you rather give your money for a ride to the airport to an angry, old man who smells of booze and has a bad attitude, or the young student paying their way through college who always provides fast service with a smile. With TranSend you will know which one you are getting ahead of time.


If our campaign doesn't happen, people may be stuck with riding in smelly vehicles with rude drivers without ever knowing what they are getting into ahead of time! Why should we settle for that when we are in the information age?

The Long and Short

We have been working on TranSend for months now, and have several means of funding it. As it has been going, we have been funding it with earnings from our day jobs, this is a slow process. We also had an investor courting us for a while. We have modified it and are ready to give them another shot, but we don't want all our eggs in that basket so here we are at IndieGoGo. Even if we can get some of the money we need from Indie, it would be a huge step forward.


TranSend will happen one way or another, however, if the campaign does not reach our full funding goals, the money will be used in the following priorities (highest priority to lowest):

  • Necessary Programming - You can't have an app if its not actually in existence. ($40,000)
  • Legal - We need to protect ourselves from people who wish to sue is if a cabby gets out of line. ($20,000)
  • Marketing - If we raise enough capital and legal has done its stuff, YouTube Video Production, Random QR code hunts, and other fun things will be done for marketing. ($20,000)
  • Extra Programming - Any money remaining after marketing will be set aside for system maintenance, upgrades and new features. ($20,000)


No Purchase Necessary

We appreciate all of your monetary support, but other forms of support are necessary too. During our development phase please inform anyone you can (friends, family, coworkers) about our project and how to find us on IndieGoGo.com. If you know any one that could help us develop this app that would be helpful too. If you know anyone who drives a vehicle for a living, tell them about us! We will help them make more money when our app launches. Don't forget to use Facebook and Twitter to promote TranSend: The Next Revolution in Transportation.
