story:
The StarkBoard is now sold out on Indiegogo. We are continuing to take pre-orders at a discounted price of $699 until we have sufficient stock for daily shipments. Visit our shop at:

starkmobility.com

Welcome to the future of mobility!

The StarkBoard is the first of its kind. A board that comes with intelligent weight and motion sensors, propelling it forward with just a slight tilt of your body. Step on, lean forward and ride. Hands free. Master a new generation of travel in just 3 minutes!

No remote needed, you are the controller!

NO REMOTE NEEDED

Riding the StarkBoard you never have to use a remote control or other annoying control devices. NO distraction. NO connection errors. Simply enjoy the ride. From an amazing high speed race to fast braking maneuvers, the StarkBoard is completely controlled by your bodies natural movements.

 

EXPERIENCE THE RIDE

Master a new generation of travel in just 3 minutes!

The StarkBoard is controlled by a custom gyroscope sensor and multiple weight and motions sensors. Once you accelerate, the speed control monitoring system tracks all your body movements and continuously assists while riding.

YOUR CITY. YOUR ADVENTURE!

Designed to ride smoothly through your city and conquer every obstacle, the StarkBoard is up to 4X faster than walking and ALWAYS faster than waiting in traffic. With top speeds of 20 mph and 12 miles of range on a single battery, boring routines become exhilarating adventures.

 

CUSTOM MADE HUB MOTORS

To make our StarkBoard fast and powerful we developed an extra large electric hub motor. You can reach top speeds of 20mph even on rough terrains, carry heavy items and handle any obstacle without thinking twice about it. The StarkBoard is equipped with extra large wheels that contain two powerful hub motors.

Powerful Stark Mobility Dual Hub Motor

Our custom HUB motors can propel you forward on up to 15% inclines. The intelligent braking system prevents your board from rolling downhill and can even bring you to a complete stop on a decline.

 

INTELLIGENT BRAKING SYSTEM

The integrated sensor system allows you to quickly accelerate, brake in an instant and even go reverse. As soon as you step of your StarkBoard the sensors will activate the braking system instantaneously to make sure that you are safe and to keep your board within reach.

DESIGN

Removable Battery Pack

We designed the StarkBoard battery to be easily removed. Going on an extended ride of more than 12 miles and got range anxiety? No worries! Simply bring a second battery pack.

Safety First

The StarkBoard uses only certified high quality lithium cells. All our batteries are tested and are in compliance with the UN38.3 and UL2272 worldwide industry standards. Tesla uses the same type of 18650 batteries cells.

Durable Canadian Maple Ply, ABS Plastic & Forged Steel

Bright LED Lights keep you safe in the dark!

APP CONNECTED

Your StarkBoard comes ready to go and pre-charged. You won’t need a remote, no APP or anything else needed to get started. However if you want to take modify your StarkBoard riding experience or adjust the boards max speed to your individual riding style, you can download our StarkBoard APP.

Driving Modes: Choose from three driving modes to match your level and style. Beginner, Normal and Master.

Battery Control: Never run out of juice, know the exact status of your battery at all times.

Location Tracking: Track your route, distance, average speed and more!

Stealth Mode: Control the LED lights. Turn them off entirely and enter stealth mode. No one will even know that you are on an electric board.

Bluetooth Connection: Sync with Bluetooth to see sensor status and motor temperature. The APP is also used for future over-the-air software & firmware updates.

MADE FOR REAL LIFE USAGE

Hitting the streets just for fun or heading to work? No problem! We designed the board for everyday use. All electronic components are rugged, dust and splash proof with an IP62 rating.

 

OUR PROGRESS

Making a new type of electronic skateboard is much more than just fitting some existing parts together. Every little detail and component choice makes a huge difference when it comes to the final product. With the StarkBoard we based our design and material choices on proven technologies and then incorporated our our own control system and style. We hope you love it as much as we do!

 

For production we use a durable combination of Canadian Maple Ply, ABS plastic, Aluminum and Forged Steel parts to guarantee the lightest weight, toughest grip and best quality that an electric Skateboard at this price point could have.

On Stage at: 

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS

 

PERK LEVELS

* = The Ambassador Level has the perk of getting your reward super early. This also means that you will be in direct communication with our team as we make the final decisions based upon your feedback. You guys will basically be our Rockstars and Beta Testers. Your StarkBoard will come ready to roll and with a full no questions asked 1 year warranty.

Welcome to Team Stark!

PACKAGING & ACCESSORIES

Wondering about our timeline and ability to get your board ready for you? We even worked on our packaging already! Here is what you will get in your box. 

 

TEAM

Our passion for technology and design has brought us together on this new project and carries the team spirit forward on a daily basis.

Our team consists of a group of experienced technology entrepreneurs, electrical engineers and talented designers. Prior to Team Stark we have individually worked on multiple hardware and software projects including Hover Boards, Mobile Batteries, Solar Power Devices, Highly Efficient LED Lights and even iOS and Android Apps.

 

TIMELINE

 

 

 

 

WHY INDIEGOGO?

We chose Indiegogo because we believe that our backers will play an crucial role in the launch and further development of the StarkBoard. Through Indiegogo we’re not just pre-selling our boards to early adopters, but are joining a passionate community of innovators and visionaries. We are really excited about launching StarkBoard and to continue our journey. And most importantly we have to fulfill our promise to our backers!

Risks & Challenges

Making a revolutionary product is never easy. However we will make sure everything goes according to plan to meet the promised deadlines successfully once we reach our funding goal.

We know that some electronic components can have longer lead times than expected. We are planning for this already. Also since battery certifications can sometimes take longer, we made most of the necessary agreements with our manufacturer prior to launching this campaign. This helps to minimize risks for any potential obstacles and delays along the way.

We will be working with the necessary testing laboratories to assure quality control. Your feedback and support will help to us tremendously to reach our goal of delivering an amazing motion control based board to the world.

 

 

 

Download StarkBoard Press Kit

The intelligent braking system prevents your board from rolling downhill and can even bring you to a complete stop on a decline.

 
INTELLIGENT BRAKING SYSTEMThe integrated sensor system allows you to quickly accelerate, brake in an instant and even go reverse. As soon as you step of your StarkBoard the sensors will activate the braking system instantaneously to make sure that you are safe and to keep your board within reach.DESIGNRemovable Battery PackWe designed the StarkBoard battery to be easily removed. Going on an extended ride of more than 12 miles and got range anxiety? No worries! Simply bring a second battery pack.Safety FirstThe StarkBoard uses only certified high quality lithium cells. All our batteries are tested and are in compliance with the UN38.3 and UL2272 worldwide industry standards. Tesla uses the same type of 18650 batteries cells.Durable Canadian Maple Ply, ABS Plastic & Forged SteelBright LED Lights keep you safe in the dark!APP CONNECTEDYour StarkBoard comes ready to go and pre-charged. You won’t need a remote, no APP or anything else needed to get started. However if you want to take modify your StarkBoard riding experience or adjust the boards max speed to your individual riding style, you can download our StarkBoard APP.Driving Modes: Choose from three driving modes to match your level and style. Beginner, Normal and Master.Battery Control: Never run out of juice, know the exact status of your battery at all times.Location Tracking: Track your route, distance, average speed and more!Stealth Mode: Control the LED lights. Turn them off entirely and enter stealth mode. No one will even know that you are on an electric board.Bluetooth Connection: Sync with Bluetooth to see sensor status and motor temperature. The APP is also used for future over-the-air software & firmware updates.MADE FOR REAL LIFE USAGEHitting the streets just for fun or heading to work? No problem! We designed the board for everyday use. All electronic components are rugged, dust and splash proof with an IP62 rating.

 
OUR PROGRESSMaking a new type of electronic skateboard is much more than just fitting some existing parts together. Every little detail and component choice makes a huge difference when it comes to the final product. With the StarkBoard we based our design and material choices on proven technologies and then incorporated our our own control system and style. We hope you love it as much as we do! For production we use a durable combination of Canadian Maple Ply, ABS plastic, Aluminum and Forged Steel parts to guarantee the lightest weight, toughest grip and best quality that an electric Skateboard at this price point could have.On Stage at: TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS PERK LEVELS* = The Ambassador Level has the perk of getting your reward super early. This also means that you will be in direct communication with our team as we make the final decisions based upon your feedback. You guys will basically be our Rockstars and Beta Testers. Your StarkBoard will come ready to roll and with a full no questions asked 1 year warranty.Welcome to Team Stark!PACKAGING & ACCESSORIESWondering about our timeline and ability to get your board ready for you? We even worked on our packaging already! Here is what you will get in your box.  
TEAMOur passion for technology and design has brought us together on this new project and carries the team spirit forward on a daily basis.Our team consists of a group of experienced technology entrepreneurs, electrical engineers and talented designers. Prior to Team Stark we have individually worked on multiple hardware and software projects including Hover Boards, Mobile Batteries, Solar Power Devices, Highly Efficient LED Lights and even iOS and Android Apps. TIMELINE    WHY INDIEGOGO?We chose Indiegogo because we believe that our backers will play an crucial role in the launch and further development of the StarkBoard. Through Indiegogo we’re not just pre-selling our boards to early adopters, but are joining a passionate community of innovators and visionaries. We are really excited about launching StarkBoard and to continue our journey. And most importantly we have to fulfill our promise to our backers!Risks & ChallengesMaking a revolutionary product is never easy. However we will make sure everything goes according to plan to meet the promised deadlines successfully once we reach our funding goal.We know that some electronic components can have longer lead times than expected. We are planning for this already. Also since battery certifications can sometimes take longer, we made most of the necessary agreements with our manufacturer prior to launching this campaign. This helps to minimize risks for any potential obstacles and delays along the way.We will be working with the necessary testing laboratories to assure quality control. Your feedback and support will help to us tremendously to reach our goal of delivering an amazing motion control based board to the world.   Download StarkBoard Press Kit

story:
MOTORBIKES

At ONYX we are reintroducing a full-line of electric bikes taking inspiration from popular mopeds just as they were in the 70's and 80's. Both bikes offer the highest torque direct drive motors in their class while delivering a 2-stroke like power-band feeling throughout the entire throttle range.

RCR 

  THE CAFE BLASTER  

Pure Adrenaline
Meets Style

72 volts of instant torque at the twist of the throttle. Clean simple fun with stealthy speeds up to 60 mph, and a 45-75 mile range for exploring on and off the beaten path.

 
 

75

MILE MAX RANGE

 
 

60

MPH TOP SPEED

 
 

72

VOLTS

RCR - TEASER VIDEO

CTY 

  THE FREE SPIRIT  

Pure Adrenaline
Meets Style

48 volts of instant torque at the twist of the throttle. Clean simple fun with speeds at 30+ mph, and a 25-40 mile range to get you all around town or your favorite campground.


 
 

40

MILE MAX RANGE

 
 

30+

MPH TOP SPEED

 
 

48

VOLTS

CTY - TEASER VIDEO

PIMP YOUR RIDE!

 

We teamed up with Treatland the premiere moped parts and accessories shop to offer the ability to personalize either of the electric ONYX bikes. With countless bolt-on options you can truly make a one of a kind ONYX like no other e-bike on the market today! To see some of the already available ONYX parts and accessories head over to Treatland by clicking here >>> TREATLAND.TV

 
 
 

RCR - 72V

2 Stroke Power-Band Fast
Experience the power-band torque of kitted two stroke motors throughout the entire RPM range. Get up to speed in 4 seconds or take it off road and unleash the full potential.

 

RCR - BATTERY

Double Your Range!

Go farther and keep having fun with an extra RCR 22ah 72V Battery + 5a Charger. (Charge time 3.5-4hrs)

 

CTY - 48V

 

Quick Clean Fun!
Get around town while having the most fun you've had in a long time. Being electric lets you take it anywhere a bike can go. Park it on sidewalks, ride in the bike lane, and even take it up the elevator to your desk.

 

CTY - BATTERY

Double Your Range!

Go farther and keep having fun with an extra CTY 16AH 48V Battery + 2a Charger. (Charge time 2.5-3hrs) 

 

DRT - UPGRADE KIT

Help spread the word to reach our minimum goal of $400k that will unlock the DRT kit that fits both the CTY and RCR. The exclusive DRT - Upgrade Kit turns any of our bikes into a killer scrambler to blaze those back country trails or thrash around the most challenging urban terrain. 

DRT KIT INCLUDES

 

+ 17" x 2.75" Knobby Tires

+ Fenders

+ Headlight Grill

+ Fork Tube Dust Covers

+ Rear Trail Rack (w/ sidebag supports)

OUR STORY

At onyx our focus is to reintroduce built tough, fun to ride, nostalgic motorbikes with an updated affordable electric drive-train. We believe every step counts in the efforts to push the world forward.

 

TIMELINE

story:
Introducing Backfire Ranger X1

In late 2017, Backfire launched the Galaxy G2 campaign, it is a great success(with 800+ backers, thank you!), our customers loved it. But we didn't stop there, because we want more, because our customers want more, during the years, many of our customers asked: Do you have bigger wheels? Can I ride on grass or hills or even with mud? Can I ride longer and further? Now we have got an answer for all these questions: Backfire Ranger X1!

Backfire Ranger X1 Features

Larger Battery with 21miles Range

When it comes to electric skateboards, range and speed is the one of the most discussed topic. Ranger X1 has improved larger battery pack(36V, 14Ah capacity) with LG Cells, it can ride as far as 21 miles(the data here is from real tests, test condition: 30kph average riding speed, 75kg rider's weight, on smooth flat road with gentle breeze), and reach top speed up to 22mph(36kph). Watch the video below to see Backfire Ranger X1's real world range test result:

 

Full Body Water and Dust Proof

Unlike those who claims to be all-terrain skateboard, Ranger X1 is a real all-terrain skateboard with water and dust proof mechanism. Major components on the board like the ESC module and the battery modules are covered and protected with special materials, now, you don't need to worry about hurting your board when riding in bad weather.

All-Terrain Wheels with Replaceable Tires

To get great riding experience, bigger wheels alone is not enough. That's why we give Ranger X1 airless rubber wheels, it has special honeycomb architecture, and it's independently replaceable. Unlike traditional PU tires used on many skateboards, this special rubber tire has improved friction, it also absorbs shocking during riding.

Watch the original video footages by Daniel below, see how Ranger X1 looks like when riding in the wild, it is so much fun just watching him riding this:

Hub Motor System: Less Complicated, More Reliable

Ranger X1 is not the only all-terrain electric skateboard in the market, but unlike many other all-terrain skateboards with clumsy motor-belt-gear drive system, Ranger X1 has Hub Motors! This means Ranger X1 doesn't need all these standalone motors belts gears and all these small parts, the motor the wheel and the tire are naturally fitted into one solid piece, the entire power system is just much simpler and more efficient and responsive. As an all-terrain electric skateboard, you would probably ride under tough condition(with water dust sand rock or mud), those complicated motor-belt-gear system with so many exposed parts are more likely to break or get stuck, causing so much trouble to clean or fix them, while hub motors are less likely to break.

Double Kingpin Truck with Great Carving Experience

Many of you may be wondering what would it feel to ride a skateboard with such big wheels? The answer is: it's just like your old ones, if not better. Because Ranger X1 is equipped with double kingpin trucks, minimum turning radius is only 2 meters! Together with the 6.5"" wheels,  you get all-terrain riding experience without sacrificing maneuverability, it still gives you the same if not better carving experience!

Specially Designed Curved Deck

Deck is an essential part of an electric skateboard, that's why we put significant effort on Ranger X1's deck. It has specially designed curved shape, which fits your feet better and gives your feet extra support when you are riding, don't forget that Ranger X1 is an all-terrain skateboard, when you are riding on hills or grass, you will need this.

Indiegogo Campaign Special Offers

FREE LED Light for Every Backer!

Led light is a must-have gadget for your skateboard, and we got you covered, every Ranger X1 skateboard now includes a FREE led light!

Get A Free Backfire T-Shirt by Sharing the Campaign

A lot of our dear backers helped spread the words of Backfire to the world, and we really appreciate this! We now have a special gift for those who share this campaign on social media, here's how you can get it with two simple steps(Backers Only):

Step 1: Share the campaign, click the one of these share buttons on the top right corner of the campaign page, right beside the “BACK IT” button, and share this campaign to your network or any other social media of your choice.

Step 2: Leave a comment, once you shared the campaign, go to the “COMMENTS” section of this campaign,  make a comment, write something like: “Can't wait to get this! Shared on my facebook(INSERT A LINK TO THE POST), my order number is #11111!”, or anything you want, but remember to include a link to your post and your order number, we will add the T-shirt to your order after we see your comment. Any question, contact us at adi@helloskate.com

How Do People Think About Ranger X1?

Watch these videos on youtube, see how Ranger X1 looks like in real life!

 

Ranger X1 Comparison

* Bamboo GT data are fetched from its Official website.

Who We Are: The Team Behind Ranger X1

BACKFIRE has been designing and manufacturing skateboards for over 10 years. Our founder Randy Jee is also an experienced skateboard rider who started riding 16 years ago. We make skateboards, we ride skateboards, we love skateboards, we understand skateboards! This campaign is our second one, we launched our first campaign Galaxy G2 in late 2017. Our experience in making and selling skateboards worldwide guarantees the success of the campaign.

Risks and Challenges

Shipping and Production

Backfire has been manufacturing skateboards for over 10 years, and in 2017 we launched our first Indiegogo Campaign for Backfire Galaxy G2, we successfully shipped the orders to all our backers all over the world on time. This is our second campaign on Indiegogo, development for Ranger X1 is done, we are already in early production stage, we will start shipping Ranger X1 on 25th Aug 2018 to our backers.

Warranty Policy

We provide 180 day full protection for your boards. This warranty does not apply to any skateboard that has been abused, misused, or damaged during accidents. Defects caused by tampering or unauthorized alterations or repairs are also not covered by this warranty either.

SAFETY

Please wear a helmet and other protective equipments when you ride electric skateboards. Before you riding on the street or near the crowd, make sure that you already fully understands how to ride the electric skateboard. When you are riding, always pay attention to your surroundings, be  especially careful when there are cars, bike or people around you. It is solely the rider's responsibility to avoid any accident causing injuries or property loss. 

LEGALITY

Please check your local legal requirement for electric vehicles and electric skateboards before you use it, the laws and regulations vary by countries, states or counties.

FAQ

Q: When do you ship it?

A: Shipping will start on 25th August 2018.

Q: Can you deliver it to my country?

A: We ship to most countries in the world, so don't worry, we have warehouse in China Europe and North America.

Q: Weight of the board?

A: The prototype version of the board weights 29lbs(13.15kg), the final production version will be around 24.5lbs(11kg).

Q: How to contact you if I have a question?

A: You can leave a comment on the campaign page, we will answer it. Or you can write us an email: adi@helloskate.com, or leave us a message on our facebook: https://www.facebook.com/backfireskateboards/, or our Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/backfireboards/

Q: I never ride skateboards before, can I ride it?

A: Yes, absolutely! For those who are new to electric skateboards, here's something you need to know: electric skateboards are much simpler and easier to ride than ordinary skateboards, typically, beginners with no skateboard experience can learn to ride an electric skateboard within a few hours.

story:
The Micro ultra-compact smart electric utility folding bike, especially with urban commuters in mind.

With a range of over 60 km, 25 kph electric top-speed and a weight of only 14.8 kgs, the city is all yours! And the best: No licence, insurance or helmet required and 100 % public transport ready!

 

The high-performance 360 Wh battery is removable and hidden in the rear frame tube for easy removal and home charging!

 

Small, smart and tough!

Our design goal was to create the smartest and toughest urban micro electric folding ebike that can be stored in even the tiniest spaces and offers all the benefits of a folding bike without sacrificing comfort, size, safety and cool looks!

 

 

One of the toughest frames in its class

UNI Micro is designed for standard EU/ US riders and is considerable larger and stronger than most electric folding bikes designed for asian markets.  Micros handle bar height is about 5 cm higher than on most folding bikes in the lightweight class and the frame is designed for rider weights of up to 110 kgs. 

 

Integrated Cargo Rack 

Cargo racks often come as an expensive extra. We integrated it into UNI Micro and designed it for up to 25 kg max. load! We also will soon offer  a smaller front rack as well!

 

 

Child seat ready

Of course, as a  true urban bike Micro needs to be safe and equipped for child transport, so we made it work with the most popular child-seat systems with seat tube clamps!

 

 

Unique folding system, public transport ready

We designed our own unique folding system, so your Micro ebike will just fold away in only two seconds! Micro folds in only three simple steps: Fold your handgrips, fold the steering pole and push the seat down into locked position, DONE!

 

 

Vertical parking and super easy handling

UNI Micro not only folds down in just 3 seconds, it can also be parked upright, where you can easily move it around on its integrated rear wheels without needing to carry or lift your bike!

You can fit 5  Micros in the space of just one regular bicycle, making them perfect for company bike solutions, hotels and bike rentals. We even have a special charging/ storage box available!

 

 

 

Integrated phone holder, lock and charger

EVERONE gets a phone holder today, so we just figured we may include it in the design of our smart electric folding bike. No mounting and rattling, just put your phone on, plug it to the USB charger an GO...

 

Integrated bottle / Sound tube holder

The  Micro e-bike comes with a multi-functional steering bar locking mechanism that double-acts as a bottle holder (Bottle INCLUDED!). YES, you can also put your bluetooth sound tube there!

 

Powerful hub-drive electric motor

Micro is powered by a geared, high performance 250 /350 W front hub drive that assists you to up to 25 KPH and makes riding your UNI Micro a NO SWEAT experience... Even towing a trailer is no problem with UNI Micro!

 

Micro bike trailer connecting mount included!

To us, a true urban bike needs to be tough and versatile! We designed a small, lightweight and foldable shopping trolley trailer that enables you to also do your shopping runs with UNI Micro without needing to look for your car keys...

 

Front and rear carbon steel disc brakes

Riding an electric bike in an urban environment means that you have to rely on your brakes. So we threw in the best micro disc brakes from TEKTRO into the package!

 

Extra FAT 16 inch all terrain tires!

Like on UNIMoke, we added a set puncture-resident EXTRA FAT tires for smooth, safe and comfortable riding in all urban situations! 

 

Integrated Wheel Lock!

We offer THREE lock types: BASIC (included), AXA Smart Bluetooth and AXA-Smart Module with GPS tracking and alarm to cover all of safety and theft protection...

 

Integrated LED lighting!

Forget about click-on, clamp on or rattling light solutions! We integrated SUPER bright LED lights into the frame design of our folding micro bike. Check!

 

Fully-Loaded with features!

Compare all the features of the UNI MICRO electric folding bike with other designs and see how much Bang for the Buck you are getting!

 

 

 

​Get yours NOW and save up to 60 %!

 

Besides being super smart, foldable and super cool looking, we packed everything into this little bike a urban commuter would EVER want to have!

 
  • High performace disc brakes forth and back
  • Up to 110 kg rider weight
  • Frame size adapted to European/ US riders up to to 195 cm 
  • Aircraft-grade aluminum frame/ TIG/WIG welded
  • 10 AH/ 360 Wh Samsung removable battery pack for SUPER range
  • Up to 70 km of range on a SINGLE Charge
  • Intergrated LED lighting/ brake lights front and rear
  • Mulit-Purpose cargo rack and support wheels
  • Child-seat ready and great otional panier bags
  • 3 gear NEXUS hub shifter
  • Extra FAT 16 inch puncture proof balloon tires
  • Foldable Handlebars and steering post.
  • Adjustable saddle
  • Integrated Mobile phone holder 
  • USB charger
  • Integrated bottle holder
  • Universal mount for AXA Smart lock and other rim locks
  • Maximum Range of 70 km on flat terrain
  • Great hill climping capability due to high torque engine
  • 25/ 32 Km/h versions available (EU/ USA)
  • High quality shipping box that can be used as a home-storage box

And much more....
story_txt:
The Micro ultra-compact smart electric utility folding bike, especially with urban commuters in mind.With a range of over 60 km, 25 kph electric top-speed and a weight of only 14.8 kgs, the city is all yours! And the best: No licence, insurance or helmet required and 100 % public transport ready! The high-performance 360 Wh battery is removable and hidden in the rear frame tube for easy removal and home charging! Small, smart and tough!Our design goal was to create the smartest and toughest urban micro electric folding ebike that can be stored in even the tiniest spaces and offers all the benefits of a folding bike without sacrificing comfort, size, safety and cool looks!  One of the toughest frames in its classUNI Micro is designed for standard EU/ US riders and is considerable larger and stronger than most electric folding bikes designed for asian markets.  Micros handle bar height is about 5 cm higher than on most folding bikes in the lightweight class and the frame is designed for rider weights of up to 110 kgs.  Integrated Cargo Rack Cargo racks often come as an expensive extra. We integrated it into UNI Micro and designed it for up to 25 kg max. load! We also will soon offer  a smaller front rack as well!  Child seat readyOf course, as a  true urban bike Micro needs to be safe and equipped for child transport, so we made it work with the most popular child-seat systems with seat tube clamps!  Unique folding system, public transport readyWe designed our own unique folding system, so your Micro ebike will just fold away in only two seconds! Micro folds in only three simple steps: Fold your handgrips, fold the steering pole and push the seat down into locked position, DONE!   Vertical parking and super easy handlingUNI Micro not only folds down in just 3 seconds, it can also be parked upright, where you can easily move it around on its integrated rear wheels without needing to carry or lift your bike!You can fit 5  Micros in the space of just one regular bicycle, making them perfect for company bike solutions, hotels and bike rentals. We even have a special charging/ storage box available!   Integrated phone holder, lock and chargerEVERONE gets a phone holder today, so we just figured we may include it in the design of our smart electric folding bike. No mounting and rattling, just put your phone on, plug it to the USB charger an GO... Integrated bottle / Sound tube holderThe  Micro e-bike comes with a multi-functional steering bar locking mechanism that double-acts as a bottle holder (Bottle INCLUDED!). YES, you can also put your bluetooth sound tube there! Powerful hub-drive electric motorMicro is powered by a geared, high performance 250 /350 W front hub drive that assists you to up to 25 KPH and makes riding your UNI Micro a NO SWEAT experience... Even towing a trailer is no problem with UNI Micro! Micro bike trailer connecting mount included!To us, a true urban bike needs to be tough and versatile! We designed a small, lightweight and foldable shopping trolley trailer that enables you to also do your shopping runs with UNI Micro without needing to look for your car keys... Front and rear carbon steel disc brakesRiding an electric bike in an urban environment means that you have to rely on your brakes. So we threw in the best micro disc brakes from TEKTRO into the package! Extra FAT 16 inch all terrain tires!Like on UNIMoke, we added a set puncture-resident EXTRA FAT tires for smooth, safe and comfortable riding in all urban situations!  Integrated Wheel Lock!We offer THREE lock types: BASIC (included), AXA Smart Bluetooth and AXA-Smart Module with GPS tracking and alarm to cover all of safety and theft protection... Integrated LED lighting!Forget about click-on, clamp on or rattling light solutions! We integrated SUPER bright LED lights into the frame design of our folding micro bike. Check! Fully-Loaded with features!Compare all the features of the UNI MICRO electric folding bike with other designs and see how much Bang for the Buck you are getting!   ​Get yours NOW and save up to 60 %! Besides being super smart, foldable and super cool looking, we packed everything into this little bike a urban commuter would EVER want to have! 
High performace disc brakes forth and back
Up to 110 kg rider weight
Frame size adapted to European/ US riders up to to 195 cm 
Aircraft-grade aluminum frame/ TIG/WIG welded
10 AH/ 360 Wh Samsung removable battery pack for SUPER range
Up to 70 km of range on a SINGLE Charge
Intergrated LED lighting/ brake lights front and rear
Mulit-Purpose cargo rack and support wheels
Child-seat ready and great otional panier bags
3 gear NEXUS hub shifter
Extra FAT 16 inch puncture proof balloon tires
Foldable Handlebars and steering post.
Adjustable saddle
Integrated Mobile phone holder 
USB charger
Integrated bottle holder
Universal mount for AXA Smart lock and other rim locks
Maximum Range of 70 km on flat terrain
Great hill climping capability due to high torque engine
25/ 32 Km/h versions available (EU/ USA)
High quality shipping box that can be used as a home-storage box
And much more....

story:
Have you ever wondered why wheel sensors use magnets?

To measure speed from distance,... by wheel revolution,... with 360-degree precision or 7 feet (over 2 meters).

The new VeloComputer HUBTM sensor uses no magnets and measures distance with 1" inch (25 mm) precision.

This patent pending magnet-less technology eliminates a hassle adjusting the magnet on a spoke every time cyclists mounts the wheel. The new VeloComputer HUBTM sensor is practically invisible, almost weightless, and always on when you are on your bike.

Hi,

My name is Vlad Savchenko. I am a founder of SoundOfMotion - the creator of the VeloComputer Smart Sensors and mobile apps.

We invested 7 years in research and development before inventing this magnet-less sensors. After releasing 4 versions of high precision sensors in the past we've received valuable feedback. The new sensor requires no calibration, yet still delivers high precision measuring distance, spot speed and acceleration.

As you can see from the video we have a working prototype and are ready to go into production.

Will you join us in this wheel revolution?


What We Need

The funds we need to jump start this project will be used for:

  • FCC, IC, CE certification
  • Components for manufacturing


What You Get

Magnet-less sensor for your bike computer, watch or smartphone.

HUBTM sensor comes in 2 versions: Bluetooth Smart and ANT+

VeloComputer HUBTM Bluetooth Smart sensor features:

  • Supports standard Bluetooth Smart cycling speed profile for full wheel revolution - 360-degree precision or 7 feet (over 2 meters)
  • Works with iPhone and Android 4.3+ smartphones (application required)
  • Supports 1" inch precision for distance, speed and acceleration profiles (available in VeloComputer app on Android or iPhone)
  • 300 hours of continuous use on a single coin cell CR2032 battery
    200 with high precision VeloComputer profile
  • Turns on automatically as soon as motion is detected
  • Turns off automatically when no phone is connected
  • No tools mount

VeloComputer HUBTM ANT+ sensor features:

  • Supports standard ANT+ cycling speed profile for full wheel revolution (360-degree precision)
  • Works with all ANT+ devices, like Garmin watches and bike computers
  • 300 hours of continuous use on a single coin cell CR2032 battery
  • Turns on automatically as soon as motion is detected
  • Turns off automatically when no device is connected
  • No tools mount

SEATTM sensor for grade & cadence

In addition we introduce a SEATTM sensor to measure grade of a slope and cadence. It uses the same hardware as the HUBTM sensor, but has different firmware and profiles.

The grade of a road slope is measured in percentage.

The cadence is extracted from a lateral motion of the seat post when the cyclist is pedaling.

SEATTM sensor also comes in 2 versions: Bluetooth Smart and ANT+

VeloComputer SEATTM Bluetooth Smart sensor features:

  • Supports standard Bluetooth Smart cycling cadence and road grade profiles
  • Works with iPhone and Android 4.3+ smartphones
    (grade available in VeloComputer app on Android or iPhone)
  • 300 hours of continuous use on a single coin cell CR2032 battery
    Turns on automatically as soon as lateral motion is detected
  • Turns off automatically when no phone is connected
  • No tools mount

VeloComputer SEATTM ANT+ sensor features:

  • Supports standard ANT+ cycling speed profile for full wheel revolution (360-degree precision)
  • Works with all ANT+ devices, like Garmin watches and bike computers
  • 300 hours of continuous use on a single coin cell CR2032 battery
  • Turns on automatically as soon as lateral motion is detected
  • Turns off automatically when no device is connected
  • No tools mount

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Get the word out and make some noise about magnet-less sensor
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools

Thank you!

VeloComputer magnet-less sensor.

No magic, pure science.TM

story:
Incline 10 degrees

GoTube has power to handle inclines up to 10 degrees to easily conquer incline.

 

Damping

Both the front and rear wheels have shock absorption for a smooth ride.

 

Super Portable

GoTube folds up and has a carrying case with strap for the ultimate in portability.

 

 

Speed control

The tachometer readout and push-button speed control are simple and intuitive.

 

Charges phones and tablets

GoTube has a USB port to easily charge phones and mobile devices anytime.

 

Night Mode

 

 

 

 

 

Our designers insisted on a concept that was useful, efficient and elegant. The minimalist design reflects those characteristics beautifully.

 

 

 

 

 

General

  • Weight: 12.8Lbs (5.8Kg)
  • Capacity: 330Lbs(150Kg )

Power

  • Battery: 36V 4Ah
  • Motor: 120W

Dimensions

  • Folded: 743 mm x 137 mm x 97 mm
  • Unfolded: 743 mm x 415 mm x 927 mm
  • Tire diameter: 88.9 mm

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

 

FAQ

 
  • How much does GoTube weight?

    The GoTube weighs in at a lean 5.8 kg with the battery installed.

     
  • Can the battery be removed?

    No, the battery is non-removable.

     
  • Can you extend the height of handlebar?

    There is space limitation for the Gotube, We can't extend the rob currently. But we will consider about to make more perfect size for upgrade version of Gotube.

     
  • Does Gotube have braking？

    Yes, the braking button/lever on the handle bar.

     
  • Does Gotube have horn?

    Since there is no space foe the horn when fold the handle and rod. But maybe we can add it as accessory. It can be pulled down before folding.

     
  • What is the weight capacity and the max speed of GoTube?

    It has a weight capacity of approximately 150kg, and the top speed is about 15KM/h.

     
  • How far can Gotube travel on a charge?

    It can travel approximately 15km per charge, depending on use and load.

     
  • What is the type and the brand of Gotube battery?

    It is LG 18650 rechargeable lithium battery.

     
  • Could you possible to explore a more powerful battery and motor as stretch goals or higher top-speeds?

    Currently we don't change the motors for this version because of the space limited. But for the battery ,we have 2 options 4.0Ah and 5.2Ah. You can choose the right battery type according to your needs.

     
  • Can it be peddled easy if runs out of batteries?

    Yes, it can be used easily as a normal scooter when batteries run out.

     
  • How can we do if the road inclination is over 10 degree?

    In order to protect the scooter performance, we suggest to turn off the scooter and work it on as a common scooter or push it through the road.

     
  • Can you take goTube on plane?

    Yes, it can be brought on plane as check-in luggage.

     
  • Can the charging dock will be available so that it is more convenient for charging?

    We have such consideration in upgrade version and it will also have bluetooth speaker function. But currently, it won't make change.

     
  • What is the warranty of Gotube?

    We provide 180 days warranty.

     
  • Is it possible for users to do own repair and maintenance of the scooter if anything goes wrong?

    At the moment ,the users can't make the repair by themselves. There is small tools set in the package, users can handle some small problems. And for other problems, we suggest users contact professional maintenance personnel

     
  • Must the users send the Gotube to HK /China every time when it breaks down or needs servicing?

    We shall have local agent who can handle the after sales service, You don't need to send it back to HK. Any quality problems or needs repair accessories , You can contact our local agents to help you.

What is the warranty of Gotube?

Is it possible for users to do own repair and maintenance of the scooter if anything goes wrong? 

At the moment ,the users can't make the repair by themselves. There is small tools set in the package, users can handle some small problems. And for other problems, we suggest users contact professional maintenance personnel
 



Must the users send the Gotube to HK /China every time when it breaks down or needs servicing? 

We shall have local agent who can handle the after sales service, You don't need to send it back to HK. Any quality problems or needs repair accessories , You can contact our local agents to help you.

story:
History 

Founded in 2007, by Aaron Ellison, the Ellison Corporation (d/b/a Ellison Traffic Control Systems, LLC) (“Ellison”) creates innovative safety devices for public roadways. 

The mission of the Ellison Corporation is to remove the fear currently experienced by emergency responders as they proceed as rapidly as possible to provide aid, prevent a crime, or put out a fire.  Even though emergency vehicles come equipped with sirens and their own flashing lights, this is often not enough with all the distractions of today’s drivers. There are no breakthrough, attention grabbing, green, modern looking systems available to city, county and state transportation agencies that effectively warn the public an emergency vehicle is approaching.

The Ellison Corporation was birthed from the Detroit Based Initiative business development program (“DBI”). The DBI program is a part of TechTown, an entrepreneurial research and technology park located on the campus of Wayne State University. The Ellison Corporation’s first project is the Emergency Response Warning System. This is an innovative safety system designed to reduce the number of injuries and accidents with property and collateral damage that often occur when emergency vehicles are not given the right of way while responding to emergencies. 

About the product

The Emergency Response Warning System, (ERWS) is a patented revolutionary traffic control system that integrates pre-emption/priority control, traffic control and green technology all in one complete package.  ERWS features red and blue flashing LED lights to grab the attention of motorists who otherwise wouldn’t see nor hear a siren from an oncoming emergency vehicle. This can be due in part from many distractions inside the vehicle, loud music, well insulated cabins, or an inattentive driver.  Many experts in the transportation industry and emergency responders who have been privileged to see and understand the technology behind the ERWS, have said that this system will be the most effective compared to similar products on the market. The Michigan State police have approved the installation of a EWRS system on their test track; thereby demonstrate their strong belief and support of the system.

Need

Funds are needed for tooling, upto 14 parts for installation and testing at our state police trainging facility in Lansing, MI. 8 of these completed parts will be used for demostration purposes. Funds will also help with installation and testing for two cities and one local university that has expressed interest in being part of the pilot program. Although there is no official endorsement from our state police agency nor the state's transportation agency, we are thrilled to have them both on board to assist us with testing and proving out this system. Funds will allow us to purchase 10 wind turbines, solar panels, LEDs lights and all the internal components needed for proper testing. Finally, we will also allocate funds to redo our website which was comprimised. 

Benefits

For example, in 2007, in the State of Michigan, there were over 2,300 accidents involving emergency vehicles, resulting in four (4) of fatal accidents and 69 A-level incapacitating injuries. There were 451 accidents at signalized intersections. Units in accidents of all severities at signalized intersections included 350 police, 56 fire, and 66 ambulance vehicles. According to the Office of Highway Safety Planning for Michigan, from 2008 to 2012, there were more than 6,551 collisions between emergency vehicles and motorists. We believe that once our product is put in place, it will drastically reduce these numbers.

The ERWS was created for municipalities with heavily travelled streets and intersections. Those cities looking to add cosmetic appeal for certain areas, such as large city downtown locations, are considered one of the first entities likely to implement ERWS. Secondly, cities where the political goals coincide with the principle advantages of ERWS – public safety, green technology, and energy cost savings, are likely to move forward. Cities with large numbers of motorcades would especially benefit. There are two major US cities that have expressed great interest. One wants to be the pilot city.

Features and benefits

  • ERWS meets the need for increased safety with a reliable method for getting drivers attention
  • ERWS saves taxpayer dollars over the long term with long life LED signals, solar power, and rechargeable batteries.
  • ERWS is distinctive and can meet GREEN objectives – solar and wind power.
  • ERWS is cost effective –it can operate “off the grid” in some locales, depending on options, and costs no more than current installations.
  • ERWS adds security - optional cameras are favored by homeland security.
  • ERWS WILL SAVE LIVES - motorists remain out of harms way, emergency resonders have a clear path to reach their destination safely! 

The Emergency Response Warning System (ERWS) effectively gets the drivers attention regardless of cell phone use, radio adjustment actions or volume, attentiveness, or the quietness of car cabins. ERWS utilizes six flashing warning lights, (in groups of two, on each side of the main signals and on the pole), in addition to very distinctive traffic control lenses.

story:
Meet your new S.U.V.

(Super Utility Vehicle)

With modular front and rear cargo, 20 MPH of pedal-assist boost, up to 93 miles of battery range*, plus great components and versatility -  this might be the last bike you'll ever need!

 

"These guys have thought about a lot, I am excited about this bike because it is just so thoughtfully engineered" - Check out the Electric Bike Review take on the CERO One:
 

 

 

Sky's the limit when it comes to how you can use our modular cargo baskets - here's some ideas:

 

When you ride a CERO One you will be surprised at how speedy and maneuverable it feels thanks to that smaller front wheel! 

 

DRIVE MODES AND RANGES

*Conditions may vary. For more details, please visit the Shimano STEPS technical information site HERE.

Other great advantages of the Shimano STEPS System:

 

There are several advantages to the step-through frame:

  • Easy to dismount and rest the bike when stopping at a red light or when reaching your destination. 
  • Ideal for mounting the bike and start riding quickly. 
  • Safer than a straight top tube when dealing with rear cargo.
  • Great for anyone, especially for less-experienced cyclists, women and seniors.

 

Nighttime Headlight Test:

 

Our awesome riders above are 5'2" and 6'4" respectively.

Find your comfort zone with up to 100mm of up-down range adjustability - easy to do with a quick-release clamp. 

 

 

Our awesome engineer Zach Krapfl explains more about our vision for the CERO One:

Our Creative Director Ricardo Camargo talks about the design process and influences of the CERO One:

A behind the scenes peek at our journey:

 

 

                     

 

*Accessories Shipping: Add $20 for each basket , $20 for the Yepp Seat, and $7 for each ABUS Bag or Frame Lock Chain

Detailed Information about the add-on accessories:

  • Yepp Maxi Child Seat - Additional Details HERE 
  • ABUS Bag for Chain/Water Bottle – More Details HERE
  • ABUS Chain for Frame Lock - More information HERE

 

 

PRODUCTION UPDATE - November 15, 2017

Our first production run of the CERO One is in final assembly and we're getting ready to ship the bikes over to our warehouse! Can't wait for our early backers to get riding in December! Check-out some images of the production below:

 

 

 

Compliance Testing

The CERO One's frame, fork, and rack have been certified in accordance with ISO standards and have passed MTB and Trekking-level compliance for strength and durability.

Shipping

Bikes are currently being manufactured and assembled, will arrive in the U.S. in late November, and will be shipped via UPS ground to the continental U.S. in early December (Unfortunately not Hawaii nor Alaska for now, but hopefully in the near future!)

Assembly

The bike arrives at your home with 99% shop-quality assembly, test ridden and tuned. 

Of course, we will provide a complete owners and assembly manual, as well as detailed assembly videos to help you out, and are always available to talk and answer your questions.

Check out our assembly video:

https://youtu.be/qt91XOOYQhg

Limited Warranty*

Our Warranty Policy covers the following:

*Contact CERO for complete Warranty details.

Service 

Our passionate team will handle your technical questions and concerns over the phone or by email. 

Like any bike, the CERO One requires normal maintenance from a certified professional. We recommend servicing your bike with your local bike mechanic regularly. 

Test Rides

If you are in the Los Angeles area and would like to check out the bike for yourself, come by our office during weekday business hours or contact us if you want to come check it out during the weekend!

Don't forget to follow us on Facebook and sign up for our email list to stay tuned on upcoming test ride events near your area!

 

The CERO One came to fruition through the close collaboration between CERO Bikes, GSD Global, Vapor Studio, plus the tremendous support of many other friends and collaborators.

CERO Bikes

CERO is a Los Angeles-based startup specializing in high-quality electric cargo bikes to provide people and organizations with carbon-free transportation solutions.

GSD Global

GSD is a personal transportation systems engineering company. whose principal engineers, Forrest Yelverton and Zach Krapfl have many decades of combined years in the bicycle industry, and have worked on projects for many major bicycle brands.

Vapor Studio

Vapor Studio is a multi-faceted creative agency that designs premium brands and products based in Encinitas, CA. They focus on the essential relationship between product design and branding.

A wonderful and diverse cast of people made the CERO One a reality:

 

 

IN DEVELOPMENT: the CERO Acee

CERO Bikes' next collaboration with GSD and Vapor is well underway in the form of a front loading electric cargo bike. Stay tuned for more details soon!

Early concept art for the CERO Acee electric cargo bike.

 

Transforming transportation in our cities in ways that reduce our carbon consumption and alleviate traffic will be a multi-pronged effort from people, cities and the help of innovative technologies. 

At CERO, we’re always dreaming big and looking towards the future. With your support on the CERO One project, we can continue to explore different ways to improve transportation in our cities.

Some of the concepts we are working on at CERO Bikes:
story_txt:
Meet your new S.U.V. (Super Utility Vehicle)With modular front and rear cargo, 20 MPH of pedal-assist boost, up to 93 miles of battery range*, plus great components and versatility -  this might be the last bike you'll ever need! 
"These guys have thought about a lot, I am excited about this bike because it is just so thoughtfully engineered" - Check out the Electric Bike Review take on the CERO One: 

 
 Sky's the limit when it comes to how you can use our modular cargo baskets - here's some ideas: When you ride a CERO One you will be surprised at how speedy and maneuverable it feels thanks to that smaller front wheel!  DRIVE MODES AND RANGES*Conditions may vary. For more details, please visit the Shimano STEPS technical information site HERE.Other great advantages of the Shimano STEPS System: There are several advantages to the step-through frame:
Easy to dismount and rest the bike when stopping at a red light or when reaching your destination. 
Ideal for mounting the bike and start riding quickly. 
Safer than a straight top tube when dealing with rear cargo.
Great for anyone, especially for less-experienced cyclists, women and seniors.
 Nighttime Headlight Test: Our awesome riders above are 5'2" and 6'4" respectively.Find your comfort zone with up to 100mm of up-down range adjustability - easy to do with a quick-release clamp.   Our awesome engineer Zach Krapfl explains more about our vision for the CERO One:Our Creative Director Ricardo Camargo talks about the design process and influences of the CERO One:

A behind the scenes peek at our journey:

 



 
                     

 


*Accessories Shipping: Add $20 for each basket , $20 for the Yepp Seat, and $7 for each ABUS Bag or Frame Lock Chain
Detailed Information about the add-on accessories:

Yepp Maxi Child Seat - Additional Details HERE 

ABUS Bag for Chain/Water Bottle – More Details HERE

ABUS Chain for Frame Lock - More information HERE


 


 
PRODUCTION UPDATE - November 15, 2017
Our first production run of the CERO One is in final assembly and we're getting ready to ship the bikes over to our warehouse! Can't wait for our early backers to get riding in December! Check-out some images of the production below:




 
 




 

Compliance Testing
The CERO One's frame, fork, and rack have been certified in accordance with ISO standards and have passed MTB and Trekking-level compliance for strength and durability.
Shipping
Bikes are currently being manufactured and assembled, will arrive in the U.S. in late November, and will be shipped via UPS ground to the continental U.S. in early December (Unfortunately not Hawaii nor Alaska for now, but hopefully in the near future!)

The bike arrives at your home with 99% shop-quality assembly, test ridden and tuned. 
Of course, we will provide a complete owners and assembly manual, as well as detailed assembly videos to help you out, and are always available to talk and answer your questions.

story:
My philosophy WILL REMAIN STRONG

To say that I am disappointed in the lack of support for what I believe is an important step in the right direction for local in town driving is an understatement. Am I heart broken, yes, am I discouraged, NO, will I continue...absolutely. My most appreciative gratitude to 16 wonderful people who believe in my project and in me.

My name is Gary Lavarack and I have been a fine artist, photographer, private college president, teacher, designer, inventor, digital animator and builder for my entire life. Today's automobiles are wonders of electronic engineering and technology, unfortunately they have also become so overly complex that only highly trained technicians are needed to diagnose the simplest of problems, and this becomes time consuming and more importantly very expensive to the consumer.

I wanted to design a vehicle that was based on Henry Ford's 1908 Model T idea of a simple, economically priced, easy to maintain local transportation vehicle. For every individual out there that can afford a $20,000 to $50,000 car, there are a hundred times more people that can barely afford a $10,000 vehicle. All major automotive manufacturers do not offer an inexpensive single person vehicle intended for local in town driving. 70% of all cars on all the roads at any given time are going less than 10 miles and only have one person in them, the driver. 

To quote Christopher Alan, editorial for Electric Car Insider magazine: "The electric car represents the opportunity to remove transportation from the air pollution equation. We have the capability to generate electricity entirely from renewable resources, envisioning a future with no "peak energy"' no scarcity, and stable prices that trend down, not up. Electricity can be produced and distributed using local micro grids, minimizing risks of supply interruption from natural and man made disaster".

Hybrid/Electric and True Electric automobiles are here to stay. They are green in every respect and people are buying them by the thousands because they are beginning to understand that electric vehicles are quiet, reliable and extremely efficient.

Check out this terrific Electric Car History: http://www.edisontechcenter.org/ElectricCars.html#timeline

My company is called LAVARACK ALTERNATIVE VEHICLES (LAV) because I wanted to be able to offer an alternative choice for everyone's local driving needs. At the present time we are making 4 Silver Scorpions and have already sold two. With your contribution we will be able to hire recently graduated young engineers to participate in a very needed and exciting field of designing and manufacturing totally electric NEIGHBORHOOD ELECTRIC VEHICLES in the United States.

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is to raise $10,000 to train the new engineers to design, learn, build and incorporate production components and techniques for manufacturing NEV electric vehicles. There is no reason why a small company cannot produce a reliable, safe, easy to maintain and affordable alternative to local driving needs. We would like to be the Tesla for the common man. The LAV Silver Scorpion is a zero emissions vehicle that never needs any gas, diesel fuel, oil changes, antifreeze, tune-ups, smog checks or emission tests of any kind. In 1901 Ferdinand Porsche when he was 26 years old designed and built an electric vehicle that had the motors in the wheels. The LAV Silver Scorpion has no transmission, no gears, no chains, no pulleys, no belts to ever wear out and no polluting tailpipe. The 4 independent 500 watt motors are located right in the wheels for direct, quiet and trouble free driving. If you are in the San Francisco Bay area give us a call (415-272-5940) to schedule a test drive.

Specification of the Silver Scorpion

• Weight: Less than 300lbs.

• Chassis Material: Welded 6061-T6 Alcoa or Kaiser aluminum.

• Body and Canopy: Polycarbonate.

• Range: 80-100 miles per charge depending on driving conditions.

• Batteries: For the electric motors, Lithium Ion Polymer 36V 12Ah x 4, batteries for the running lights, signal lights, headlights, GPS and Radio Lithium Ion Polymer 12V 2Ah.

• Eventual Battery Replacement: Less than $1,600. for all 4, 5 minute swap time.

• 4 wheel Hydraulic Disk Brakes

• Ford Mustang II Rack and Pinion steering

• Included Accessories: Radio with all necessary connections and Garmin GPS, Chargers for both the 36V and 12V systems are built right into the vehicle so you can charge anywhere on either 120V - 240V.

• Personalize your Silver Scorpion: Any commercially available auto color is standard.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • Tell your friends to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that’s all there is to it.

story:
contact us:  

facebook 

email us : ajc@happarel.de 

This project will fund the creation of a line of reflective bicycles specifically designed to destroy planned obsolescence with style.


Reflective Bicycles

 Reflective material in any form sends light back to its source. Our Reflective bicycles are coated in a special reflective material that does just that. The effect seen depends on the light conditions, so to pedestrians or cyclists, your frame will not be distracting, it simply ensures visibility from car drivers and safety for everybody.
 One of the best benefits; no batteries required. Your bicycle will stay reflective for seven years guaranteed, but with proper care, can stay reflective indefinitely. The bike will reflect the quality and intensity of light projected which is perfect for car headlights. 

 The images below show a comparison of indirect and direct light in a well-lit room represented here by our camera flash off (left) and on (right). The pictures on the right are an example of how reflective coating bounces back camera flash, which would simulate a car driver's perspective in daylight;

A driver's perspective;

 When driving, you are aligned with the headlight angle, when car headlights illuminate the bike frame, rims and spokes, your bike will be the most visible thing on the street. The illustration below demonstrates how the car driver (A) would see the reflection at it's most intense. The rider and pedestrian (B&C) will see a lesser amount of reflection, so you'll stand out to drivers without being distracting on the road.


 The photo below was taken from the driver's perspective inside a car. Notice how the road sign in the background shows a similar type of reflection.



The Bicycles;

 In May 2013 we got in touch with one of the major suppliers of reflective material for industrial use in Germany. The material we got our hands on is perfect to adapt to bikes because it is built to resist all weather conditions, it is anti-corrosion, coated with a strong layer of varnish and comes with a warranty of 7 years of consistent light reflection. This is exactly what you need for a bike coating, it will also protect the coated frame from rust and is scratch-resistant.

 The first frames were built as soon as we had the material so we could test it under all conditions. Over the past 10 months, all aspects of the process and the materials have successfully endured heavy daily testing, surviving direct sunlight, high humidity, winter snow, mud etc...

Anti-programmed-obsolescence;

We have one master bike-builder who has been making bicycles as a hobby and professionally for the last six years. After relying on bikes as a primary form of transport and repairing many flimsy bicycles, it became apparent that there was a need for bikes that are sturdy with a minimum amount of maintenance, there's a need for bikes that are built to last that don't come with flimsy excessive parts as standard.     A selection of components were made to ensure a light, yet durable bike that needs no replacement parts for the next 5 years; tires of solid rubber which means no punctures, front drum brakes which means no brake pad replacement,  back coaster break which means no cables to mess with, making this bike a light, reliable and swift ride.

Safer bike riding;

 Being seen on the road makes the difference between cruising and ghost riding. This project aims to improve bike safety through our reflective coating while looking stylish. The added incentive here is that it's a passive form of lighting; it requires no batteries, making it a reliable alternative with less waste. Anyone who depends on a bicycle for transport will know how many bike light batteries you go through in a year, and other bike lighting systems are extremely heavy on battery-use.
 We want to help people to be safe on the street in a environmentally-friendly way and to continue experimenting with what we love. Cycling is already the green way, so let's add more colours to that spectrum.

The Dream Team - About Us;

MECHANICS: Three passionate bike riders looking for the best ride. This crew have extensive experience in international bike trips and have the handy skills needed to build from scratch, to tweak and troubleshoot the perfect bike.

Antoine-John Capeyron - Our Tour de Force mechanic, graphic whizz, screen-printing, up-cycling illustrator and founder of Happarel.  

Michael McInerney -  Irish photographer and multimedia kiddo, self-taught bike mechanic.

Ebi Schilling -  Born in Germany, studied politics, self-taught bike mechanic with the political know-how.


BIG BRAIN KREW: These two Berliners contribute Creative and Design to our projects. 

Brian Smith - Born in Ireland, studied Music, English and Psychology, music producer, programmer, builder and broadcaster, this is the pretty face and calming voice of Happarel.

Fay Smith - Born in Germany, studied fashion design at the University of Westminster, London. Designer, crafter, personal yoga instructor to the team helping us achieve balance on and off the saddle.


Let's get deep into the Tech Specs: 

This bike is made to be loved by all type of bike riders, and for all the bad roads that you'll cross, the ride is light, sturdy, and efficient.

  • Modified Racing frame that gives enough space to fit large back tires for better comfort and grip. The Berlin streets have plenty of cobblestone paving and riding skinny tires may look good and is speedy, but you'll sacrifice comfort and can easily damage those pretty rims. This is a hybrid for the inner city, speedy and comfortable with custom built front and back wheels on Ambrosso rims.
  • Sturmey Archer drumbrake front hub.
  • Single-Speed back hub - Shimano Nexus with coaster brake.
  • Airless tires by Airfree. Warranty of 3-6,000 Miles with NO punctures!
  • Brook's Saddle (B17 Narrow / B17 Imperial).
  • Shimano Square Taper bottom braket.
  • Sturmey Archer crank.
  • USB-Rechargeable lights front and back. 
  • Each bike will have a unique digitally-engraved nameplate
 Every bike is handmade and will be unique in it's own right. Our rides deserve as much attention to every minor detail as possible, which means there's a variety of parts that may differ on each bike, such as the saddle, handelbars, crank set and the finish which, each chosen to fit with the overall individual style of the ride.

 We're working on an embedded GPS tracker which can locate the bike in case it gets lost. Depending on funding and the practicalities of a personal GPS tracker, we can add more layers of functionality.


What will we do with the funds

  • 7.000 € : Bicycle parts
  • 3.000 € : Bicycle tools 
  • 2.000 € : Advertisement / trade show fees 
  • 2.000 € : New office computers
  • 2.000 € : Mechanics' frame building workshop
  • 2.000 € : bicycle tubing
  • 2.000 € : Workshop renovations 


Finally

The aim is to make this a reference in style and safety, to motivate creators and brands to build bicycles and tools that resist obsolescence, smartly designed, safer, less wasteful and greener than ever. 

 Bike riders should stay seen and can be even more green. The only tool for maintenance you will need for this bicycle is a bottle of natural oil to be used every month to keep her running smooth (we'll even ship you one for free). Your bike will be the smoothest, safest, reflectivest, sexiest, most comfortable piece of hardware on the street.

 We love our green bikes and we appreciate the support from contributors helping to keep cycling green and keeping us doing what we do best.

Remember, keep the fun between your legs.

Wishing you a good ride from the Happarel Team.


contact us: ajc@happarel.de

story:
Make Your Urban Commute Green and Cool!

                           


   (Video shows both our current production model and the new lighter Coolpeds Air)


Introducing the new Coolpeds Air 

->Commute freely on the Lightest Electric Scooter at only 7.7kg!

                      It can charge your phone on the go too!                 

                               



www.coolpeds.us


Advantages of using Coolpeds:

Simple      Reliable     Lightweight       Affordable     Cool     Fun

Most in town commutes are within a 10 km radius, so why get stuck in traffic and pollute your community with a gas guzzling car? 

  • Coolpeds are the perfect connection to public transportation and local places
  • Zero emission in town
  • Great for getting around college campuses and warehouses
  • Coolpeds are so compact that you can park it indoor and prevent theft
  • Low cost of operation
  • Put it in your trunk and use it as an extension of your car
  • Foldable
  • Fast Charging - about 2 hours only
  • Best of all, it is cool, fun, and affordable from $299!

About Us: 

Coolpeds USA specializes in ultra compact electric transporters that offer great value and portability. 



  • Our team of designers and engineers are passionate in innovative mobility products that revolutionize the way we commute in the city.  We have already successfully launched several popular models worldwide.  Now, we  are offering you the newest and lightest scooter from Coolpeds USA. 

<--Previous Coolpeds Scooter (9.9kg)


  • This campign will be important for the production launch of the  Coolpeds Air! - a 7.7kg (16 lbs.) Electric scooter that can travel up to 40 miles on a 2 hour charge!


  • Proceeds from this campaign will contribute to the refining, tooling, production molds, and marketing of this innovative and super lightweight electric scooter to enthusiasts and commuters like you!



    Cool Features of the new Coolpeds Air

                                        


    • Ultra lightweight at about 7.7 kg (about 16 lbs) and easily foldable
    • Easy to learn and use with low center of gravity
    • Super strong and ultra lightweigh aircraft aluminum alloy foldable frame
    • Max load of about 200 lbs.

                             

    • Powerful 300W brushless in-wheel motor
    • Top speed up to 20 miles per hour
    • Lithium Ion battery (optional capacity from 6 A to 18A)
    • Regenerative brake system that recharges the battery when you brake
    • Range up from 10 to 40 miles per charge (depending on the battery you choose)
    • Front LED lighting system
    • Built-in Electric horn
    • Small and lightweight charger similar to a laptop charger
    • Takes only about 2-3 hours to fully charge


    • Optional LCD w/ blue backlight display for speed, range, battery level, etc
    • Thumb throttle control for better comfort and safety than twist throttle
    • Optional USB port for charging your phones and other electronics!

    - speed and range depends on weight of rider, road condition, wind resistance, and style of riding


                                  




                                   Perks for our backers

      For every Coolpeds we sell, we will donate $10 to the Children's Foundation of America.

      Because you're helping us get Coolpeds Air onto the market, you can save up to 40% off its expected $499 - $599 USD retail price and be one of the first in the world to own this super versitile and lightweight electric scooter!

      Here's a breakdown of the perks you can choose from when you support this campaign. Choose your perk from the sidebar at the top of this page.


      • $299- early bird super special price for a Coolpeds Air Scooter!!
      • $359- above item plus a LCD  display and USB charging port and phone stand
      • $399- all the above plus an upgraded 9 Ah battery that lasts up to 20 miles
      • $499- the 9 Ah battery will be upgraded to the monster 16 Ah battery, up to 40 miiles of range!

        United States - Shipping is $59. California State residents please add 9% to your contribution for any of the deepblue2 perks to cover sales tax.

        International Backers - Please add $179 per Coolpeds Air to your contribution to cover shipping; please pay any applicable duty/VAT/GST to the courier at time of delivery.

        Canada Backers - Shipping is $89.  Duty and GST/HST will be due upon time of delivery and will be collected by the courier.


        Successful track record

        We have already sold over 1000 scooters with our previous models.   This campaign will bring the better and lighter Coolpeds Air to you at an incredible price!

        Please check out our Coolpeds on Facebook page with over 4600 fans.

        Questions and Answers


        What voltage will the charger take?

        The charger can take 110V to 230V, which can be used in almost every country.

        Is the scooter waterproof?

        Yes, but we do not recommend using it in rain or snow.  Also protective gear such as helmet should be worn when riding.

        What is  the warranty policy?

        90 days on the frame, 1 year on battery and electronic parts, and 2 years on motor

        Can I ride it on public streets?

        Most regions allow it in the bike lane and on public road, but you should consult your local authority to make sure.

        Why did Coolpeds choose to crowdfund?

        Riders that pre-order Coolpeds Air will get the chance to directly shape the product and the features that we develop. We will be working closely with our customers up to and after Coolpeds Air ships to get their feedback which will guide the features that roll out.

        Contacting the Coolpeds Team

        Please visit our Contact Us Page on our website.

                               (Video shows both our current production model and the new lighter Coolpeds Air)Introducing the new Coolpeds Air 

->Commute freely on the Lightest Electric Scooter at only 7.7kg!

                      It can charge your phone on the go too!                  
                                

www.coolpeds.us
Advantages of using Coolpeds:
Simple      Reliable     Lightweight       Affordable     Cool     Fun

Most in town commutes are within a 10 km radius, so why
 get stuck in traffic and pollute your community with a gas guzzling 
car? 
Coolpeds are the perfect connection to public transportation and local places
Zero emission in town
Great for getting around college campuses and warehouses

Coolpeds are so compact that you can park it indoor and prevent theft

Low cost of operation
Put it in your trunk and use it as an extension of your car

Foldable
Fast Charging - about 2 hours only

Best of all, it is cool, fun, and affordable from $299!

story:
Our aim

Our aim is to make cycling more fun, to make cyclists visible at night, turning the bike wheels into a full-color persistence-of-vision displays. Also we'd like to allow everybody to create his own images, patterns and texts, to share them online and to upload them into the device.

What is Ledus Wheelus

Ledus Wheelus is a:

  • Full-color bicycle wheel lights with a Mini-USB port
  • Software to create, share and upload image patterns
  • Available for Mac, PC and online
 
Personally I don't like to carry any additional weight while cycling, so there are some more design features of the hardware piece:
 
  • It must be very light (25 grams with a battery)
  • Have a standard AAA battery onboard, no wires
  • Run at least for 24 hours on one charge (that's 2-3 weeks of everyday's riding)
  • Have some touch-sensitive buttons to run/pause/select patterns


Current Status
 
At the moment we've produced the limited number of prototypes which comply all the declared features. Plus we've made a software, so everybody can view and create patterns and libraries online already.
 
What We Need & What You Get

We need a funding to move the project further, to turn the prototypes into a complete factory product available for everybody. As well as to make the product even better.

Our funders will get signed device prototypes and other perks and rewards.

Other ways to help

Everyone can try to create an image pattern. That's easy! :)

Some more info about our team, technologies and inspiration is at our credits page.

Also I've made a shorter version of a video for all occupied people :)
 
Thanks for your interest!
