story:
Powerful Motor, Long Range

Never be afraid of hills anymore, its powerful Bafang Motor with 750W will take up-hills with ease and in the flat cruise at speeds of 28 mph. Its Samsung cell battery of 48 volts 13 amp-hour will take you as far as 50 miles with one single charge, and quick recharge in 4-6 hours.

 

Media Coverage

 

 

In-Depth Reviews

 

 

 

 

The Everest XF900 was designed to tackle any mountain in your path. Whether you’re riding through literal mountains, or just navigating an urban jungle, the Everest XF900 is capable of going wherever your adventures take you. 

We started with our beloved motorcycle-style design and worked our way up from there.

 

750 Watt Bafang Motor

To ascend the mountains, we were going to need a powerful motor. We got a 750 watt Bafang rear hub motor that has a peak wattage output of 1,500 watts! To get up the bigger slopes we made sure to get up to 80 Newton meters of torque. 

 

13 Amp-hour Battery

To make the round trip, we were going to need a long-lasting power source. We got a 48 volt 13 amp-hour, lithium-ion removable battery that lasts 30-55 miles on a full charge. In case we need to charge a GPS or cell phone, we added an easily-accessible USB charging port right on the battery. 

 

Kenda Fat Tires (26” x4”)

To tackle the terrain, we were going to need big tires. We got some Kenda Juggernaut 26” x 4” tires and made sure they had puncture protection. That’ll do the trick. 

 

Tektro Dual Hydraulic Brakes

To handle the steep trails, we were going to need some serious stopping power. We included Tektro disc brakes with 180mm discs in both the front and rear for maximum control. 

 

Front + Rear Suspension

To glide across the trails, we were going to need some suspension. We got the Partner 26” adjustable front fork and for extra comfort, we added a 750 lbs spring rear shock. 

 

Shimano 7-Speed

To give us climbing options, we were going to need a few different gears. We got the Shimano Acera SL-M310 7 gear shifter paired with a Shimano Tourney Derailleur. 

 

Bright Front LED Light

To see at night, we were going to need bright light. We thought a 250-lumens front light would do...and it does.

 

Pedal-Assist / Throttle / Manual

To keep things interesting, we were going to need a variety of ways to power this machine. We included pedal assist, twist throttle, walk mode, and human power. How much work you want to put in is up to you!

 

All-Terrain

But wait…why limit this beauty to the mountains? With its big tires, ride it on the pavement, sand, rocks, grass, and even snow!

 

Class 3 eBike

Use the throttle to get up to 22 mph and pedal-assist to reach speeds of 28 mph! This bike is a Class 3 eBike, so usually there are no special licenses required.*

 

*Please check local rules and regulations

 

100% Guarantee Delivery

This is not our first ride. Cyrusher has been in business for over 6 years, shipping cool ebikes worldwide to happy riders. We have the resources, the willing and the passion... we will deliver, 100% guarantee!

 

 

 

The Ultimate Machine

 

Choose Your Adventure

 

 

Choose Your Color

 

 

 

 

At Cyrusher, we make bikes as a lifestyle. When you receive your brand new eBike, we want you to feel the same excitement we feel when we make them! Every Everest XF900 comes with all the tools necessary to assemble it, plus several gifts to make your ride complete..

 

 

 

Thoroughly thought out options to make sure you choose the right Cyrusher Everest to enjoy for a long long time!


01 - Early Adventurer - Convoy
1 Cyrusher Everest (Base model 7-Speeds + 13ah Battery)

02 - Early Adventurer - Convoy Plus
1 Cyrusher Everest (Plus model 21-Speeds + 17ah Battery)

03 - Early Adventurer - Twins Summit
2 Cyrusher Everests (Base model)

04 - Early Adventurer - Twins Summit Plus
2 Cyrusher Everests (Plus model)

05 - Ascent Upgrade to Plus model
Rack + Fenders + Tailight

06 - Extra 17ah Battery + Charger
17 amp-hour High Capacity Battery + Charger

 

Stretch Goals

As the campaign hits certain funding goals, new stretch goals will be unlocked for you to purchase. So share with your friends to keep the new releases coming!

 

Pre-Launch Subscribers: Your Name on Your Bike!

EXCLUSIVE! To thank all the email subscribers that trusted us during the pre-launch, we are offering you an exclusive option, a personalized bike with YOUR NAME on it! When placing your order, reach out to us at everest@cyrusher.com with your NAME as you want it printed on your new Cyrusher Everest. THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

 

50 First Backers: Free Smartwatch!

Yes, totally free! You’ll receive a cool smartwatch. It features a 1.1" Dynamic Color Screen with plenty of functions including Rowing Machine, Skipping Rope, Yoga, Elliptical Trainer, and it features Magnetic charging without disassembling the wristband. It is also 5ATM Waterproof. It will be shipped totally free to the first 50 backers. Be among the first and get yours!

 

$100K: Bag + Mobile Holder Perk Unlock

Make your Cyrusher Everest even better with this pair of practical accessories at a discounted price exclusively for this campaign. Look for this item in the perks section.

 

$200K: Cyrusher Commemorative T-Shirt Unlock

A T-Shirt exclusively designed to commemorate this event! It’s the perfect item to show off your cool Cyrusher Everest. Back us now and share it with friends to unlock it!

 

$500K: FREE Upgrade back seat with tail-light!

Pedal this journey with us and if we reach half the way together, we will thank you by upgrading your bike to an advanced seat with tail-light integrated for all orders placed to date - no purchase necessary. Tell your friends, we need you all!

 

$1M: SURPRISE...

Help us reach our dream, and we will share our happiness with every and each one of you with a secret surprise, which we will unveil when we are close to the final line. Spread the word and get to know what is inside!

 

 


Hi, we are Harry Xie and Nestor Sulu,

Making bikes since 2014, at Cyrusher Sports our vision is to create the next generation of exceptional personal mobility vehicles accessible to everyone. In just a few short years our resourcefulness, persistence, and hard work have been rewarded with steadily increasing sales and remarkably positive customer reviews. We are excited to see our reputation grow for providing an exceptional product and putting our customers first. You can find more about our company at www.cyrusher.com

 

Why Are We Crowdfunding


This campaign is the first step towards expanding our dream to build an amazing e-bike, with quality components, and offer it at a low price to many riders all over the world. So we have created this unique model, motorcycle-inspired, and we have put a lot of effort to make sure it not only looks good but rides even better!  Now you have the last word, if we did it right creating a unique e-bike that you think is worth it, then please back us! Let us achieve this dream together!

 

A Crazy Dream Needs A Crazy Team

Along our journey, we have met people from all walks of life. They come from different countries and speak multiple languages. Some were friends that became customers, customers that became friends, and fans converted into die-hard supporters.  We are so happy to see such a crazy team come together, working to make this dream possible, and with your help… it will be possible! Back us and let’s make this dream a reality together!

 

Where Our Dream and Your New E-bike will Happen

We are not a big corporation but we are proud to have our own factory where a passionate team will build your eBike. We take pride in every eBike we build and assemble them with care and passion.


 

How it will Happen

It has been a long journey since we first thought about this special model in 2019. We are so close to making this vision a reality, but we need your help to get us to the finish line.

 

WE NEED YOU.
Earn cash back for helping us spread the word! Let’s do this together!

 

Need More Information?

 

Buy with Confidence.

We will have your back. Don't take our word, happy customers' feedback says it all.

 

How to Pre-Order Your Cyrusher Everest

 

 

 

General

 

What is it?

 

The Cyrusher Everest is an electric bicycle that was inspired by that iconic motorcycle style. It was designed as a mountain bike but it can be used in all kinds of terrain.

 

Who created it?

 

Cyrusher - Who has been manufacturing bikes for more than 6 years.

 

Why should we use it?

 

Electric bikes are a wonderfully inexpensive, environmentally friendly, and fun way to get around!

 

How much does it cost?

 

Please see our current perk list for options offered.

 

This is a pretty low price for an eBike of this type. How is it possible?

 

By mass-producing them and shipping them together we save in costs and pass these costs directly to every backer.

 

Where can we buy it?

 

Currently only being sold through our IndieGoGo campaign.

 

Why are you crowdfunding?

 

As part of our vision, we want to make cool electric bikes accessible to everyone! We created this unique design and are crowdfunding to raise funds to pay for mass production and shipping in volume. We want to reach as many people as possible, at the lowest price possible, with a high quality and fun eBike.

 

Will the finished production bike be identical to those pictured in the campaign?

 

ABSOLUTELY. All the pictures and videos featured on this campaign use an actual model that is totally functional. The eBike you will get will be even better!

 

Are you planning to offer extra upgrades based on goals?

 

Yes, we have some exciting ideas for stretch goals. When the campaign reaches a certain funding amount we’ll unlock these upgrades. Spread the word so we can release these sooner.

 

Is there a warranty?

 

Yes. Cyrusher offers a 2-year warranty on frame and parts, and unlike some Ebike companies, we offer a 30-Days money-back guarantee!

 

How do I get replacement parts?

 

You’ll be able to purchase replacements on our online store at www.cyrusher.com.

 

Where can I get my Cyrusher Everest serviced?

 

The Cyrusher Everest is extremely simple. Aside from the maintenance-free electrical parts, the bike is built using standard tried and tested bike components. Any reputable bike shop will have the tools to service your Cyrusher Everest. If however you do get stuck you can always contact our support team.

 

 

The eBike

 

How does it work?

 

Functions like a typical eBike with a lithium-ion battery. It ships with a complete user manual where you can learn the basics in minutes.

 

Does it fit my size?

 

The frame comes in one size only but designed to fit a very wide variety of rider sizes from 5'4" to 6'2" ( 163cm - 190cm).

 

What is the maximum weight your frame can take?

 

It can load up to 330 lbs (150 kg).

 

What are the dimensions and weight of the bike?

 

19.5" Reach, 34.5" Stand Over Height, 28" Minimum Saddle Height, 32.5" Maximum Saddle Height, 28" Width, 47" Wheel Base, 75" Length, 66 lbs Weight.

 

Is there room for a water bottle and accessories?

 

Yes. You can fit a water bottle, rack, fenders and a long list of accessories available. Check out the perks section.

 

How do I charge the bike? What is the battery life?

 

You can charge the battery in the frame, or remove it for charging inside. The battery will last approximately 30-50 miles per charge.

 

Will the charger work with 240V and 110V outlets around the world?

 

Yes, the charger is rated 100-240V so it works in every country.

 

Can I ride it in the rain?

 

Yes. It is waterproof rated at IP65.

 

What sort of range can I expect to get from the Cyrusher Everest?

 

The Cyrusher Everest has 3 riding modes. Without using the motor it pedals just like a normal bike. Using the motor, typical riders can expect to exceed 50 miles (80 km) of range when using assisted riding or 30 miles (50 km) in full electric (throttle). Range figures are estimates and not a guarantee though. The range can vary significantly depending on the terrain, inclines, weight of the cyclist, pedal assist level, etc.

 

Is it possible to upgrade the battery to a 17ah?

 

Yes! Please see our perks if you wish to upgrade from the 13ah model.

 

What is the care and cleaning of it?

 

We recommend keeping your Everest inside & protected from the elements as much as possible. Avoid excess moisture, and don't leave it outside in the rain for an extended period of time. It is best to clean with a damp cloth and wipe down the bike afterwards.

 

What are the recommended ages?

 

13 years and older, unless otherwise dictated by your local regulations.

 

 

Legal

 

Do I need a license to ride it on public roads?

 

No. The Cyrusher Everest is a Class 3 Electric Bike in the United States, therefore tipically no needing a license, but please refer to your local regulations on eBikes before riding.

 

What’s the max speed of the Cyrusher Everest?

 

Cyrusher Everest is class 3 ebike, 20 mph (35 km/h) throttle only and 28 mph (45 km/h) pedal assist.

 

 

Purchases & Delivery

 

How much is shipping?

 

FREE Shipping

 

Can I come and pick it up myself?

 

No. To keep end prices low we ship complete batches to our warehouses in the US and UK, and from there we use FedEx or UPS to deliver each bike conveniently and safely to your door.

 

When do you expect to start shipping?

 

We expect to start shipping the first batches of Cyrusher Everests towards the middle of November 2020. Shipping is first come first serve, so the sooner you claim yours, the sooner you’ll be riding!

 

Are there any import duties, taxes or VAT that I need to pay?

 

No. We handle all of those. You only need to relax and wait for your brand new Cyrusher Everest to arrive at your door!

 

How do I upgrade my pre-order to a better one?

 

Email us tp everest@cyrusher.com.

 

What is your refund policy?

 

Please refer to https://www.cyrusher.com/en/m/store/payment.

 

 

Any Other Question?

We are only one email away. Please contact our amazing support team with any question at everest@cyrusher.com.

When you receive your brand new eBike, we want you to feel the same excitement we feel when we make them! Every Everest XF900 comes with all the tools necessary to assemble it, plus several gifts to make your ride complete..   Thoroughly thought out options to make sure you choose the right Cyrusher Everest to enjoy for a long long time!01 - Early Adventurer - Convoy1 Cyrusher Everest (Base model 7-Speeds + 13ah Battery)02 - Early Adventurer - Convoy Plus1 Cyrusher Everest (Plus model 21-Speeds + 17ah Battery)03 - Early Adventurer - Twins Summit2 Cyrusher Everests (Base model)04 - Early Adventurer - Twins Summit Plus2 Cyrusher Everests (Plus model)05 - Ascent Upgrade to Plus modelRack + Fenders + Tailight06 - Extra 17ah Battery + Charger17 amp-hour High Capacity Battery + Charger Stretch GoalsAs the campaign hits certain funding goals, new stretch goals will be unlocked for you to purchase. So share with your friends to keep the new releases coming! Pre-Launch Subscribers: Your Name on Your Bike!EXCLUSIVE! To thank all the email subscribers that trusted us during the pre-launch, we are offering you an exclusive option, a personalized bike with YOUR NAME on it! When placing your order, reach out to us at everest@cyrusher.com with your NAME as you want it printed on your new Cyrusher Everest. THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT! 50 First Backers: Free Smartwatch!Yes, totally free! You’ll receive a cool smartwatch. It features a 1.1" Dynamic Color Screen with plenty of functions including Rowing Machine, Skipping Rope, Yoga, Elliptical Trainer, and it features Magnetic charging without disassembling the wristband. It is also 5ATM Waterproof. It will be shipped totally free to the first 50 backers. Be among the first and get yours! $100K: Bag + Mobile Holder Perk UnlockMake your Cyrusher Everest even better with this pair of practical accessories at a discounted price exclusively for this campaign. Look for this item in the perks section. $200K: Cyrusher Commemorative T-Shirt UnlockA T-Shirt exclusively designed to commemorate this event! It’s the perfect item to show off your cool Cyrusher Everest. Back us now and share it with friends to unlock it! $500K: FREE Upgrade back seat with tail-light!Pedal this journey with us and if we reach half the way together, we will thank you by upgrading your bike to an advanced seat with tail-light integrated for all orders placed to date - no purchase necessary. Tell your friends, we need you all! $1M: SURPRISE...Help us reach our dream, and we will share our happiness with every and each one of you with a secret surprise, which we will unveil when we are close to the final line. Spread the word and get to know what is inside!  Hi, we are Harry Xie and Nestor Sulu,Making bikes since 2014, at Cyrusher Sports our vision is to create the next generation of exceptional personal mobility vehicles accessible to everyone. In just a few short years our resourcefulness, persistence, and hard work have been rewarded with steadily increasing sales and remarkably positive customer reviews. We are excited to see our reputation grow for providing an exceptional product and putting our customers first. You can find more about our company at www.cyrusher.com Why Are We CrowdfundingThis campaign is the first step towards expanding our dream to build an amazing e-bike, with quality components, and offer it at a low price to many riders all over the world. So we have created this unique model, motorcycle-inspired, and we have put a lot of effort to make sure it not only looks good but rides even better!  Now you have the last word, if we did it right creating a unique e-bike that you think is worth it, then please back us! Let us achieve this dream together! A Crazy Dream Needs A Crazy TeamAlong our journey, we have met people from all walks of life. They come from different countries and speak multiple languages. Some were friends that became customers, customers that became friends, and fans converted into die-hard supporters.  We are so happy to see such a crazy team come together, working to make this dream possible, and with your help… it will be possible! Back us and let’s make this dream a reality together! Where Our Dream and Your New E-bike will HappenWe are not a big corporation but we are proud to have our own factory where a passionate team will build your eBike. We take pride in every eBike we build and assemble them with care and passion. How it will HappenIt has been a long journey since we first thought about this special model in 2019. We are so close to making this vision a reality, but we need your help to get us to the finish line. WE NEED YOU. Earn cash back for helping us spread the word! Let’s do this together! Need More Information? Buy with Confidence.We will have your back. Don't take our word, happy customers' feedback says it all. How to Pre-Order Your Cyrusher Everest   General  What is it?  
The Cyrusher Everest is an electric bicycle that was inspired by that iconic motorcycle style. It was designed as a mountain bike but it can be used in all kinds of terrain.
  Who created it?  
Cyrusher - Who has been manufacturing bikes for more than 6 years.
  Why should we use it?  
Electric bikes are a wonderfully inexpensive, environmentally friendly, and fun way to get around!
  How much does it cost?  
Please see our current perk list for options offered.
  This is a pretty low price for an eBike of this type. How is it possible?  
By mass-producing them and shipping them together we save in costs and pass these costs directly to every backer.
  Where can we buy it?  
Currently only being sold through our IndieGoGo campaign.
  Why are you crowdfunding?  
As part of our vision, we want to make cool electric bikes accessible to everyone! We created this unique design and are crowdfunding to raise funds to pay for mass production and shipping in volume. We want to reach as many people as possible, at the lowest price possible, with a high quality and fun eBike.
  Will the finished production bike be identical to those pictured in the campaign?  
ABSOLUTELY. All the pictures and videos featured on this campaign use an actual model that is totally functional. The eBike you will get will be even better!
  Are you planning to offer extra upgrades based on goals?  
Yes, we have some exciting ideas for stretch goals. When the campaign reaches a certain funding amount we’ll unlock these upgrades. Spread the word so we can release these sooner.
  Is there a warranty?  
Yes. Cyrusher offers a 2-year warranty on frame and parts, and unlike some Ebike companies, we offer a 30-Days money-back guarantee!
  How do I get replacement parts?  
You’ll be able to purchase replacements on our online store at www.cyrusher.com.
  Where can I get my Cyrusher Everest serviced?  
The Cyrusher Everest is extremely simple. Aside from the maintenance-free electrical parts, the bike is built using standard tried and tested bike components. Any reputable bike shop will have the tools to service your Cyrusher Everest. If however you do get stuck you can always contact our support team.
  The eBike  How does it work?  
Functions like a typical eBike with a lithium-ion battery. It ships with a complete user manual where you can learn the basics in minutes.
  Does it fit my size?  
The frame comes in one size only but designed to fit a very wide variety of rider sizes from 5'4" to 6'2" ( 163cm - 190cm).
  What is the maximum weight your frame can take?  
It can load up to 330 lbs (150 kg).
  What are the dimensions and weight of the bike?  
19.5" Reach, 34.5" Stand Over Height, 28" Minimum Saddle Height, 32.5" Maximum Saddle Height, 28" Width, 47" Wheel Base, 75" Length, 66 lbs Weight.
  Is there room for a water bottle and accessories?  
Yes. You can fit a water bottle, rack, fenders and a long list of accessories available. Check out the perks section.
  How do I charge the bike? What is the battery life?   
You can charge the battery in the frame, or remove it for charging inside. The battery will last approximately 30-50 miles per charge.
  Will the charger work with 240V and 110V outlets around the world?  
Yes, the charger is rated 100-240V so it works in every country.
  Can I ride it in the rain?  
Yes. It is waterproof rated at IP65.
  What sort of range can I expect to get from the Cyrusher Everest?  
The Cyrusher Everest has 3 riding modes. Without using the motor it pedals just like a normal bike. Using the motor, typical riders can expect to exceed 50 miles (80 km) of range when using assisted riding or 30 miles (50 km) in full electric (throttle). Range figures are estimates and not a guarantee though. The range can vary significantly depending on the terrain, inclines, weight of the cyclist, pedal assist level, etc.
  Is it possible to upgrade the battery to a 17ah?  
Yes! Please see our perks if you wish to upgrade from the 13ah model.
  What is the care and cleaning of it?  
We recommend keeping your Everest inside & protected from the elements as much as possible. Avoid excess moisture, and don't leave it outside in the rain for an extended period of time. It is best to clean with a damp cloth and wipe down the bike afterwards.
  What are the recommended ages?  
13 years and older, unless otherwise dictated by your local regulations.
  Legal  Do I need a license to ride it on public roads?  
No. The Cyrusher Everest is a Class 3 Electric Bike in the United States, therefore tipically no needing a license, but please refer to your local regulations on eBikes before riding.
  What’s the max speed of the Cyrusher Everest?  
Cyrusher Everest is class 3 ebike, 20 mph (35 km/h) throttle only and 28 mph (45 km/h) pedal assist.
  Purchases & Delivery  How much is shipping?  
FREE Shipping
  Can I come and pick it up myself?  
No. To keep end prices low we ship complete batches to our warehouses in the US and UK, and from there we use FedEx or UPS to deliver each bike conveniently and safely to your door.
  When do you expect to start shipping?  
We expect to start shipping the first batches of Cyrusher Everests towards the middle of November 2020. Shipping is first come first serve, so the sooner you claim yours, the sooner you’ll be riding!
  Are there any import duties, taxes or VAT that I need to pay?  
No. We handle all of those. You only need to relax and wait for your brand new Cyrusher Everest to arrive at your door!
  How do I upgrade my pre-order to a better one?  
Email us tp everest@cyrusher.com.
  What is your refund policy?  
Please refer to https://www.cyrusher.com/en/m/store/payment.
  Any Other Question?We are only one email away. Please contact our amazing support team with any question at everest@cyrusher.com.

story:
Sharing God’s Word, Showing God’s Love, and Serving in God’s World


News Channel 5 Video of The Blue Bus Ministry
http://www.newsnet5.com/news/local-news/oh-cuyahoga/big-blue-bus-rolls-out-of-a-strongsville-church-every-wednesday-to-feed-and-cloth-clevelands-poor

The Blue Bus Fundraiser

  • Send- Send the link to your friends.  Ask them to do the same.                              https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/the-blue-bus
  • Give- Give a tax deductible donation to the Blue Bus.
  • Join- Join us for a ride on the Blue Bus, helping to change lives for eternity.

The Need

The Blue Bus ministry is ready to expand and multiply.  However, our current bus is unreliable and needs to be maintained frequently.  Over Thanksgiving and Christmas, we had to rent an RV twice in order to serve meals because the bus was broke. 

To solve this, The Blue Bus Fundraiser has been launched to raise money for a new (well, used) Blue Bus.

As a result, the Blue Bus ministry will be more reliable, serve more people, and allow other churches to use it during the week as well.

The Blue Bus Ministry

The Blue Bus Ministry delivers food, clothing, and other items to less fortunate communities on Cleveland’s near west side.  At least ten churches serve God in this effort, with volunteers from many Christian denominations.  The Blue Bus is well known and recognized in the communities it serves.

The Blue Bus is multi-denominational with Catholics, Evangelicals, Lutherans, Methodists, Pentecostals, Southern Baptists and other Christian denominations participating from different churches across the area.  We have at least ten different churches that participate in the Blue Bus ministry.  This supports the idea of one Body of Christ, instead of the separation and differences we hear about with the many Christian denominations today.

The Blue Bus is an excellent platform for people to hear the Word of God and learn about Jesus Christ, in some cases for the very first time. The Blue Bus is also a platform for prayer, where people receive prayer for spiritual and physical needs like healing, finding a job, financial help, comfort, and love.  Also, people interact with others in a meaningful way, which is often missing from their lives.

In addition to being able to hear the Word of God, people get basic necessities like food and clothing.  Dozens of volunteers make this ministry a success.  This ministry is lead by the husband and wife team of Del and Jeanette, with approximately 60-70 volunteers serving in some aspect of this ministry. 
Volunteers perform these activities in support of the Blue Bus:

  • Collect donated clothing from people across the area
  • Buy food for cooking and preparation at the church, in order to serve it
  • Gather donated food from nearby local restaurants and bring it back to the church’s freezer and refrigerators
  • Cook and prepare the food
  • Serve the food and clothing on the Blue Bus
  • Clean-up and do dishes
An estimated 9,000 meals get served from the Blue Bus each year. 

The Current Bus

Our current bus is a 1996 Thomas Model M97 with over 209,000 miles on it and 11,716 hours of use.  The goal for a new bus will be a used 2005 – 2006 bus with approximately 100,000 miles on it.  The new bus will have less rust, less mileage, and require less maintenance.  This will give our ministry the reliability we need in order to expand and multiply it effectively.

The Blue Bus ministry is the Lord’s work, bringing Christians together from all denominations from around the area.  United in Christ, this ministry brings food, clothing, and the Word of God to people in need across Northeast Ohio. 

Risks & Challenges

After this project is fully funded, we'll have to buy the new (well, used) Blue Bus. Our goal is to buy one with around 100,000 miles on it. We would like to buy it down South, where the buses don't see the snow, ice and salt of the Cleveland, Ohio winter.

We will have to pull out a large number of seats, install counter tops and install exterior lighting. We'll also need to install a small door for food and drink service on the side of the bus. Last, we'll need to paint the new bus blue, because, after all, it's the Blue Bus!

The Blue Bus Fundraiser

  • Send- Send the link to your friends.  Ask them to do the same. https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/the-blue-bus
  • Give- Give a tax deductible donation to the Blue Bus.
  • Join- Join us for a ride on the Blue Bus, helping to change lives for eternity.

story:
This campaign has ended on Sunday, July 16th. 2017.   

Webshop opening soon:

www.uittoboards.com

 

 
The Uitto Biocomposite Skateboard is an eco-friendly cruiser. Designed to be as fun to ride as possible. The board is forgiving and smooth, while still enabling tricks and rougher riding.
 

ISPO BRANDNEW is the biggest platform for sporty startups worldwide. Since the year 2000, ISPO has searched and designated the most promising newcomers of the sports industry.

 

 

 

Biocomposite brings the traditional wooden board into this day and age. Without sacrificing build integrity or quality, biocomposite boards are highly ecological, being fully recyclable and non-toxic. They weather the elements and moisture superiorly to traditional skateboards.

 

 

・100% Recyclable.

Our boards are recyclable and non-toxic. They can be made into new boards, by grinding them back to granulates and remolding them. Our Biocomposite material is safe, it is even used to make dishware. 

・Waterproof. 

Our boards are resistant to moisture and water. 

・Warp proof.

Our boards do not warp, deform or delaminate. 

・Wood fibers.

Our boards consist of wood fibers sourced sustainably from nordic forests where the rate of tree growth outweighs the rate of forestry.

 

The deck itself comes in three colors: bark, moss and stone. Thanks to the organic flow of the substance during manufacture, each individual board has its own unique pattern.

We use standard 5" hanger trucks, and the decks include integrated risers compatible with any standard skateboarding trucks or wheels. With our boards, wheel bite won’t be an issue.

 

   

Our Uitto "Ride-On-Rough" 59mm 80a -wheels provide a smooth ride, even on rougher surfaces. Still, they’re hard enough to sneak in the occasional power slide!

  

 

 

Uitto designs are done to the smallest detail, prototypes and testing is done and production has started at our partner factory in Kontiolahti, Finland. We are currently shipping boards to backers. 

   

 

UITTO n. Finnish (engl. Log driving): a means of moving logs from a forest to sawmills downstream using the current of a river. It was the main transportation method of the early logging industry in Northern Europe.

We at Uitto Boards aim to bring this experience into the 21st century. We ride pieces of wood and stand sideways in the current just like they did a century ago. We make our boards with the utmost attention to detail, using the old way of doing things right, with the latest in material technology. Get the best of both worlds and enjoy the feeling of timber under your feet that is Uitto Boards.

story:
Founded in 2012, Hycore is an innovative Engineering and Software company. We always wondered why everyone chooses to move around in automobiles when the average car traffic speed is 10mph range and the entire city we live always lack of parking spaces.

This urged us to search for a more easy and fast transportation: electric bicycle. Hycore wheel that turns any normal bicycle into an electric bicycle is our solution, and we hope to provide people with a better living life with Hycore T1.

Hycore wheel that turns any normal bicycle into an electric bicycle is our solution, and we hope to provide people with a better living life with Hycore T1.

story:
Vostok Titanium Components for your Brompton Bicycle


Even with the great bicycle, there is still room for improvement! Our experience producing standard OEM Brompton extremities gave us the confidence to push forward and continue to offer our custom components to Brompton fans and enthusiasts worldwide. Vostok Brompton kits have now been sold to more than 30 countries in the world. If you ever wanted to upgrade your Brompton bicycle - now is the best chance to pre-order your Vostok kit for Season 2019.

Who are we? We are a small titanium production company based in Russian Federation. In 2016 we began RnD for a titanium rear triangle for the Brompton bicycle that would allow installation of standard drivetrain components and disk brakes. Upon successfull completetion of the task, we began offering the triangle to Brompton fans worldwide and Vostok Titanium Components were born. In 2018, the e-shop and assembly were moved to Tallinn, Estonia to form Vostok Cycle Works. 

Today, we manufacture best on the market front and rear racks for the stock Brompton bicycle as well as custom Vostok frame extremities. Take a look below!

Vostok Kit Components

Vostok Rear Triangle
Weight: 540 grams

The Triangle replaces the original Brompton bicycle rear frame assembly. It allows hubs like Rohloff Speedhub, Shimano Alfine or any other standard 135 mm wide hub to be fitted with or without the disk brake.

Drive-side features:

Non-drive-side features:

The Triangle plays well with Brompton's design: the bicycle folds and rolls as expected. Can be paired with a stock front fork as well as the Vostok Fork. When paired with a stock fork, the folding width of the bike does not change considerably.

Q: Can the triangle accommodate a belt drive?
A: Yes it can. With an optional coupler installed in the seat stay, a belt-driven Brompton is possible. If you would like to pre-order such a kit, please write to hi@vostok.bike

Available finishes are Raw Titanium, Polished Satin and Gold.

Satin:

Gold:

Vostok Front Fork
Weight: 360 grams

The Fork replaces the original Brompton bicycle fork. It allows standard width front hubs to be fitted with or without the disk brake. The fork is designed to work with the Vostok Triangle.

Available finishes are Raw Titanium, Polished Satin and Gold.

Satin:

Gold:

Vostok Chain Tensioner Mk2 
Weight: 120 grams

A lighter modification of the original Vostok Chain Tensioner. Titanium jockey wheel axles, aluminium arms and jockey wheels. This chain tensioner interfaces natively with the Vostok Triangle and includes a recess for a Shimano anti-rotation washer.

Why is it a perfect addition to the kit? The idea behind variable chain line is simple: by moving the jockey wheels across the axles, you achieve perfect chain line no matter the hub or sprocket or cranks you install on your custom Brompton.

Vostok Derailleur Hanger
Weight: 10 grams

The Derailleur Hanger is designed specifically to interface with the Vostok Triangle's drive-side dropout. It allows you to attach a standard rear derailleur for your cassette build.

Mini Rack for the Vostok Triangle (135mm)
Weight: 200 grams

The Rear Mini Rack (Vostok Geometry) provides a clean and lightweight alternative to the stock Brompton rack when paired with the Vostok Triangle. The stays of the rack are welded to a 135mm O.L.D. standard. Available in raw, satin and gold finishes to match your extremities set.

Available finishes are Raw Titanium, Polished Satin and Gold.

Universal Brompton Accessories

Mini Rack for the Standard Brompton (112mm)
Weight: 200 grams

Stronger than aluminium, more affordable than carbon. To our mind, the best titanium Brompton rack on the market today with a clean and lightweight design. All standard Brompton accessories supported. May safely carry 16kg in any riding conditions.

Available finishes are Raw Titanium, Polished Satin and Gold.

Front Cargo Rack
Weight: 120 grams

A front Brompton rack made right. With a wide base and vertical railings to attach your non-Brompton briefcase or a duffel. Will sit firmly on the stock front carrier block. May safely carry 16kg.

Available finishes are Raw Titanium, Polished Satin and Gold.

How to Order?

Kits

All Vostok components are arranged in kits, each reflecting a popular upgrade path. All kits are "plug and play". There are 4 kits available, all named after famous cosmonauts:

  1. "Popovich" - a kit for cassette and derailleur conversions with rim brakes or rear disk only.
    Includes a rear triangle, a derailleur hanger, a fork hook and other small bits. You keep the stock front fork on the bike. This kit is perfect for the 11-speed cassette Brompton build.
  2. "Nikolaev" - a kit for internal hub conversions with rim brakes or rear disk only.
    Includes a rear triangle, a variable chain-line Vostok tensioner, a fork hook and other small bits. You keep the stock front fork on the bike. This kit is perfect for the Shimano Alfine Brompton build.
  3. "Titov" - a kit for full disk cassette and derailleur conversions.
    Includes a rear triangle, a front fork, a derailleur hanger, a fork hook and other small bits. This set replaces the stock rear triangle and fork on your bike. This kit is perfect for a full disk brake (front and rear) 11-speed cassette Brompton build.
  4. "Gagarin" - a kit for full disk internal hub conversions. Includes a rear triangle, a front fork, a variable chain-line Vostok tensioner, a fork hook and other small bits. This kit is perfect for a full disk brake (front and rear) Alfine or Rohloff Brompton build.

Example Builds

Popovich

Nikolayev

Titov

Gagarin

Finishes

  1. Raw Titanium - blasted titanium, the standard Brompton finish. Raw Ti extremities fit with the factory ones (like the stock Brompton titanium fork). 
  2. Polished Satin Titanium - blasted and then hand polished to achieve a nickel-like mirror surface. Reflects the sunlight!
  3. Gold - our golden extremities go through the same process as the satin ones: blasting and hand-polishing. Afterwards, they are coated with titanium nitride, the same coating material found of motorcycle forks, guns and drill bits. This is an extremely strong finish. 

Shipping

All parcels will be shipped via post with a tracking number provided to you. Production will be started in January, right after the Russian winter holidays. Please expect to receive your Vostok Brompton Kit in March 2019 or sooner. 

EU Customers

*This is an EU-friendly campaign! Please mind, that VAT is included in the shipping charge. Your parcel will arrive absolutely all duties paid, so there will be no nasty surprises.  

Non-EU Customers

Please mind import duties and consumption taxes in your country of residence. Vostok Cycle Works OU will provide invoices for your convenience if needed. 

Can't find your country in the list when you check out? Message us and we'll add it! Click on the icon below to start the chat:

 

Warranty

Vostok titanium components come with a five-year full warranty. Please do read about it in detail on our website.

Questions?

Please write to hi@vostok.bike to get a prompt answer to your question. Or use the Facebook Messanger button above for an even quicker reply.
story_txt:
Vostok Titanium Components for your Brompton BicycleEven with the great bicycle, there is still room for improvement! Our experience producing standard OEM Brompton extremities gave us the confidence to push forward and continue to offer our custom components to Brompton fans and enthusiasts worldwide. Vostok Brompton kits have now been sold to more than 30 countries in the world. If you ever wanted to upgrade your Brompton bicycle - now is the best chance to pre-order your Vostok kit for Season 2019.Who are we? We are a small titanium production company based in Russian Federation. In 2016 we began RnD for a titanium rear triangle for the Brompton bicycle that would allow installation of standard drivetrain components and disk brakes. Upon successfull completetion of the task, we began offering the triangle to Brompton fans worldwide and Vostok Titanium Components were born. In 2018, the e-shop and assembly were moved to Tallinn, Estonia to form Vostok Cycle Works. Today, we manufacture best on the market front and rear racks for the stock Brompton bicycle as well as custom Vostok frame extremities. Take a look below!Vostok Kit ComponentsVostok Rear TriangleWeight: 540 gramsThe Triangle replaces the original Brompton bicycle rear frame assembly. It allows hubs like Rohloff Speedhub, Shimano Alfine or any other standard 135 mm wide hub to be fitted with or without the disk brake.Drive-side features:Non-drive-side features:The Triangle plays well with Brompton's design: the bicycle folds and rolls as expected. Can be paired with a stock front fork as well as the Vostok Fork. When paired with a stock fork, the folding width of the bike does not change considerably.Q: Can the triangle accommodate a belt drive?A: Yes it can. With an optional coupler installed in the seat stay, a belt-driven Brompton is possible. If you would like to pre-order such a kit, please write to hi@vostok.bikeAvailable finishes are Raw Titanium, Polished Satin and Gold.Satin:Gold:Vostok Front ForkWeight: 360 gramsThe Fork replaces the original Brompton bicycle fork. It allows standard width front hubs to be fitted with or without the disk brake. The fork is designed to work with the Vostok Triangle.Available finishes are Raw Titanium, Polished Satin and Gold.Satin:Gold:Vostok Chain Tensioner Mk2 Weight: 120 gramsA lighter modification of the original Vostok Chain Tensioner. Titanium jockey wheel axles, aluminium arms and jockey wheels. This chain tensioner interfaces natively with the Vostok Triangle and includes a recess for a Shimano anti-rotation washer.Why is it a perfect addition to the kit? The idea behind variable chain line is simple: by moving the jockey wheels across the axles, you achieve perfect chain line no matter the hub or sprocket or cranks you install on your custom Brompton.Vostok Derailleur HangerWeight: 10 gramsThe Derailleur Hanger is designed specifically to interface with the Vostok Triangle's drive-side dropout. It allows you to attach a standard rear derailleur for your cassette build.Mini Rack for the Vostok Triangle (135mm)Weight: 200 gramsThe Rear Mini Rack (Vostok Geometry) provides a clean and lightweight alternative to the stock Brompton rack when paired with the Vostok Triangle. The stays of the rack are welded to a 135mm O.L.D. standard. Available in raw, satin and gold finishes to match your extremities set.Available finishes are Raw Titanium, Polished Satin and Gold.Universal Brompton AccessoriesMini Rack for the Standard Brompton (112mm)Weight: 200 gramsStronger than aluminium, more affordable than carbon. To our mind, the best titanium Brompton rack on the market today with a clean and lightweight design. All standard Brompton accessories supported. May safely carry 16kg in any riding conditions.Available finishes are Raw Titanium, Polished Satin and Gold.Front Cargo RackWeight: 120 gramsA front Brompton rack made right. With a wide base and vertical railings to attach your non-Brompton briefcase or a duffel. Will sit firmly on the stock front carrier block. May safely carry 16kg.Available finishes are Raw Titanium, Polished Satin and Gold.How to Order?KitsAll Vostok components are arranged in kits, each reflecting a popular upgrade path. All kits are "plug and play". There are 4 kits available, all named after famous cosmonauts:

"Popovich" - a kit for cassette and derailleur conversions with rim brakes or rear disk only.Includes a rear triangle, a derailleur hanger, a fork hook and other small bits. You keep the stock front fork on the bike. This kit is perfect for the 11-speed cassette Brompton build.

"Nikolaev" - a kit for internal hub conversions with rim brakes or rear disk only.Includes a rear triangle, a variable chain-line Vostok tensioner, a fork hook and other small bits. You keep the stock front fork on the bike. This kit is perfect for the Shimano Alfine Brompton build.


"Titov" - a kit for full disk cassette and derailleur conversions.Includes a rear triangle, a front fork, a derailleur hanger, a fork hook and other small bits. This set replaces the stock rear triangle and fork on your bike. This kit is perfect for a full disk brake (front and rear) 11-speed cassette Brompton build.


"Gagarin" - a kit for full disk internal hub conversions. Includes a rear triangle, a front fork, a variable chain-line Vostok tensioner, a fork hook and other small bits. This kit is perfect for a full disk brake (front and rear) Alfine or Rohloff Brompton build.

Example BuildsPopovichNikolayevTitovGagarinFinishes

Raw Titanium - blasted titanium, the standard Brompton finish. Raw Ti extremities fit with the factory ones (like the stock Brompton titanium fork). 

Polished Satin Titanium - blasted and then hand polished to achieve a nickel-like mirror surface. Reflects the sunlight!

Gold - our golden extremities go through the same process as the satin ones: blasting and hand-polishing. Afterwards, they are coated with titanium nitride, the same coating material found of motorcycle forks, guns and drill bits. This is an extremely strong finish. 
ShippingAll parcels will be shipped via post with a tracking number provided to you. Production will be started in January, right after the Russian winter holidays. Please expect to receive your Vostok Brompton Kit in March 2019 or sooner. EU Customers*This is an EU-friendly campaign! Please mind, that VAT is included in the shipping charge. Your parcel will arrive absolutely all duties paid, so there will be no nasty surprises.  Non-EU CustomersPlease mind import duties and consumption taxes in your country of residence. Vostok Cycle Works OU will provide invoices for your convenience if needed. Can't find your country in the list when you check out? Message us and we'll add it! Click on the icon below to start the chat: WarrantyVostok titanium components come with a five-year full warranty. Please do read about it in detail on our website.Questions?Please write to hi@vostok.bike to get a prompt answer to your question. Or use the Facebook Messanger button above for an even quicker reply.

story:
The Solution

Garbeasy™ is small enough to fold out of the way when not in use with the help of a flexible arm. It can clamp to a lot of objects available inside trucks, RV’s or even small cars. It has a wide opening to fit the majority of these standard shopping bags and will hold in place with a locking ring or a rubber band. 

FLEXIBLE ARM

The flexible arm will allow the driver to position it where needed or bend it out of the way when not in use

MANY OPTIONS FOR SECURING

Clamps onto a lot of objects including flat edges, round tubing or even flat surface with the help of a stick-on mount. 

LARGE OPENING 

Fits big items

Holds a shopping bag wide open either with a snap-on ring or a rubber band.

story:
Coventry University is a dynamic, global and transformational ‘modern university’ whose roots can be traced back to 1843 to the Coventry School of Design. With a proud tradition as a provider of innovative teaching and learning and a focus on impactful research, the university has established a robust reputation for pushing the boundaries of higher education regionally, nationally and across the world.

The Sparrowhawk is a unique project bringing together the expertise and talent of academics, industry, and students from Coventry University’s Faculties of Arts & Humanities and Environment, Engineering & Computing.

While the cost of developing vehicle platforms is not a barrier to entry for most global car manufacturers, many smaller OEMs (original equipment manufacturers) are prevented from producing new models due to substantial set up costs. Sparrowhawk project can provide a university-based platform that would help niche manufacturers to overcome these challenges

Your money will help a low budget student developed sports car become a commercial reality and prove a low-cost automotive design and development platform that can be copied around the world to make affordable niche vehicles

Funding received through this campaign allow the project to move on to the next level, allowing for additional technical design work and ultimately mass-production logistics to be put in place.

What We Need & What You Get

We’re looking for £100,000’s worth of funding to help complete a prototype Sparrowhawk vehicle. This will then go through numerous test drives and other testing processes to ensure it is fully road-worthy and operational.

The Impact

The substantial cost of developing new car models is a major barrier to niche car manufacturers, small automotive engineering groups, OEMs that could bring into the market well designed low budget high-performance sports car more affordable to car enthusiasts.

The Sparrowhawk Project has harnessed the creative skills of Coventry University’s acclaimed vehicle design and engineering departments, bringing together a team of over 50 young engineering students to develop a unique concept in car design, to create a highly efficient production platform.

The project aims to revolutionise the way vehicles such as niche sports car and electric vehicles are designed and produced by creating a new car design to manufacture platform which massively reduces the initial outlay required for niche vehicle production, enabling cars to be developed at a fraction of their current cost.

While the cost of developing vehicle platforms is not a barrier to entry for most global car manufacturers, many smaller OEMs (original equipment manufacturers) are prevented from producing new models due to substantial set up costs. Adopting the Sparrowhawk platform would help many niche manufacturers to overcome these challenges.

Risks & Challenges

Partial funding will create a funding gap that could slow development. Market launch will be pushed back to seek funds from alternative sources.

The market for lower budget sports car may change.

Other Ways You Can Help

You can help us get the word out about our campaign by posting our crowdfunding campaign on social media, you can do this by using the Indiegogo share tools on this page!

You can learn more about the project and Sparrowhawk Car here - www.thesparrowhawkproject.com

story:
"Meet the super-light electric skateboard of your dreams" - BGR

"I was absolutely shocked how light it was" - The Verge

"We took the new ZBoard 2 for a spin and it was amazing!" - TechnoBuffalo

"One impressive piece of technology" - Yahoo Tech


Lean Forward to Go. Lean Back to Stop.

After your first ride, you'll realize that there is nothing else in the world quite like it! Even if you've never ridden a skateboard before, the ZBoard’s intuitive control will have you carving in no time with its weight-sensing foot pads. Speed control is completely variable – cruise at walking speed or race to its top speed of 20 miles per hour.

Leaning back kicks in regenerative braking, meaning you can safely descend hills while also recharging the battery.


ZBoard 2: Blue and Pearl Editions

The ZBoard 2 comes in two models: the Blue Edition (16 miles/charge, 16 lbs.) and Pearl Edition (24 miles/charge, 18 lbs.). With a range that is two, three, or even four times the range of other electric skateboards on the market, the ZBoard 2 will have you riding without any concern of running out of juice.

Brushless Motor, Natural Coasting

Our new 500W brushless motor is faster, more powerful, and more efficient than previous ZBoard motors. The brushless design allows for more natural coasting, allowing you to push the ZBoard when the battery expires or is turned off.


Grab and Go Anywhere: Lightweight and Splashproof

By using waterproof connectors the ZBoard can be ridden on wet surfaces without fear of damage to the electronics. Though the board mechanically can handle water exposure, we do not recommend riding in the rain due to potential rusting of components and loss of traction.

Featuring a lightweight 16 lb design and two integrated handles, ZBoard 2’s ergonomic design makes it easy to pick up, carry, and store. Speed up your commute, forget about parking, & enjoy running errands with the most portable electric vehicle on the market!


See and Be Seen

The ZBoard’s LED headlights and taillights are the brightest integrated lights of any personal electric vehicle. These hi-power LEDs have three modes – on, off and blinking – which the rider can choose depending on the situation.  You’ll turn heads as these LEDs make it easier for you to see the road and for the road to see you.


Battery Meter and Speed Charger

The ZBoard’s power button is surrounded by a multi-color LED ring that changes colors as the battery diminishes.

ZBoard 2’s charger recharges from 0-100% in approximately 90 minutes. It is 110v - 240v ready and will work in the US, Asia, Europe, Australia, and more.



About Us

This campaign is the result of customer feedback and dozens of hardware and software iterations. 


Based in Northern California, our team is made up of electrical, mechanical, and manufacturing engineers who share a love for extreme sports. We introduced the original ZBoard in 2012 and have listened to the feedback from our riders all over the world.  We are incredibly excited to implement that feedback into the ZBoard 2. Funds from this project will go towards finalizing design, tooling, testing, and more. We are excited to have you as a customer and we can’t wait to get you riding the ZBoard 2: The Most Advanced Electric Skateboard ever!

Feel free to reach out with any questions to info@zboardshop.com


From CES in Las Vegas:

ZBoards filmed from Drones!

Sam Sheffer and The Verge Team took a few ZBoards and a drone outside the Las Vegas Convention Center and got some great shots.

A detailed breakdown of the ZBoard Blue:

Judner from UrAvgConsumer - a seasoned rider of the original ZBoard - took the Z2 Blue for a spin.

Behind The Scenes ZBoard Filming
The guys from TLD went all out filming the ZBoard from a Sony FS7 and GoPros. It was pretty impressive watching them film at 20 mph.

ZBoarding through Downtown Vegas

Keaton from TechSmartt came out from Chicago to ride around Fremont Street in Downtown Vegas.

Linus Tech Tips ride the new ZBoard 2!

Linus from Linus Tech Tips ripped a few donuts on the ZBoard 2 as well.

Reviews:

The Verge: Best Rideable of CES!

View Awards Article and Full Review

TechnoBuffalo: Best of CES!

View Awards Article
