Use the Indiegogo share tools located at the top of this page.
Share it on Facebook, Twitter, Google+
Call, email, send smoke signals ~ help get the word out!!
Guarantee:
We are so sure that you will love your Pub Pedals that we’re offering a one-year satisfaction guarantee. If for any reason you’re not satisfied with your Pub Pedals, send them within the first year for a replacement or full refund.
Simply put, we want you to be happy with your Pub Pedals.

 Shipping Info

Please remember to add international shipping cost to your contributions if you live outside if North America.  It isn't added on automaticly so you'll need to add the approperate amount.
All orders will ship by Feb. 28th at promised in the perk descriptions.  We might eveny to be able to ship them a little sooner!
 Media Coverage

 

 

 
 
Frequently Asked Questions
Will pub pedals fit on my Eggbeaters?Yes, pub pedals will work with both new-style and old-style Eggbeater pedals. (see photo above)What colors are pub pedals available in?Yellow, Red, Blue, Black & Pink (see images above)Can I ride these on trails?No. It isn't a good idea. Pub Pedals are designed to be used for casual riding only. If you’re going to be on trails or pushing yourself, wear your bike shoes.Can they slide off while riding?As long as you're riding casually then they won’t go anywhere. However, they have been designed to be easy to slide on and off. So while very unlikely, if you make an effort to push out to the side just right, it is possible to get them to slide off. Why do they slide onto some Eggbeaters more easily than others?This is because the amount of spring tension is different across the different styles of Eggbeater pedals. We have found that the amount of spring tension varies with the different styles of Eggbeater. Therefore, your Pub Pedals will slide onto some more easier than others.Why are pub pedals kinda thick and funny looking?The thickness is due to the nature of the Eggbeater pedal.  Although Eggbeaters look really small and minimalist when you factor in the size of the wings they actually aren’t as small as they look. We made pub pedals with the offset mirror image pattern to simplify the design, and to  prevent the treads from clogging up with snow (because hey, we like to ride all winter long and we live in the Rocky Mountains of Canada).
Why don't Pub Pedals have reflectors?We did consider adding reflectors. But it was going to add too much to the start up cost. Later when sales are strong enough we might look at adding them on at some piont. The good news is that the sides of the Pub Pedals are smooth so you can easy stick on reflective tape. 3M sells some excellent quality reflective tape I've had on one my backpacks for almost 10 years.

What exactly are Pub Pedals made of?If you want to get technical about it. Pub Pedals are being made with an engineered composite resin reinforced with a bit of glass fiber (think fiberglass). Which provides high impact tolerance with plenty strength, stiffness, a hard surface, and ability to handle continuous use and long-term stresses. These types of compounds are often used in automotive, and other heavy use utility products.  Basically this means they are made of a really strong high grade plastic.

Progress
Injection Molds are done and 2,500 sets of Pub Pedals will be made before the campaign is done.

 
 
PS. Eggbeaters are not included. However, if you don't already ride on Eggbeaters, but want to, you’re in luck because right now Crank Brothers are offering the Eggbeater 3 - at HALF PRICE!
Go to: http://www.crankbrothers.com/rt_ticket_add.php to learn more.PPS. Pub Pedals are a product of Pub Pedals Inc. and are not associated with CrankBrothers in any way. These have been produced on our own and without association with CrankBrothers.  Eggbeater pedals are the copyright of CrankBrothers.
FYI: The song in the first part of the video is by The Eerie Green. You can hear more of their songs at: http://theeeriegreen.bandcamp.com/

story:
The transition to renewable energy is in your hands – literally!

Join in on building Energy Democracy TV  -  the world’s first crowdpublished magazine app on the decentralized, community owned energy transition. Our mission is to spread the message about a world based on 100 % renewable, decentral energy - that´s what we call Energy Democracy.

Energy Democracy TV helps pave the way to a society based on 100 % renewable energy by covering stories that are often neglected or misinterpreted by traditional media: Behind the energy transition are engaged and committed people, conflicts, dramas and heroes of everyday life. They are making the energy revolution happen by pushing for right policies, building a community wind farm or installing solar panels on their roof.

Because of its digital nature, Energy Democracy TV is much more than a magazine: Inside Energy Democracy TV you'll find cross-media content: videos as well as written content, pictures as well as cartoons and infographs - and maybe your content? Our goal is to create a community of Energy Democratizers, worldwide.

 

 

If we reach our goal, we can:

- Edit and publish the first issue in October 2013

- Collaborate with our software developers at Geil,Danke!  Mobile Publishing on  developing a publishing system that allows for crowd publishing - that is, facilitates the collaborative process of collecting and editing content 

- Build a network of contributors and a network of promotional partners

- Set up advertising deals to create a sustainable business – also after the first issue has been published

- Promote Energy Democracy TV – after all, we want the word to get out!


Perks for Energy Democratizers!

As an Energy Democratizer, you get our renewable gratitude, plus our cool perks that you can see at the right hand side. You can get a sneak peek, get a social media shout out, become a contributing editor and get an invite to our pre-launch and launch parties, be a cover girl/guy and get our organic Energy Democratizer t-shirt.

But wait, there´s more! You can join in on an online course on energy policy, ask us anything*, get our workshop on energy policy and/or crowdpublishing, adopt a page and place your ad, enjoy an Energy Democratizer weekend in Copenhagen or even go on the Energy Democratizer study tour covering Danish and German experience and best practice in the field of energy democracy!
(*on energy policy or crowd publishing)

Check the perks out on the right!

Oh, and of course, you get a subscription to the magazine too – it’s free, and content will run on a creative commons licence, because our goal is to get the word out about the democratization of the energy system.

Remember: You can choose any amount for your contribution.

Maybe, you´ve got a friend who´d like to be an Energy Democratizer, too?
Maybe, your local chapter of a green organization should really know about this and tell their members? Maybe, you´ve got the best kept secret story on Energy Democracy just in your backyard?

Help them get their story out – tell them about Energy Democracy TV. Share the love with your friends and family – over coffee, at the water cooler – or send them a mail, tweet about us, or spread Energy Democracy on Facebook.

Also, we´d love to meet you! Take a look at the events calendar in our Newsroom to find out where you can meet us – both in Europe and the US – during the crowdfunding period. Come by and say hi!



On the team

Kirsten Hasberg of Denmark is the Founder and CEO of Energy Democracy TV and has been passionate about renewable energy since she was 14 years old.

In April of 2013, Kirsten quit her job in Germany as manager of the European Project on 100% Renewable Energy Communities in order to launch Energy Democracy TV.

Kirsten is strongly inspired by Dr. Hermann Scheer, the father of the German Renewable Energy Act (Erneuerbare-Energien-Gesetz, EEG). And she was fortunate enough to work for Dr. Scheer as well.

Kirsten has also worked with the pioneers of the Danish renewable energy movement at the Nordic Folkecenter for Renewable Energy in Denmark, and has additionally served as an energy policy advisor to members of the Danish Parliament.

Other professional positions Kirsten has held includes work for the Danish Transmission System Operator (TSO) and Risø DTU, the Danish National Laboratory for Sustainable Energy. Kirsten has been a lecturer at universities in Kassel, Germany, and Copenhagen, Denmark, and she holds a master's degree in economics from the University of Copenhagen. She also writes satirical cabaret songs about the renewable energy transition in both German and English--and has also written the Crowdfunding Song for the Energy Democracy TV campaign.

Please watch the pitch video where Kirsten explains why Energy Democracy TV is essential to making the energy revolution happen. For after all, we must all be the renewable energy we want to see!

---

Also, we are pleased to have US-born journalist and energy expert Craig Morris in the project. It is safe to say that he has become the most prominent explainer of the German energy transition in the English-speaking world over the past year. A resident of Germany since 1992, Craig has been writing about German energy policy in English for more than a decade and is the author of the 2006 book Energy Switch, which explains to North Americans what Germany is doing.

Craig is also the lead author of the new German Energy Transition website, which went online in November 2012; he is also the chief blogger at that site. Since 2010, he has been writing each workday at Renewables International. Craig is currently working on a documentary video in English on the German Energiewende. Go to the video gallery on the top of the campaign page to watch a sample video production by Craig Morris.

---

To secure the tech side of the project, Energy Democracy TV has Michaela Lehr and Michael Brammer on board, who are the founders and CEO's of Geil,Danke! Mobile Publishing in Berlin. They are passionate about creating app magazines with great user experience--to the degree that they actually named their company after the reaction they want from their customers when they receive their work--in English "Geil, Danke!" means "Cool, thank you!"

---

In the United States we have Bob Tregilus, co-host with Kirsten Hasberg on This Week in Energy (TWiE), a weekly new-media show. Each week an expert guest panelist joins TWiE co-hosts, Bob and Kirsten, for an informed thoughtful discussion animated by the week's energy news headlines. TWiE is unique in that it's the only energy industry show that covers hot topics in the energy space from the perspective of energy transition (Energiewende) policy experts.

Bob Tregilus is based in Reno, Nevada, where he founded Feed-in Tariffs for Nevada (FIT4NV), which had an active FIT bill (based on the German Renewable Energy Act) in the 2011 Nevada State Legislature. He also co-founded the Electric Auto Association of Northern Nevada (EAANN) and he is passionate about the energy transition, electric vehicles, vehicle-to-grid (V2G) and smart garage technology, as well as global economic-, social-, and energy-justice.

---

Other invaluable members of the Energy Democracy TV team include: Waqas Hussain, Juliane Sperber, Amanda Groschke, Sjouke Ritsema and Thomas Gerke.

Special thanks to video producer Daniel Weissensteiner and music producer and singing coach Gitte Degn Calstrup for donating the production of the Crowdfunding Song to the project!

 

Ready to become an Energy Democratizer? Click the button to the right to contribute!

 

Energy Democracy TV is a founding partner and media partner of the Go 100 % Renewable Energy Campaign and a Partner of the Documentary Film Project "The Future of Energy".

 

 

  

As featured by (in English):





A greener life a greener world Blog

Earthtechling.com

Etopia News





As featured by (in German):







 Energy Democracy takes part in Kicking it forward

story:
Introducing the Zycle e-bike.

Zycle is compact enough to fit in your luggage yet powerfully equipped with a 250W motor, 20-40 mile range and a top speed of 20 mph. Engineered for performance & portability with a durable 6061 aircraft aluminum frame. Travel the distance & double your range in seconds with Zycle's quick-swap battery.

 

Electric Bike Review of Zycle

 

 

What is it like to ride   Zyle like firsthand? Watch the video and read the full first-hand report from Electric Bike Review.

 

 

  







 

 

The electric revolution is here, and Zycle is leading the charge. Reduce your carbon footprint, ditch the gridlock, and save yourself the hassle of a heavy bike. Aside from Zycle's durability, the portable and interchangeable battery meets all FAA requirements, allowing you to fly with it! 

 

 

 

 

 


 

Weighing in at only 42 lbs, including the battery, Zycle is one of the lightest eBikes on the road.

  

 

  

 

The quick fold system, makes it easy for you to take your Zycle with you anywhere and everywhere. It's as simple as folding the frame, the stem, and adjusting the seat. 

 

  

 

 

Crafted with 6061 Aircraft Aluminum, Zycle weighs 42lbs, including the 4lb battery. Compared to other eBikes on the market that weigh up to 45lbs, not including a battery. While Zycle is light, it is also strong, with a weight capacity of 330lbs.

 

  

 

 

With waterproof sealant and 6061 Aircraft Aluminum, Zycle can withstand all conditions. We've stress tested the durable 6061-grade aluminum frame to ensure it is high quality, long-lasting, and weatherproof, so your Zycle endures the city streets.

 

 

  


 

Travel the distance with a 250W motor, compact and adjustable battery, Tektro front and rear dual disc brakes, and much more. Not one for 100% electric? No problem, Zycle comes with a 5 level pedal assist Shimano gear system.

 

 

  

 

 

With a maximum torque of 35 N.m, Zycle can tackle hills with up to 45 degrees gradeability. Comprised of 6 gears and 5 levels of pedal assist, you can choose to ride your Zycle with assistance or without.


 

  • Throttle - You have the choice to pedal and not use the throttle or only use the throttle and make your Zycle 100% electric.
  • Pedal assist - Choose from 5 levels or pedal assist without a throttle. Level 1 is the lowest assist level with little help to level 5 which is the strongest assist level giving the rider extensive help. You also have the option to turn the pedal assist off, turning Zycle into a normal bike.

 

 

  

Designed to be compact and easily removable for ease of travel and convenience.

 

Each interchangeable lithium-ion 36V 7.8ah Samsung battery pack gives Zycle a range of 20-40 miles. Doubling as a power bank, with s USB port neatly hidden on the underside, so you can charge your small electronics on the go.

That's not all! Approved by the FAA, you can easily travel with Zycle.

 

  


 

Using quality parts like Xenon head and tail lights, you are riding a machine built by bicyclists for bicyclists. Aside from providing light for safety, the Xenon lights use a minimal battery, giving you more distance for your ride!

 

 

  


 

With Zycle's built-in Bluetooth technology and low maintenance self-controller, you can track mileage traveled and take care of any issues your Zycle might experience on your own.

 

 

  

 

Connecting to your smartphone through Bluetooth, you can track your statistics including mileage, travel time, speed, battery level, mapped route, and even your CO2 emission reduction. Additionally, every time you turn your Zycle on, the app will run a diagnostics test to ensure everything is running smoothly.

 

 

  

 

With a built-in smart controller, Zycle runs a 60 point self-inspection of the controller and software so you are alerted to any issues with your bike before you start your ride. Just like your car's oil change, Zycle will run mileage checks for routine maintenance every 3-5,000 miles.

 

 

  


 

 

 


 

 

 

 

After years of following and working in the bike industry, we saw there was a huge void in the electric bike business. Many people were looking for an affordable, entry-level electric bike. After running the numbers, we began asking the same questions and realized that most electric bike businesses were going from the manufacturer to wholesale, to the distributor, to local retail stores. Each phase tacking on an industry average 40% mark up. This lead to the most basic electric bike costing over $2,199.  Aside from the high prices, we noticed many were neither ergonomic or aesthetically pleasing. Most electric bikes were bulky, with unnecessary parts that added more weight to the bike itself. In addition, the Batteries were oversized and didn't hold enough power. We set out to engineer a compact battery that delivers more power and is half the weight and price. We went for the minimalist yet, perfected electric bike whilst keeping the cost as low as possible, therefore creating Zycle. 

 


 

 

 

 

 

1. What is the Warranty on ZYCLE? From shipment date, ZYCLE's come with a 1-Year warranty on all parts. 

2. What are your shipping methods? ZYCLE's ship via UPS or FEDEX. 

3. When will I receive my ZYCLE? ZYCLES will Ship March 2018.

4. How does the App work with ZYCLE? Start off by turning on your ZYCLE. Once you have done that, open up the ZYCLE app. There it will ask if you want to connect to the ZYCLE via Blue-Tooth. Press yes. Once connected, The app will get you data analytics of how many mi/km you have traveled, where you are located, be able to toggle the lights on and off and also, checks itself to see if there are any problems with your ZYCLE.

5. How fast does ZYCLE go? 20mph/32kmph

6. What is the range of ZYCLE? Depending on riders weight and level of pedal assist or throttle being used, you can expect to get at least 30 miles (48km) out of your ZYCLE with the potential to get up to 60 miles (96km) range. 

7. What is the charge time for the ZYCLE? 3-4 hours. 

8. Do I need to have any type of license to ride it since there is a motor? No you do not. It is classified as a normal bike. Be sure to always follow local city and state laws. 

9. Can I charge my phone with the ZYCLE? Yes! The ZYCLE battery has a USB port on it that acts as a portable charger!

10. How old do I have to be to ride the ZYCLE? Although there is no set age, we recommend riders to be at least 15 years of age. 

11. Will my ZYCLE come assembled/Ready to ride? Yes! The ZYCLE comes ready to ride immediately upon arrival!

12. Does the ZYCLE come with any tools? Every ZYCLE ships with a basic tool pack that can assist you in tightening all the bolts and screws on the bike in the case you need to. 

13. Can I buy extra ZYCLE batteries? Yes! Absolutely! We recommend you do as you can travel up to 100+ miles (160km) with two battery packs. They are so compact you can fit 2 more in your back pack!

14. Do you have a support email? Yes! Email us "Support@RideZYCLE.com

15. Can ZYCLE fit in a car? Yes! Depending on the type of car you have, you can fit up to 3-4 ZYCLES when folded, into your car! No more need for that bulky bike rack!

16. What are the shipping costs for Zycle? US: $99, Japan: $150, Rest Of World: $299

6. What is the range of ZYCLE? Depending on riders weight and level of pedal assist or throttle being used, you can expect to get at least 30 miles (48km) out of your ZYCLE with the potential to get up to 60 miles (96km) range. 
7. What is the charge time for the ZYCLE? 3-4 hours. 
8. Do I need to have any type of license to ride it since there is a motor? No you do not. It is classified as a normal bike. Be sure to always follow local city and state laws. 
9. Can I charge my phone with the ZYCLE? Yes! The ZYCLE battery has a USB port on it that acts as a portable charger!
10. How old do I have to be to ride the ZYCLE? Although there is no set age, we recommend riders to be at least 15 years of age. 
11. Will my ZYCLE come assembled/Ready to ride? Yes! The ZYCLE comes ready to ride immediately upon arrival!
12. Does the ZYCLE come with any tools? Every ZYCLE ships with a basic tool pack that can assist you in tightening all the bolts and screws on the bike in the case you need to. 
13. Can I buy extra ZYCLE batteries? Yes! Absolutely! We recommend you do as you can travel up to 100+ miles (160km) with two battery packs. They are so compact you can fit 2 more in your back pack!
14. Do you have a support email? Yes! Email us "Support@RideZYCLE.com
15. Can ZYCLE fit in a car? Yes! Depending on the type of car you have, you can fit up to 3-4 ZYCLES when folded, into your car! No more need for that bulky bike rack!
16. What are the shipping costs for Zycle? US: $99, Japan: $150, Rest Of World: $299

story:
As part of the Petersen Automotive Museum's 25th-anniversary celebration, we want to work with the Indiegogo community to restore this 1969 Corwin Getaway back to its original glory. With your help, we're hoping to raise $32,000.

  • The Petersen is a 501(c)(3) non-profit automotive museum located in Los Angeles, CA.
  • The Corwin represents a significant vehicle in Los Angeles car culture and African American automotive history
  • If we achieve our goal, we will be able to restore our Corwin back to its original color and make it as authentic as the day it was built.

 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

$5 - Wallpaper pack (Ted7 Images)

$15- Limited Edition Poster (Signed)

$25 - Shirt + Wallpaper pack

$55 -  Shirt + Vault Tour

$100 - Unveiling Party (December 2nd) + Poster

$250 - Unveiling Party (December 2nd) + Meet and Greet with Cliff Hall

$900 - 45-minute ride around LA in the Corwin + Everything else (Excludes Airfare- subject to timing)

*Preview images only, final product images to be featured soon. 

 

 

Let's Get The Word Out!

We want to thank you for checking out our page.  Any amount you contribute is greatly appreciated.  Even if you can't participate by donating money, we'd still love your help: Please share this page with anyone you think will find it interesting.  Anyone who is a fan of Los Angeles, Cars, Engineering, Entrepreneurs or History will love and appreciate Cliff Hall's story. -Thanks!

story:
Our Story

After having successfully built an electric bike company E-JOE, I am continuing my passion to share the benefits of environmental-friendly transportation to others.  We launched MOMAS Electric Scooter last fall on Kickstarter with great success. Building on that momentum, we are introducing our latest model, the MOMAS CARBON Electric Scooter.

Weighing only 14 lbs (6.3 kg) and made with a slim carbon fiber frame and deck, the new design of MOMAS CARBON is the perfect solution for urban commuters needing short distance transportation.

We have developed a close relationship with our manufacturing and resource partners as well as the patents holder of this technology, and developed a thorough understanding of what it takes to successfully bring an original light-weight carbon electric scooter to market.

 

 

Why crowdfunding? It allows us to gain valuable insight from customers about our current and future products. Best of all, it allows us to focus our energies on innovating and bringing new products to market.

 

 

 

Specifications (Technical Standard)

Material: Carbon fiber frame and deck

Weight: 14 lbs (6.3 kg)

Motor: 5.5" high wheel torque motor

Output power: 24V/36V 250W

Brake system: EABS electronic brake system, mechanical auxiliary brake

Battery: Imported LG 18650 cell-lithium ion battery

Top speed: 16 mph (25 kph)

Max payload: 125 KG / 275 LBS

Climbing angle: 20 degrees

Tyre: Non-aerated rubber tyre

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Impact

 

The United Nations (UN) projections show that urbanization combined with the overall growth of the world’s population could add another 2.5 billion people to urban populations by 2050. We need a way to move around on a short distance travel that isn’t inside a car. the environmental benefits of Electric Vehicles (EVs) have continued to grow - cementing the role of electric vehicles, such as MOMAS carbon electric scooter in halving U.S. oil use and cutting global warming emissions.

Having fun riding MOMAS carbon electric scooter while helping to reduce emission sounds like a good idea!

 

 

Risks & Challenges

There are lots of copycat out there and we know it. By working directly with the patents holder and reliable resource partners, we can assure you that we are the only company who are able to produce an authentic and patented carbon electric scooter with the best quality components.

 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

The success of this project depends heavily upon getting the word out. Every social networking post and repost counts. Please also share this campaign with "Indiegogo share tools" or on your own.

story:
Rumble Motors
               
               
              ​RIDE THE FUTURE TODAY     

    


          Media Coverage


                                  

                                    

                                                                                                                                                                                                                              



The story of the three brothers behind Rumble Motors

Everything started around 1977 when the three brothers Alex, Reza and Hendrik turned their motorcycles into Cafe Racer bikes.

The dream was to one day start their own company and make it something special.
Rumble Motors is a company based on innovation and understanding of today’s transportation.

We wanted Rumble e-Bike to fit everyone, we understood that many "motor-heads" like us didn't like the fact that electric bikes didn't have an engine sound. Therefore, we created a great sound that resembles the Rumble feeling when you hit the throttle, also for safety it is perfect if you are riding your Rumble in the city enabling drivers to hear you coming.


from left: Alex, Reza, Hendrik - Year: 1977



The Only Scooter That Feels And Looks Like A Motorcycle  


​
EARLY SKETCHES: BY ALEX​


​

0-70 KM / 0-44 MILES IN JUST 5 SECONDS

  



GET READY FOR SOME ATTENTION WHEN YOU HIT THE ROADS WITH YOUR RUMBLE E-BIKE


​
TESTING RUMBLE IN SAN FRANCISCO HILLSIDES   


​
SUCCESSFUL PRODUCT TESTING


​

RUMBLE DEMO

ENGINE SOUND AND FRONT WHEEL FORK


​
VISIT OUR SHOP IN SACRAMENTO AND TEST DRIVE RUMBLE E-BIKE 


​
RUMBLES FRONT FORK CREATES MUCH SMALLER TURNING RADIUS


​
GO SILENT OR GO RUMBLE?
YOUR CHOICE

                               


                                



RIDE IN STYLE WITH YOUR RUMBLE SUNGLASSES



                                                                                           

NEW ATTACHMENT TO YOUR RUMBLE BIKE
 

 

 
Accessibility is key for us at Rumble Motors, we always want to be unique and creative with our products that's why we added a electric skateboard to your Rumble bike.
 



​
RUMBLES ELECTRIC SKATEBOARD IS ONLY 17-INCHES 

                                 


​
Rumble E-Skateboard Specifications 

​
Features:

* Made of premium imported maple wood 
* PU highly elastic wheel, wear-resistant and durable 
* Easy wireless Bluetooth remote control 
* Attaches under the seat of your Rumble e-bike

Specification: 

* Product size: 440 x 160mm 

* Wheel size: 2.5 inch 

* Power: 200W 

* Climbing degree: 15° 

* Charging time 1.5H 

* Charging current: 2A 

* Wheel material: PU high elastic wheel 

* Speed per hour: 15-20km/h 

* Range: 10 - 15km 

*Max load 120kg 

*Control system:Wireless Bluetooth remote control 


Let's Beat The Stretch Goals 

                                                                                         
                                                                                        ​

Follow us on social media and get the latest news about Rumble e-bike and the future attachments.

Instagram - Facebook - Youtube - Website




                                                                                       

                              TIMELINE
 
                               

             

                                  

 

FAQs

Q: Do you ship worldwide?

Yes, we have all the certifications to ship worldwide.

Q: Can I ride my Rumble e-bike if it's rainy outside?

A: Yes, Rumble e-bike is water resistance.

Q: How much is the shipping cost?

A: The shipping cost will be paid before we ship your Rumble e-bike, we didn't add it into our Indiegogo campaign just to make sure you don't pay more then you need, we will ship it with the lowest rate possible in April 2018 to your country.
The shipping cost will be approx: $100 - $300 depending where you are located, but this will be paid in April 2018.

Q: What happens when I need spare batteries or parts later in the future?

A: We will sell all the parts inclusive the batteries on our website

Q: What kind of accessories do you currently have or can I expect in the near future?

A: There is already accessories to your Rumble e-bike as helmet, sunglasses and a attachable electric skateboard and we will announce new accessories on our social media for future products. 

Q: Can I test ride a Rumble E-Bike?

A: Yes, we have a shop in Sacramento California, you can always let us know and we will make sure that you can ride a Rumble e-bike.

Q:  What is the max weight limit for Rumble?

A: The maximum weight limit is 150kg/330pounds

Q: Does Rumble E-Bike come in different sizes? 

A: Rumble e-bike comes only in one size.

Q: How much does a Rumble E-Bike weigh?

A: Rumble e-bike is 105kg/231pounds

Q: What is the range per fully charged battery?

A: Our special made lithium-ion battery gives you a 100km/60miles

Q: How long does it take to charge the battery?

A: The Rumble battery fast charges up to 80% in just 1hour, this is to make sure that you don't need to wait for a longer time before you can hit the roads again, fully charged around 3hours

Q: How is the Rumble E-Bike delivered and is it easy to assemble?

A: The Rumble e-bike comes 95 % assembled, it takes 10 minutes to assemble the remaining 5%

Q: What kind of warranty do you offer?  

A: Rumble e-bikes come with a 2 year manufacturer's warranty on the frame. As many elements of a bike may get damaged due to normal usage and we do not offer warranty on parts such as tires, disc brakes etc.´

Q: Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT?

A: The backer is responsible for import duties and taxes, please check your country's import duties before purchasing. 

Q: Can I buy Rumble E-Bikes in bulk to sell in my country?

A: Yes, you can send us a email to info@rumble-motors.com and we will get back to you.

Q: Can I get a refund?

A: Please refer to IndieGoGo's policy here.



Thank You All For The Support On Our Social Media And All The Media Attention Worldwide. 

We Couldn't Done This Without YOU.

Have A Great Rumble Day And We See You Soon On The Roads.

 

  Rumble Motors 

   RIDE THE FUTURE TODAY

story:
Hello, my name is Jon. I live in Murrieta, CA. As someone who has been riding bikes of all shapes, sizes, and types throughout the course of my life. I truly believe in the power of cycling. For some, bikes are the perfect way to get out of traffic and make that commute to work a little more tolerable. For others it's a way to squeeze in some exercise without being stuck in the gym, or they can simply be a way to relieve some of that built up stress that so many of us are burdened with. More importantly there is a group within society for which a bike is much more than entertainment or exercise - it is a necessary tool. Many people rely on their bicycle as their primary mode of transportation. Due to the relative simplicity and affordability, a bicycle can be the perfect solution for those who cannot afford the high cost of owning and operating an automobile. Ben is one such person.

I met Ben after seeing him riding his bike through our neighborhood. He rides his bike for several hours each day collecting recyclables all over town. Seeing as he is part of a car-free-family, his bike serves as his primary transportation and in addition to his recycling used for running errands, shopping...etc. This is no easy task seeing as we live in a sprawling suburban community located in an arid region of southern California. A simple trip to the store may be a few miles away. And in the summer, daytime temperatures are consistently in the high 90's and low 100's. 

The bike he currently rides was built for a teenage girl and is far too small for his frame. Additionally, the condition is overwhelmingly subpar and it is in great need of repair. Even with this less than ideal setup he manages to collect many large garbage bags (as seen in the picture) worth of recyclables each week. Unfortunately he can only carry one bag at a time on his small, ill-equipped bike. With the recycling center over 5 miles away Ben spends 2-3 days per week making multiple trips back and forth from the recycling center. Imagine riding 30 miles a day to move 3 bags of cans. All of this in addition to any normal riding he needed to collect the goods and run errands and such. 

I had seen Ben many times but hadn't actually met him until recently when I saw him working on a bike in his driveway and decided to go introduce myself. We chatted about what he does and how things were going. He then mentioned that the bike he was currently working on was one he had picked up so that he could donate to a local food bank in hopes that they could either sell it for profit or donate it to someone who needed it. He said that whenever he comes across a bike someone is trying to get rid of or sell (usually "for under $5"), that he will do his "repair and donate" to try and help out the local community. This was one of the most selfless things I had ever heard and was truly inspiring. In particular I was inspired to try and do something for him, seeing as even with bikes coming and going thru his garage he still rides the same young girls bike and donates the others. I asked if he could use a new bike and his response was a quick and positive "Yes!", followed by an equally negative comment about how he can't afford to pay much for one. I told him I'd see what I could do, and this is what has led me to start this campaign. 

By helping Ben with the purchase a better fitting bike and an accompanying trailer, we will enable him to collect more, recycle more, and maybe more important than those things, to both enjoy life more and keep up his health.

I've set the fundraising goal to $500 as that is the lowest amount possible to get Ben a bike and trailer that will help him out. Hopefully this is a realistic goal that we can meet. The bike that Ben receives will depend on the amount of money raised. If we reach our goal, then the plan is to purchase and present Ben with a hybrid/commuter style bike with a small cargo trailer to go with it. These types of bikes start at around $350 and the trailers at $150. If more funds become available, then a more work-based bike (like a Mondo, or Surly) would be purchased along with a "Bikes at Work" trailer. Both options will get the job done and greatly increase both Ben's comfort and recycling capacity, with the later providing a better built purpose minded product.

As of yet, I have nothing to offer as a perk except for giving you the opportunity of helping others who are trying to make ends meet in any way possible and in turn, helping the world become a better place along the way. 

If you can't donate, but know of people who this might appeal to, please pass my campaign along.

Also, any and all money that is raised that exceeds the purchase price of a bike and trailer will go straight to Ben and his wife. 

Thank you, 

Jon

Unfortunately he can only carry one bag at a time on his small, ill-equipped bike. With the recycling center over 5 miles away Ben spends 2-3 days per week making multiple trips back and forth from the recycling center. Imagine riding 30 miles a day to move 3 bags of cans. All of this in addition to any normal riding he needed to collect the goods and run errands and such.  I had seen Ben many times but hadn't actually met him until recently when I saw him working on a bike in his driveway and decided to go introduce myself. We chatted about what he does and how things were going. He then mentioned that the bike he was currently working on was one he had picked up so that he could donate to a local food bank in hopes that they could either sell it for profit or donate it to someone who needed it. He said that whenever he comes across a bike someone is trying to get rid of or sell (usually "for under $5"), that he will do his "repair and donate" to try and help out the local community. This was one of the most selfless things I had ever heard and was truly inspiring. In particular I was inspired to try and do something for him, seeing as even with bikes coming and going thru his garage he still rides the same young girls bike and donates the others. I asked if he could use a new bike and his response was a quick and positive "Yes!", followed by an equally negative comment about how he can't afford to pay much for one. I told him I'd see what I could do, and this is what has led me to start this campaign.  By helping Ben with the purchase a better fitting bike and an accompanying trailer, we will enable him to collect more, recycle more, and maybe more important than those things, to both enjoy life more and keep up his health.
I've set the fundraising goal to $500 as that is the lowest amount possible to get Ben a bike and trailer that will help him out. Hopefully this is a realistic goal that we can meet. The bike that Ben receives will depend on the amount of money raised. If we reach our goal, then the plan is to purchase and present Ben with a hybrid/commuter style bike with a small cargo trailer to go with it. These types of bikes start at around $350 and the trailers at $150. If more funds become available, then a more work-based bike (like a Mondo, or Surly) would be purchased along with a "Bikes at Work" trailer. Both options will get the job done and greatly increase both Ben's comfort and recycling capacity, with the later providing a better built purpose minded product. As of yet, I have nothing to offer as a perk except for giving you the opportunity of helping others who are trying to make ends meet in any way possible and in turn, helping the world become a better place along the way.  If you can't donate, but know of people who this might appeal to, please pass my campaign along. Also, any and all money that is raised that exceeds the purchase price of a bike and trailer will go straight to Ben and his wife.  Thank you,  Jon

story:
About this project


Why have we started Monument?

We are taking more photos than ever. Smartphones, digital cameras and action cams are all around us, and capturing our best memories has become a part of everyday life.

Unfortunately, storing, organizing and accessing these memories is still very difficult, requiring a computer and lots of time. And while cloud services offer a partial solution, we have to pay monthly fees for the rest of our lives. Plus the whole privacy thing.

The tools we need to manage our photos have not evolved at the same pace as our awesome cameras.

We knew there had to be a better way, and we set out to find it with one simple mission:

"Make managing our photos and videos as easy as taking them!"

The Monument app on iOS and Android automatically transfers photos and videos from your phone to Monument.

By default, syncing starts upon connecting to your home Wi-Fi network. This achieves a faster transfer rate and relieves stress on your smartphone battery. You can also sync your photos and videos when you're away from home by enabling remote syncing in the app settings.

The SD Card slot on Monument accepts standard SD Cards. When a new SD Card is inserted for the first time, a notification is displayed in the app asking you whether the content should be imported. Upon approval, all the content is stored in Monument.

Our advanced AI (Artificial Intelligence) algorithms start organizing all of your content as it is stored on Monument. It sorts everything by date, time, location, cameras as well as faces and what's in a photo.

Since everything is organized, instead of just browsing photos on a simple timeline, Monument provides you multiple ways to view them. 

  • Time Machine: It's a perfect tool to look back on your memories, be it two years or ten years ago. Great for Instagram throwbacks? Yeah, we know!
  • Favorites: Have something great that you always want to have with you and access quickly? Just fave it, and now it has a special place.
  • Faces: Quickly view your photos of any specific person. It’s easier than ever to find and enjoy memories of your loved ones.
  • World Map: Monument displays all your photos on a map. Zoom and pan around to find your most memorable destinations. You don't have to be a globetrotter to use this, but it will look much nicer if you are. 
  • Cameras: Have more than one camera? See the photos taken with each. Another great way to find what you’re looking for!

Our algorithms analyze your photos to understand what’s in them. So you can find the photo you’re looking for by searching with keywords, such as snow, beach, mountain or outdoor. No manual tagging or organizing required. 

Monument makes it easy to enjoy all of your content on any iOS or android device.

To view your photos and videos on big screen, Monument offers direct HDMI connection to your TV.  

Monument uses external USB drives for storage to give you complete flexibility. You can have as much or as little storage as you need. Below you can see some example configurations and corresponding capacity: 

  • 1 Disk (1TB) - Stores up to 150,000 Photos or 70 hours of video
  • 2 Disks (2x 1TB) - Stores up to 300,000 Photos or 140 hours of video
  • 2 Disks (2x 2TB) - Stores up to 600,000 Photos or 280 hours of video

Calculations are based on photos taken by an entry level DSLR Camera (Using JPEG Fine settings) and videos recorded by an iPhone 6 (1080p at 60fps). Actual figures may vary. 2TB is just an example and not a limitation. 

As you need more space by time, you can increase Monument’s capacity by adding another drive or replacing one with a larger model.

Everyone we have talked to loves the idea of flexible storage, and we’re sure you’ll love it, too.

Backups are a must for everyone, but we rarely remember to back up our photos and videos. Monument provides two options to protect your precious data.  

  • Local Backup: You can connect two disk drives that will be used in a RAID-1 configuration, i.e. disks will be mirrored. 
  • Remote Backup: Monument can back up all data to a remote Monument device over internet using a secure connection.

Monument is developed specifically to answer all photo and video management needs. It tries to simplify all the steps involved in managing your photos, namely; storing, organizing, viewing, sharing and making sure they are protected. 

We also wanted to provide users a solution without any strings attached. A solution that will be with them in the long haul. 

Using an iPhone? Watch this video to see what Monument can do for you.

Using an action cam? Watch this video to see how Monument can help you.

Using a camera and a smartphone? Watch this to see what Monument can do for you.

Monument's Artificial Intelligence technology understands the scenes in photos and performs face recognition. Monument is able to classify photographs into classes such as beach, mountains, snow, city, indoor etc. The final list of categories will be later determined.

As photos are classified, you can easily search your archives and quickly find your photos.

Monument detects the faces in your photos and our app provides an easy to use interface to manage these faces. Once you teach Monument whose face is whose, it will automatically group your photos according to who is in them. 

You have full control over which people will be detected by Monument, and you can add or remove people whenever you want.

Our passion for photography and making things inspired us to build the photo management solution of our dreams. In the last year, we have designed, coded and built prototypes to make our vision a reality.  

We showcased Monument at CES in January. From start to finish, our booth was packed with visitors. We received great feedback and met many wonderful people throughout the show. They loved Monument, and you will, too.

We're a passionate team of eight that has become a family, including industrial designers, electrical engineers, software engineers and UI/UX experts. We embarked on to a mission: to make photo and video management as easy as taking one.

We started our journey in Istanbul, and are currently headquartered in beautiful Chicago.

 

 

   

  • Startupbootcamp Istanbul for helping us progress a lot faster. 
  • ITU Gate for helping us with our transition to the US.
  • 1871 Incubation Center in Chicago for being our home.
  • Objectlab for working with us to create a great design that everybody loves!
  • HWTrek for their support with design and manufacturing.

And most importantly, we thank our families for their tremendous support, without them this wouldn't have been possible.

Risks and challenges

Bringing a product into a market can be hard as there are so many aspects involved. Let us briefly tell you about these:

1. Electronics: 
After two prototypes, we have our third prototype manufactured in by our partners in Shenzhen, China, the manufacturing capital of the world. This prototype is functional and mostly in its final stage, requiring only minor changes. Our manufacturing partner has extensive experience with the chipset we are using and this will also help us with inventory management and sourcing.

2. Industrial Design: 
We have finalized our design and it's mostly ready for molding and mass manufacturing. We have selected our manufacturing partner and will start designing the mold as soon as the project is funded.

3. Software: 
We have most parts of the mobile software ready, but only tested on iOS platform. The software framework we use allows us to use the same codebase on Android as well, and we will start testing with different devices. The firmware that runs on the device is built as separate modules. Photo management, communication interface and face detection routines are mostly complete. Scene detection, video management and some glue logic is still under development.

We estimate deliveries to begin in September and we will do our best to meet this deadline. Should we encounter any delays, we will always share the latest good and bad news with you.

Love, 
The Monument Team

story:
Anyone Can Be A Skater

 

Unlike pricey boards from big brands who needs to cover huge cost on marketing, Maxfind electric skateboards are affordable with quality parts. We provides 2 models for your choice: Max C is a 8.1lbs, 27inch lightweight mini electric skateboard that for stylish urban commute. Max A is an electric longboard with dual brushless hub motors and speeds of up to 16 mph with 8 miles range. It's made from 8-ply of Canadian maple veneers electric skateboard that designed for some free riding and dancing.

 

 

MAX C At A Glance

 

 

 

 

Press Mentions

 

"Definitely, something I’ll be trying a lot more of in the next few weeks. A perfect thing to carry around with you this summer!"

 

"It is extremely fun to ride, for starters"

 

 

 

Latest Reviews

 

Britec

Cool New Electric Skateboard Maxfind Max C

 

TechLineHD

Max C Review - Best Budget Electric Skateboard 2017?

 
 

TwinzTV

Twinztv got a happy ride with our MAX A after the road rage

 

 

El Rincón de China

Mi PRIMERA VEZ en un SKATE ELÉCTRICO, ¿me mataré? | MAX C
 
 

 

Unibody Design, Incredibly Light

 

The injection-molding technology and unibody design made Max C as sleek and elegant as your favorite skateboard, but she is so much more.

 

Constructed with high strength polymers and premium carbon fiber the board is lightweight, yet strong enough to carry a weight of up to 176lbs/ 80kg.

 

Featuring an integrated handle at the head of the board, Max C's ergonomic design makes it easy to pick up, carry, and store. Its kick-tail deck shape and lightweight hub motor make it easy to go for a cruise, and do some tricks.

 

Rugged To Go Anywhere

 

Max C is ready to go everywhere. Its IP65 water & dust proof design shrugs off rain, puddles, dust, and sand.

We have selected the brushless motor with excellent heat dissipation structure and sealed it with covers, which can greatly reduce the bearing, motor, and control board contact with water and dust contact. The good performance in reducing the working temperature of the motor will greatly extend the motor life as well.

 

Powerful Motor, Hill Climbing At Ease

 

Powered by a high-performance brushless hub motor, Max C gives you strong brake, fast acceleration, and steep hill climbing. The hub motor can storage electricity when it's on the downhill and convert part of the potential energy to electric energy and avoid damage to the motor caused by overload. Reaching a speed of 15 mph and climbing 20° hills, MAX C is perfect for users looking for a powerful yet affordable way to get around.

 

 

LED Light For Night Rides

 

Your safety is our first concern. The hi-power LED headlights and taillights of Max C ensure that you are visible at night to traffic and pedestrians. And it'll be much easier for you to ride at night in a dimly lit sports venues, alleys or tunnels.

  

 

Scene

 

 

MAX C Specifications

 

 

 

MAX C Vs. Other Competitors

 

 

Choose The One For You

 

The Max C comes in four color editions: carbon black, jade green, candy pink and ocean blue. Your choice of four vigorous deck colors and coordinated wheel colors!

 

Trusted Star Product - MAX A

 

Presenting our trusted star product, MAX A electric longboard: offers dual brushless hub motors, weighs only 12 lbs and achieves speeds of up to 16 mph with 8 miles range. The elastic deck of MAX A is made from 8-ply of Canadian maple veneers for strength and stability. If you’re committed to down hill, sliding and some free riding, definitely get MAX A.

 

What Our Customers Say About MAX A:

 

 

 

 

 

5 stars on ChooseBoards:

 

MAX A Specifications

 

 

Perks

 

 

Share to Get Activity

 

We are going to give the Sharing Activities to promote MAX-C electric skateboards. You have the chance to receive a series of gifts after your succefully sharing of MAX-C to your friends who buy them through your recommendations. 

More details as follows:

 

How Do I Participant

1. Log into your Indiegogo account.

2. Click on the referral link under the on the right of Max C video and share with your friends and/or share via the social buttons under the video.

3. Make sure your friends use your unique referral link when they buy, so you get credit.

4. You can check your account and see how many referral dollars you have driven.

 

Rules

1. You must be a contributor to the campaign.

2. You will only get the referral credit if you are logged in to Indiegogo, and share your personal referral link. Your friends must use this link to purchase their perks.

 

Distributor

 

Interested in being a distributor of Maxfind in your country? Drop us an email at b2b@maxfindboard.com with your inquiry and we will get back to you as soon as possible!

 

Maxfind Team

 

Maxfind is a startup team dedicated to electric skateboards that built in 2015. Our star products MAX A and MAX B electric longboards have admitted by thousands of users over the world and got nice comments on Amazon. And our team are heavy users of our own boards. This time we want to introduce MAX C - a light-weighted, electric skateboard at an affordable price. It’s easy and fun to get on the board compared with traditional skateboard. And our initial thoughts of it is to make electric skateboards as normal as smartphones by making it affordable and useable. To make it true, we are going to do more with your support.

 

Timeline

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions

 

Features

Q1: What is the max speed? What is the average distance? What is the max weight limit?

A1:

 Max A

Max speed: 28km/h(17mph)( depends on user's weight and road situation )
Max Mileage :13km/8miles  (will affected by riders' weight, riding skills, speed, road, etc) 
Max Weight Limit: 100 KG/220lbs 

Max C

Max speed:24km/h(15mph)( depends on user's weight and road situation )

Max Mileage : 16km/10miles  (will affected by riders' weight, riding skills, speed, road, etc)

Max Weight Limit: 80 KG/176lbs

Q2: Is the Maxfind board waterproof?

A2: The drive of Maxfind board is IP65 dust & water proof . In testing, the board held up well when ridden on paths and roads with surface water, however, we advise users to avoid water. Water damage will void the warranty.

Q3: How long will the battery last and how long to recharge?

A3: While being used the battery will last about 40 minutes to 1 hour and will only take about 1 hour to fully recharge.

Q4: Does the board has regenerative braking?

A4: Yes, it does , but this will save small energy which is used for heat energy while riding.

Q5: Is the battery fixed to the board ? Or can it be removed and swapped out with fully charged battery? 


A5: MAX C is unibody designed with lithium ion battery pack bulit in the deck. The battery of MAX A is removable and can be installed easily. 

Using

Q1: How do I control the Maxfind boards?

A1,The board comes with a wireless remote controller. You can accelerate by pushing the joystick up on the remote. Use your bodyweight to turn, like a traditional skateboard.

Q2: Does this go backward also?

A2: Yes, the Maxfind Skateboard does indeed go forward and backward and is controlled by a wireless hand-held remote.

Q3: Are there speed modes on the Maxfind and how to switch between them?

A3: Yes, there are 2 modes: beginner mode up to 10km/h and sport mode up to 28km/h(17mph)(Max A) or 24km/h (15mph) (Max C). You can switch between modes by switching the side button to "Hi" and " Lo" 

Q4: How do I slow down?

A4: Brake by pulling back the joystick on the remote.

Q5: Can I make it go faster than the listed top speed?

A5: We limit the speed to 22-28 km/h (17mph) for safety. Sorry we won’t raise this limit for anyone nor can you access the software in any way to change that yourself.

Q6: Can I ride the board uphill?

A6: Yes, up to 20 degrees on Max A, up to15 degrees on Max C, depending on the rider's weight and road surface.

Q7: Can I do tricks on the board?

A7: The board has been designed to cover distances quickly. Straight riding and carving are encouraged but tricks such as kickflips will be considered misuse and will void your warranty. But you can do some tricks on Max C, just make it safe.

Q8: Can you still use it if it runs out of battery like a normal skate board then get it back charged up?

A8: Yes, you can absolutely continue to ride the Maxfind Skateboard after the battery dies. Once you manually skateboard home, you can just plug it back into the wall and within an hour the skateboard will be fully charged again.

Buying

Q1: What's your delivery time?

A1: We'll ship out the first batch of orders 30 days after our Indiegogo campaign ends.The shipment time depends on the way we ship. express for product with battery usually takes about 12-15 days, if bigger order we will do by air to airport or seaway to the port.

PS: we have warehouse in US, Belgium, Australia and German where we can arrange shipment directly. 

Q2: Are you trading company or manufacturer?

A2: We are Manufacturer of Maxfind electric skateboard, we have our own design team, Manufacturing team.

After-buying

Q1: How about After-sale service?

A1: After order the goods, we will offer the best after-sale service for you. For example, offer the damageable parts, image or other details to you for your advertisement etc.

Q2:Do the Maxfind boards come with a warranty?

A2: Yes, the Maxfind boards come with a 1-year warranty, which covers the motor, battery, and remote. However, water damage or misuse will void the warranty.

Q3: How do I claim a warranty if I think the board is not operating properly?

A3: Contact Maxfind and send us information and a picture or video. We will contact the manufacturer who will assess the case and send the part/s direct to the customer. The customer will only be expected to pay for postage. If the manufacturer assesses that the board has been misused the customer will need to pay for the part and postage.

Q4: Where I can get the control remote it if I lost or something happens with?

A4: Buy another from us, we will tell you how to pair the remote with skateboard, or send the video for you.

Perks
 







 
Share to Get Activity
 
We are going to give the Sharing Activities to promote MAX-C electric skateboards. You have the chance to receive a series of gifts after your succefully sharing of MAX-C to your friends who buy them through your recommendations. 
More details as follows:

 
How Do I Participant
1. Log into your Indiegogo account.
2. Click on the referral link under the on the right of Max C video and share with your friends and/or share via the social buttons under the video.
3. Make sure your friends use your unique referral link when they buy, so you get credit.
4. You can check your account and see how many referral dollars you have driven.
 
Rules
1. You must be a contributor to the campaign.
2. You will only get the referral credit if you are logged in to Indiegogo, and share your personal referral link. Your friends must use this link to purchase their perks.
 
Distributor
 
Interested in being a distributor of Maxfind in your country? Drop us an email at b2b@maxfindboard.com with your inquiry and we will get back to you as soon as possible!
 
Maxfind Team
 
Maxfind is a startup team dedicated to electric skateboards that built in 2015. Our star products MAX A and MAX B electric longboards have admitted by thousands of users over the world and got nice comments on Amazon. And our team are heavy users of our own boards. This time we want to introduce MAX C - a light-weighted, electric skateboard at an affordable price. It’s easy and fun to get on the board compared with traditional skateboard. And our initial thoughts of it is to make electric skateboards as normal as smartphones by making it affordable and useable. To make it true, we are going to do more with your support.
 
Timeline
 


 
Frequently Asked Questions
 
Features
Q1: What is the max speed? What is the average distance? What is the max weight limit?
A1:
 Max A
Max speed: 28km/h(17mph)( depends on user's weight and road situation )Max Mileage :13km/8miles  (will affected by riders' weight, riding skills, speed, road, etc) Max Weight Limit: 100 KG/220lbs 
Max C
Max speed:24km/h(15mph)( depends on user's weight and road situation )
Max Mileage : 16km/10miles  (will affected by riders' weight, riding skills, speed, road, etc)
Max Weight Limit: 80 KG/176lbs
Q2: Is the Maxfind board waterproof?
A2: The drive of Maxfind board is IP65 dust & water proof . In testing, the board held up well when ridden on paths and roads with surface water, however, we advise users to avoid water. Water damage will void the warranty.
Q3: How long will the battery last and how long to recharge?
A3: While being used the battery will last about 40 minutes to 1 hour and will only take about 1 hour to fully recharge.
Q4: Does the board has regenerative braking?
A4: Yes, it does , but this will save small energy which is used for heat energy while riding.
Q5: Is the battery fixed to the board ? Or can it be removed and swapped out with fully charged battery? 
A5: MAX C is unibody designed with lithium ion battery pack bulit in the deck. The battery of MAX A is removable and can be installed easily. 
Using
Q1: How do I control the Maxfind boards?
A1,The board comes with a wireless remote controller. You can accelerate by pushing the joystick up on the remote. Use your bodyweight to turn, like a traditional skateboard.
Q2: Does this go backward also?
A2: Yes, the Maxfind Skateboard does indeed go forward and backward and is controlled by a wireless hand-held remote.
Q3: Are there speed modes on the Maxfind and how to switch between them?
A3: Yes, there are 2 modes: beginner mode up to 10km/h and sport mode up to 28km/h(17mph)(Max A) or 24km/h (15mph) (Max C). You can switch between modes by switching the side button to "Hi" and " Lo" 
Q4: How do I slow down?
A4: Brake by pulling back the joystick on the remote.
Q5: Can I make it go faster than the listed top speed?
A5: We limit the speed to 22-28 km/h (17mph) for safety. Sorry we won’t raise this limit for anyone nor can you access the software in any way to change that yourself.
Q6: Can I ride the board uphill?
A6: Yes, up to 20 degrees on Max A, up to15 degrees on Max C, depending on the rider's weight and road surface.
Q7: Can I do tricks on the board?
A7: The board has been designed to cover distances quickly. Straight riding and carving are encouraged but tricks such as kickflips will be considered misuse and will void your warranty. But you can do some tricks on Max C, just make it safe.
Q8: Can you still use it if it runs out of battery like a normal skate board then get it back charged up?
A8: Yes, you can absolutely continue to ride the Maxfind Skateboard after the battery dies. Once you manually skateboard home, you can just plug it back into the wall and within an hour the skateboard will be fully charged again.
Buying
Q1: What's your delivery time?
A1: We'll ship out the first batch of orders 30 days after our Indiegogo campaign ends.The shipment time depends on the way we ship. express for product with battery usually takes about 12-15 days, if bigger order we will do by air to airport or seaway to the port.
PS: we have warehouse in US, Belgium, Australia and German where we can arrange shipment directly. 
Q2: Are you trading company or manufacturer?
A2: We are Manufacturer of Maxfind electric skateboard, we have our own design team, Manufacturing team.
After-buying
Q1: How about After-sale service?
A1: After order the goods, we will offer the best after-sale service for you. For example, offer the damageable parts, image or other details to you for your advertisement etc.
Q2:Do the Maxfind boards come with a warranty?
A2: Yes, the Maxfind boards come with a 1-year warranty, which covers the motor, battery, and remote. However, water damage or misuse will void the warranty.
Q3: How do I claim a warranty if I think the board is not operating properly?
A3: Contact Maxfind and send us information and a picture or video. We will contact the manufacturer who will assess the case and send the part/s direct to the customer. The customer will only be expected to pay for postage. If the manufacturer assesses that the board has been misused the customer will need to pay for the part and postage.
Q4: Where I can get the control remote it if I lost or something happens with?
A4: Buy another from us, we will tell you how to pair the remote with skateboard, or send the video for you.

story:
One month ago, at nine months old, Riley was diagnosed with Lissencephaly (smooth brain), a rare gene-linked brain malformation.  Unfortunately there is no cure for this condition and many affected children do not mentally develop past a 3-5 month old level, requiring specialized care.


Riley is the sweetest little boy, who continues to surprise us all with his determination to fight.   He has been blessed with the most amazing parents, who remain positive through the numerous hospital and specialist visits while maintaining normalcy for Riley's sissy Gabby and brother Nolan. 


All monies raised will go to the Piluso family to help them through this chapter in their lives.
story_txt:

Riley is the sweetest little boy, who continues to surprise us all with his determination to fight.   He has been blessed with the most amazing parents, who remain positive through the numerous hospital and specialist visits while maintaining normalcy for Riley's sissy Gabby and brother Nolan. 

All monies raised will go to the Piluso family to help them through this chapter in their lives.

story:
South Tampa Paintball

South Tampa Paintball is a recreational and tournament paintball field opening in Tampa, Florida. Safety and community involvement are our top priorities. We endeavor to inspire active participation among the local community to create a team-oriented culture by providing team sponsorship and volunteer opportunities.

We are aiming for a Grand Opening this Summer. Currently, we are in the land development phase of the project. The next few steps will involve fencing the perimeter, installing pole systems for the fields, mounting the netting, and furnishing the property with staging and hang-out areas. 

Our hope with IndieGoGo is to open the field with some extra amenities we originally planned to reinvest in over time. These things include a speaker system for music, sprinkling system for cooling off, theme designs for recreational fields, upgraded rental equipment, and other fun things to enhance your experience at South Tampa Paintball.

Check out the video below showing off our T-Shirt designs and Draw-String Bag Rewards:

http://youtu.be/9mhLRHS1O2s

Check out the video below showing the future location of South Tampa Paintball before land development:

http://youtu.be/u4gtexmmbTQ

Here are some more pictures of our Rewards below:

STP Key Chains
STP Wrist Bands
STP Bumper Stickers

Check out our website at SouthTampaPaintball.com. Follow us on Facebook andTwitter!

story:
Do you want an Electric bike but it's too heavy and expensive?

The Air-33 is a cutting edge folding electric bike, so light that anyone can carry it easily and it's still affordable for everyone that wants to improve their lifestyle and help the environment.

Sit back and cruise on the fully electric motor, or pedal on your own through the city, along the beach, and everywhere in between. Race through traffic and climb up steep hills without missing a beat. When you’re not riding your Air-33, just fold it up and store it away.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 ;

 

  

 

Whether you’re a new rider looking for a fun, sustainable way to explore your city or a daily commuter in need of a cost-effective alternative, AIR-33 is for you.

 

 

  • Net Weight (Air-33): 33.5lbs
  • Net Weight (Air-33 PLUS): 33.5lbs
  • Distance/Range (Air-33): Up to 25 miles (with pedal-assist)
  • Distance/Range (Air-33 PLUS): Up to 35 miles (with pedal-assist)
  • Motor: High speed, brushless gear hub
  • Top speed: 20mph only throttle
  • Throttle: Thumb Throttle for great pedal assist performance
  • Tires: 20” x 1.5” by Kenda
  • Brakes: V-Brake by Tektro
  • Saddle: Gel Saddle by Selle Royal for total comfort
  • Pedals: Folding Pedals by Wellgo
  • Chain: KMC 
  • Crankset: Prowheel 
  • Handlebar: Zoom
  • Cassette: 7 Speed Shimano Cassette
  • Fenders: Front and rear fenders with integrated light (upgrade)

 

  • Ultra Light Frame Alloy 6061
  • Super Easy 2 Step Folding Mechanism
  • Normal position: 59" L x 39.5" H x 23" W (150cm L x 100cm H x 58cm W)
  • Folded position: 32.5" L x 21.5” H x 16” W (83cm L x 55cm H x 41cm W)
  • Unique folding hinge, bearing strength in four points. 
  • Max seat height: 38" / 96.5 cm

  • Air-33 - Li-ion battery Standard Version 36V 8AmpH
  • Air-33 PLUS - Panasonic 36V 10AmpH (same cells used in Tesla Model S)
  • Lasts an estimated 2 years and hundreds of charges
  • Removable and Anti-theft lock with Key

Warranty & Maintenance

ElectroBike offers a one year warranty. Maintenance can be performed at ElectroBike stores, your local bike shop and you can buy any part at ElectroBike.com

 

ElectroBike always recommends you wear a helmet while operating Air-33

 

 

We've been working on the Air-33 for the past couple of years. Your support will allow us to offer you a better electric bike and prove that affordable electric transportation is a reality.

In order to get the costs to a price we believe creates value for our customers, we need to have a large initial production run. Your support will allow us to place our first large order with our manufacturers so that we can reduce production costs and get the Air-33 in the hands of people everywhere.

 

ElectroBike was born and developed to solve some of modern urban living’s most pressing problems: time wasted in traffic, exorbitant parking fees, skyrocketing gas prices and the damage that fossil fuels are causing our planet.

First released in Mexico in 2012, ElectroBike’s line of cutting-edge, eco-friendly bicycles are revolutionizing urban transportation internationally, with 25 locations already between Mexico and USA, ElectroBike has helped thousands of commuters to move around in less time and with less money than previously possible.

It is our mission to use our industry leading, eco-friendly bicycles to transform urban mobility. In doing so, we will reduce the carbon footprint, reduce traffic and create a better urban lifestyle. At ElectroBike, we help businesses and individuals alike live healthier and happier while doing something positive for our planet.

FAQ

 

 

How much does Air-33 weigh?​

Air-33 weighs only 33.5lbs. We custom-designed our ElectroBike to ensure that the frame and foldability will allow for easy transport and storage.

 

What is the maximum weight Air-33 can support?

At Electrobike, our products has been fine tuned and tested repeatedly. The maximum weight limit of the Air-33 is 275 lbs. The frame is highly durable and the seat is both weatherproof and super resistant.

 

What are the bike measurements from the floor to the saddle?

The maximum seat height (from floor to seat) is 38" / 96.5cm.

 

Can the battery be charged by pedaling?

As of right now, the battery must be plugged in to charge (the bike comes with a charger). However, we are looking into this feature and will keep you updated on any changes.

 

What is the distance/ range of Air-33?

Air-33 has a range of 25 miles and the Air-33 PLUS has a range of 35 miles with hybrid pedal assist. You can feel the power every time you pedal or just sit back and cruise on the fully electric motor.

Can the battery be removed?

Yes! The lithium battery can be removed or replaced with 2 easy steps. All you have to do is unlock it with the anti-theft key, pull out the battery and you're done!

 

Can I still bike on the Air-33 if the battery runs out of power?

Definitely! Even if you run out of power, you can cycle as you would do on a regular bicycle. The Air-33 still is a breeze to ride even without the motor.

 

How long does it take the battery to fully charge?

The battery charges in 2-3 hours with the upgraded fast charger (AIR.33 Plus) between 3-4 hours with the regular charger.

 

Will the charger work with 120V and 220V outlets around the world?

Yes, the charger is rated 100-240V. Works in every country and you can order extra chargers at electrobike.com

 

What is the life-span of the battery?

The battery lasts an estimated 2 years, equivalent to hundreds of charges. The Air-33 contains a Li-ion battery Standard Version 36V 8AmpH. And the Air-33 PLUS contains a Panasonic 36V 10AmpH, which uses the same cells as those of the Tesla Model S.

 

What kind of warranty do you provide?

All Air-33 ElectroBikes come with two years warranty. Maintenance can be performed at ElectroBike stores, your local bike shop, and you can buy any part at ElectroBike.com. If you encounter any production related default, be sure to contact us so we can relay this to our customer support and take care of it.

 

How do you change the gears?

AIR-33 comes with a 7 gear shimano casssette, and you change gears like a regular bike, just shift the lever!

 

What does the LCD Computer Dashboard do?

The LCD Computer Dashboard gives you access to speed, battery level, and distance traveled. It also includes 6 levels of assistance

Do I need a license to ride Air-33?

No, but we recommend you to check your local legislation just to be sure!

 

Are you confident that you can deliver on time?

Yes, we have 4 years experience in producing ebikes, we guarantee that the production and shipping will be flawless!

 

What is your return-policy?

We are offering you a 10 days money back guarantee after you have received your Air-33, because we are so confident that you will love your new bike. However, if you are unsatisfied and would like to return your ElectroBike, it must be in new and in re-sellable condition.

 

Can I pick the bike up myself to save on shipping costs?

Unfortunately no, we will ship all the bikes from our warehouse

 

How much are the additional taxes/duties and who is responsible for them?

The backer is responsible for paying any additional taxes or duties, we will be helping you every step in the shipping and import process. You can find a list of your country's import duties here: http://www.dutycalculator.com/country-guides/

 

Can I order Air-33 if I live outside the U.S?

Yes! We will ship anywhere in the world for $250. USA is $200, but if you order a 2 pack you will be given a $100 usd discount on shipping.

 

Should I wear a helmet?

Yes! We care about your safety, that's why we recommend always wearing a helmet while riding your Air-33.

 

Are the fender lights connected to the bike power?

Yes. We value convenience, that's why we designed the lights to be connected to the battery so they don't need to be charged separately.

 

How much do the fenders weigh?

The fenders weight is only 2lbs. At ElectroBike we custom-designed the Air-33 to be light enough for anyone to carry.

story:
Coolpeds USA is a team of passionate inventors & engineers devoted to GREEN mobility. 

 

You will love this new much lighter version 3.0!   MSRP $799, Now only $399!

The Coolpeds Backpack Escooter is the perfect last mile connector. It is virtually a "mini Tesla" at your service all the time!  

Better yet, it meets most airlines' requirements as a standard carryon!  Just fold it up and pull it along like a normal suitcase.  With the USB charging port, you can juice up your phone and iPad on the go, all while cutting back  pollution and congestion in the city!

 

The video shows the version 1.0 and you are buying the newest styles below:

3 options of new detachable bags to choose from:

New backpack style

 

 

Business backpack style

Lightweight suitcase style

Aluminum case style

 

A simple super lightweight electric scooter by itself

 

Top Media Coverage

"...the Briefcase Electric Scooter is actually a working suitcase made for carrying your clothes. However, when the need arises, it folds out to become a motorized scooter capable of reaching speeds of up to 20 km/h (12 mph) and traveling 10 km (6.2 miles) on a single charge."

"...so finally someone has upgraded the suitcase scooter with an electric motor so it's now self-propelled."

 

 

The Specs

Colors： Soft backpack style(black and grey)

                  Semi-hard shell suitcase(black and dark blue)

Easy folding system turns it into a compact carryon size in seconds

Speed:  Up to 20 km/hr (about 12 miles per hour)

Range: Up to 10 km (about 6 miles)  per full charge

Motor power: 200 watt

Braking system: Double brakes with electronic regenerative brake and fender brake

Battery: 23 V and about 4 Ah capacity=92watt hours(meet most airlines' carryon requirements)

Double your range by getting an extra battery for only $79 USD!

Weight:  Less than 10 lbs for the scooter (this is the lightest e scooter in its class in the world!) and Fortunately Airlines rarely weigh your carry on

Loading capacity: Up to 100 Kg （about 220 lbs)

Wheels:  Durable polyurethane wheels

High quality Lithium Ion battery: 4.6 Ah and 23 Volt that meets most airlines' carryon regulations!  (similar to batteries in the Tesla)

Charge time: 2-3 hours

Charger: Super lightweight and compact charger, similar to your laptop charger

Cool extra feature: 

USB charging port for your gadgets

 

Ways the Coolpeds CarryOnE can help you:

1. Last mile connection to your office, subway and train stations.

2. Speeding across school campuses.

3. Getting to the boarding gates ahead of everyone!

4. Sight seeing when you travel around the world & grab that late night snack near your hotel.

5. And thousands of other ways only limited by your imagination.

 

Your contribution will change the world

Coolpeds USA's mission is to provide fun, reliable, and affordable green transportation to everyone around the world.  We came up with revolutionary award winning electric scooters before and we continue to work on innovative products for all of you!

Tony Chan, founder, serial tech entrepreneur, graduated from UCLA and worked at Microsoft, Seattle, as a software engineer.  He left Microsoft many years to start his product design and manufacturing company and successfully supplied various cool products to Sears, Walgreens, Lowe's, and many other global companies.  In addition, the Coolpeds team has won many international awards for campaigns in improving the environment and society.

Our goal is to provide you a cooler and easier lifestyle while making the world a little greener.

GET YOURS AT UP TO 50% DISCOUNT NOW!
